27a3(rgyud): kun la med par bshad// bza' dang spyad dang dpa' bo sogs// ci nus pa dang rnam par bya// med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni// lnga po nyid de bya ba yin// bza' dang bca' ba rgya chen po// mtshan mo'i dus
27a4(rgyud): ni nyid du bo// de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing ngagayon phyogs mgo bo bstan nas ni// rang gi mgo bo 'phang gzhag ste// dpa' bo gnyis med pa yis mchod// yang na ma 'am sring mo 'am/ 
27a5(rgyud): bu mo 'am yang na chung mar ni// 'di 'dra'i cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// bcings las grol ba nyid du bya// de nas sngags ni 'grub 'gyur te// ji srid 'byung ba yod par du// slob dpon lus su gnas nas su
27a6(rgyud): bsgrub pa po yis mchod pa blang // dpa' bo rnams kyi stan dag dang // phag nyid du ni the tsom med// bsgrub po shin du mnyam gzhag pas// glu dang gar la sogs pa ba// lus can thams cad ji srid du
27a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ye shes lam zhe na// de srid 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing // mya ngan sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'dir// dngos po kun nas bsgrub pa pos// phyag rgya thams cad mchod par bya// mchod pa
27a8(rgyud): de ni mchog 'gyur te// mnyes pa yis ni nges par bsreg/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams kyi// phyag rgya chen po dang por bsgrub// de bzhin rab tu 'bad pa dang // kun nas dang bas mchod pa bya// 
27b1(rgyud): de'i 'og tu dpa' bo yis// dpa' bo kun du spad par bya// de ltar mchod byas de nas ni// steng 'og 'gro ba bsgrub pa dang // zhing dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ gsad dang skud pa la sogs dang // rmongs dang / 
27b2(rgyud): rengs sogs la sbyar zhing // dbye dang de bzhin tshar bcad dang // las rnams gang ci yang rung ba la// smon mi dgos par bsgrub pa po// bsgrub par 'gyur bas gdon mi za// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las
27b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur gyi cho ga'i le'u ste/ sum bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i// 'khor lo'i cho ga rgyas pa ste// las gang las ni kun brjod pa/ 
27b4(rgyud): grub par the tsom med pa'o// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// pad ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar// a ba 'du ti gnas de bzhin// smin ma'i bar du nges par gzhag/ dpa' bo sme rtsegs chags byas la/ 
27b5(rgyud): de nas mes bsreg gzhan du min// go ma sa dang ru tir bcas// 'bad pas bsreg bya lnga dag pa// de nas 'bar ba'i me la ni// bsreg bya dgu ni bya ba yin// de nas 'bar phreng rgya mtshor ni// kun nas
27b6(rgyud): sgo'i 'khor lor bsam// dpa' bo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa// dpa' bo'i gnas kyi mdab ma la// pho nya mo ni bzhi po dag/ dpal kun gnyis su med bde ba// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin du// khan dA ro ha phyi rol
27b7(rgyud): sbyor// rang gi gzugs su mngon zhen pa// 'khor lo'i dbus su bstan par ga// 'khor lo 'di dag bstan pa ni// dngos grub rims bzhin gsal byed yin// rig pa'i rgya mtsho las dpa' bo// mdor bsdus pas ni
27b8(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// pho nya gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ pho nya mo'i gnyis su med pa'i sbyin bsreg dang / las kyi cho ga'i le'u se su bcu bzhi pa'o// 
28a1(rgyud): de nas las kyi mchog rab ni// ci bzhin rims kyis mtshon pa ste// mchod pa gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid// las ni so sor sbyar bar bya// gang yang rab tu grags pa'i sngags// de'i dbye
28a2(rgyud): pa rim ci bzhin// kha dog pho nya la sogs sngags// mda'i shugs bzhin yongs su 'khor// phan tshun 'dud pa'i gsang sngags ni// yul nyid kyis ni phye ba yin// zhi ba la ni lhod pa ste// drag cing rtsub
28a3(rgyud): pa ma yin no// sa bon phreng ba de nas 'dzin// hUM ni mtha' ru gnas pa yin// bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur nas ni// gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o// kha sbar sbyor bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje lu gu brgyud bcings
28a4(rgyud): pabs/ rdo rjes phye ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin sbrang bu'i chun pos bskor// lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang // gtun shing gis ni dkrug pa dang // rdo rje kha yis bza' bar bya// dbug pa mtha' yis sbyar bar bya// 
28a5(rgyud): dus min 'chi las rgyal bar nyid// yan lag khA Ta ka dang sbyar// thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni// zhal du mtshon cha nges par sbyar// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i gnas dang / dus ma yin par
28a6(rgyud): 'chi ba bsku ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas phyag rgya mchod chen dang // sngags kyi bgod pa rab tu grags// phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'di dag gis// myur du 'grub par the tsam med// mtshan ma
28a7(rgyud): gnyis la sngags sbyor bas// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyis med pa'i// pad ma'i 'od ni dri med pa// rnal 'byor ma la mkhas pas mchod// phyag rgya gnon pa'i las rnams ni// de bzhin mtshon cha nyid dang sbyar// sngags
28a8(rgyud): bas mkha' 'gro ma sbyor la// snying po rnams kyis de bzhin bya// bslab pa mkha' 'gro blo ldan ma// dag pa'i lus kyis de bzhin bya// dpa' bo mchod pa'i cho ga shes// las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya// rnam
28b1(rgyud): rang dgar sngags pa yis// phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar// char gcad pa dang phan 'dogs phyir// las kyi dngos po rnam par bsgom// de nyid dbye bas phye nas me// rtsa'i lam du sbyar bar bya// sbyor ba rab tu bsgrub rnams la// 
28b2(rgyud): 'di yis rab tu bsgrub bya ste// lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// mi dang bcas pas myur 'grub 'gyur// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang / las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste/ sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// 
28b3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ba// gzugs ni gnon pa'i cho ga ste// phan tshun sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu sbar// zos nas med pa'i rjes la ni// bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya/ 
28b4(rgyud): mtshan mo bdun ni rdzogs pa dang // bza' ba btung ba dag la sbyor// 'di yis ji srid mtsho'i bar// dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// ser skya'i mar ni mthungs nas su// de nas bzlas mthar bskyug par bya// de yis rang
28b5(rgyud): gi gdong bkrus nas/ gal te rtag tu khros gyur pa// mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// til mar sa lu btags pa dang // ldan pas lus ni bskus 'gyur zhing // snum khur spags par byas nas ni// bza' ba
28b6(rgyud): la ni rab tu sbyar// gal te las ni ma btang na// ji srid 'tsho bar dbang du 'gyur// til nag dang ni zos nas su// skye tsher bcas pa skyug pa dang // ru rta dag dang ldan par ni/ 6/ lag skyes gshang lam 'byung srin bu/ 
28b7(rgyud): rang gi khrag dang btag nas ni// sa shug krin nyid dag dang // bza' btung mig sman gos la ni// byug pa nyid du rab tu sbar/ 'di yis ji srid 'tsho'i bar// dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// ba lang sha bsreg
28b8(rgyud): sbyin bsreg dang // khrag gis bskus nas lha rnams ni// de'i mod la dbang 'gyur ba 'am// gal te ma 'ongs 'chi bar 'gyur// sha nyid de'i mdun du'am// bsgoms nas mkhas pas sbyin bsreg bya// sbyin bsreg
29a1(rgyud): @mthar ni gtor ma bya// khams gsum skad cig gis 'gugs 'gyur// mtshan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i// dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ 
29a2(rgyud): rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa yin// rab tu 'bad te gsang bar bya// sbas don rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing // skal ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chung ba'i bsgrub bos kyang // nga mo nyes byas pas 'grub par
29a3(rgyud): 'gyur// / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'i khyad par du byas pa'i le'u ste/ sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas brda' rnams mkha' 'gro ma'i// lus kyi
29a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid gang yin dang // dpa' bo yan lag dbye ba ni// de bzhin du ni bshad par bya// dpa' bro'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing // gang gi thang du'ang mi 'don to// legs pa'i kun spyod legs sbas pa// gsang
29a5(rgyud): ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' 'gro yi// sngags ni bag sred pas 'don na// de la nga ni mi lta ste// mkha' 'gro stong phrag du ma yis// ngani pa'i bdag nyid can de za// dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod pa// bram ze gsod par/ 
29a6(rgyud): the tsom med// sdig sprod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// bslus 'gyur ngan pa'i bdag nyid de// mkha' 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang // de la nga ni skyob mi byed// gsong ba pa'i nang na ni// bsgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra// 
29a7(rgyud): bla ma la 'khus dam tshig nyams// mtho ris 'jig rten las ltung bya// he ru ka dpal 'jigs sngags blta// gang zhig bsrung bar byed pa ni// mkha' 'gro mar bcas dge dgod dang // de la nga ni phan 'dogs so// / 
29a8(rgyud): bla mas kyang ni dgos pa ste// gsang bar byed tshed sgrub pa pos// mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' ba// de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// bsgrub pa po ni dbang nyid 'gyur// khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag/ 
29b1(rgyud): bsgrub po dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa// thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'byor lnga 'jug dga'// yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par 'gyur// he ru ka'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// slob dpon dpa' bo mthong 'gyur na/ 
29b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di dag/ mthong zhing mtho ning shin du dga'// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi gsang sngags mchog// dpa' bo yi ni bdun pa ni// 'dzin par gang zhig byed pa ni// oM dang thugs khyad par dbye// de nams
29b3(rgyud): 'bad de phyag bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs mchod// rtag tu dpa' bo chen po dang // rol pa ldan par the tsom med// de'i thugs khe nas phage mo// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// pho nya rnams dang lhan cig
29b4(rgyud): bcas// de yis gang zhig legs skyes pa// srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin// chu bo rgya mtsho'i rdzing bu dang // ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo dang // lteng ka dang ni khron pa dang // khang stong dang ni lam spang dang / 
29b5(rgyud): thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma// kun du zhen par blta la gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod du// mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang // ro langs kyi ni du ma zhig// 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang stobs chen
29b6(rgyud): gyis// de dang lhan cig dpa' bo che// ci bde bar ni rol pa mdzad// ri sul tshang tshing gsang ba dang // gsang ba'i ma mo rnal 'byor ma// phyogs ni de dang de dag tu// bsgrub pa po dang sa stengs rol// dpal 'khor
29b7(rgyud): lo sdom pa las/ rnal 'byor ma'i sa dang / gsang ba'i dpa' bo sngags kyi le'u ste/ sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che// sngags ni rnam pa brgya po dgod// de nas 'di la
29b8(rgyud): yang dag mthong // gsol bar 'gyur bar gdon mi ga// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni nam mang po// mi bzad mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed pa// shin du 'jigs po'i dpa' bos ni// skrag cing rnam par 'byer bar byed/ 
30a1(rgyud): gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigs na// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni// rang gi gnas su khyer bar byed// mi rnams mkha' 'gro de dag dang // rtag tu mngon par rtse byed de// bde ba can gyi
30a2(rgyud): gnas 'drar 'gyur// he ru ka dpal gnas 'dod pas// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// bsgrub pa po ni sngags lus can// 'khor ba'i dga' dang skye ba med// 'gro ba thams cad bsdud par 'gyur// 
30a3(rgyud): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ ha ha zhes dgod pa'i le'u ste/ sum bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas da ni bshad bya ba// gang gis mi rnams dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngags kyi cho gar gnas
30a4(rgyud): sA la gnas pa gang yin pa// dpa' bo bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// sgron ma myos byed bcas pa dang // nya'i sha dang ldan par ni// dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du// nyi ma bdun gyis bsgrub/ 
30a5(rgyud): byed do// mtshan mo sbyin bsreg byed la gzhol// dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid kyis// thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na// rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa ni// zhag bdun
30a6(rgyud): gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// phyed kyis dpa' bo chen po ste// de'i phyed kyis blon po'o// rgyal phran la ni sum bcu gnyis// bsreg pa'i rims kyis sbyin bsreg bya// nyi shu bram ze nyid la ni// nyin bdun
30a7(rgyud): gyis ni sprin bsreg pa// de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun// sprin bsreg lnga po rje'u rigs la// dmangs rigs la ni sprin bsreg gsum// tha ma la ni sprin bsreg gcig/ de ltar dpa' bo'i rigs rims
30a8(rgyud): kyis// zla ba gcig na yang dag spyad// sngags dang ldan pa'i'o bsgrub pa pos// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// dpa' bo cho ga 'di yis ni// 'dod pa bsten pa 'grub par 'gyur// sa steng 'dod
30b1(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug bzhin// dpal ldan skal bzang por 'gyur ba// bsgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// yid 'ong 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ rigs lnga po dbang du ba ba dang / phyag rgya
30b2(rgyud): chen po bsten pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas las kyi mchog rab ni// gang gis shes na bsgrub pa pos// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsad dang sprad pa la sogs dang // rmugs dang
30b3(rgyud): rengs par bya ba dang // rmongs dang de bzhin phur dus gdag// tshig 'phrog lkugs par 'gyur ba dang // 'on dang de bzhin long ba dang // ma ning nyid du bya ba dang // gzugs ni yongs su brje ba ste// lan chen bcu
30b4(rgyud): gnyis 'di dag ni// dngos grub bsgrub pa po la ni// dran pas 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// shar dang byang gi gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad dang // ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes dang // yul
30b5(rgyud): dang yul du mngon par skye// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo ste// de ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams bshad// ku lu ta dang dgon pa dang // sin du'i yul dang grong khyer pa// gser gyi gling dang so'u ra ste// de bzhin khyim
30b6(rgyud): gyi lha dang ni// yi dgas grong dang kha ba'i gnas// kan tsi lam pa ka'i yul// ka lI kA dang ko sa la// tri shu ku ni oM dwe dang // ka ma ru ba ma la be// lha mo mkhar dang ra mi'i dbang // ko ta pa ram ar bu de// u Din
30b7(rgyud): dza lan de ra dang // pu li ri ma ya la sogs// yul 'di dag gi bu mo gang // dpe' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma// de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te// yid kyis shugs kyis 'jug pa yin// rnal 'byor ma
30b8(rgyud): drug ku lu ta// mya ngan yul na ma mo rnams// sin du nyid du la ma ste// rigs kyi gtso mo na ga rar// lam pa dang ni so'u ra ste// rigs kyi lha mo rnams yin te// yi dgas grong du nag chen po// mkha' 'gro/ 
31a1(rgyud): mar bcas ru pi ni// kha ba'i ri dang kan tsi dang // pan tsa la ni yul dag dang // khyim gyi lha mo ka ling kar// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin no// ko sa lar ni sha za ba// yi dgas glong / 
31a2(rgyud): du gyur pa ru// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbom dbang phyug/ tri sha ku nar khe na da ro ha// de bzhin pu lI ra ma la// gser gling rme sha can bud med// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig yin// de las lhag pa ji snyed pa// dpal
31a3(rgyud): ldan he ru ka yi ni// 'khor lo rnal 'byor ma yin no// shri he ru ka'i bsrub pa che// de'i dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dis// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro ba
31a4(rgyud): thams cad 'di yis khrig/ mkha' 'gro ma 'di'i dam tshig ni// sprul pa'i sgom pa nyid yin te// bsam gtan la sogs gang ci rung // sa steng na ni rdzogs 'gyur ro// sngags pas rtag tu mnyam
31a5(rgyud): gzhag pas// mtshan mo nam mkha'i gos can pa// skyes pa 'am gal te g.yon pa kun// rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo dgas// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// rang byung rtag tu mchod na ni// ma lus
31a6(rgyud): lus pa med 'grub cing // g.yon pa'i mchod la rab tu 'jug/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ yi ga nyi shu bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
31a7(rgyud): de nas dpa' bo me tog chu// 'thungs nas sngags 'di rjes dran pa// phyag rgya lhan cig bsgrub pa pos// mtshan mo rtag tu sha za ba// sngags gsum bya ba 'di nyid kyis// grub pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/ 
31a8(rgyud): 'thungs dang de bzhin sbyin pa dang // thog ma tha ma dbus med po// 'khor lo sgyur ba 'angad bzhin no// reg dang lhan cig gtso mo che// bden par tshangs par spyod pa dang // thog mtha' bzhad pa'i phyag rgya
31b1(rgyud): bya// lta ba'i snyoms pa grags ldan pa// mtshan mo 'am de bzhin nyid ni// 'dis ni bzhed pa dag tu bya// gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba gang // ji ltar gnas pa dpa' bo nyon// rtag tu de'i mchi ma 'byung // 
31b2(rgyud): dad pas de'i ba spu ldang // rdo rje las ni 'gom mi byed// de bzhin phyogs gos gyur pa mchod// g.yon pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi// 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim// 'bugs 'byin bskyod dang dgod pa dang // 
31b3(rgyud): sgeg dang gar gyi ngo mtshar dang // sna tshogs mdun du byas nas ni// phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran pas// ha ha he he rnam pa brgyad// dgod dang sna tshogs dpa' mchog dga'// ha ha'i rnam pa nye bar rtag/ du bar
31b4(rgyud): byed pa rtag tu sngags// de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing // sngags dang bsrem gtan legs sbyor ba// gtso bo rnams dang dpa' bo'o// spu ldang lhan cig 'byung bde ba// rdo rje'i bsgom par mi byed pa/ 
31b5(rgyud): g.yon pas yongs su brtag pa yin// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs yongs su brje ba dang / dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
31b6(rgyud): de nas gzigs pa bshad pa ste// dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med mi// gnas kyi dbye ba'i cho ga shes// bsgom la rtag tu mngon dga' ba'o// lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am khyim dag gam// dpa' bo'i gnas kyi ri
31b7(rgyud): bor ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gnas// ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur// phyag rgya gcer bu mchod pa yi// las nyid kyis ni yongs su grol// gos gzhan dag gis bkab nas ni// 'dod pa rnams
31b8(rgyud): kyis reg mi bya// de bzhin skra ni grol 'gyur ba// las rnams thams cad brtsams pa la// rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin sdigs// phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa dang // lha dang lha min tshogs kyis kyang // 
32a1(rgyud): ma mthong bar ni mchod par gyis// snyim pa me tog gis bkang ste// mkha' la spyod pa gyen du mthor// me tog dag ni sa gzhi la// gal te ltung bar ma gyur na// de nyid du ni snang mi 'gyur// 
32a2(rgyud): gnas kyi khyad par la gnas na// mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag ni// gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyur// ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang // gsung gi dbang phyug 'gugs par 'gyur// lha dang
32a3(rgyud): lha mo'i gtam shes shing // sa 'og la sogs gang yod dang // skar ma rgyu bar shes par 'gyur// yul yul de bzhin dgon pa dang // grong khyer dang ni gzhi mdo dang // shing cig dang ni dpa' bo'i khyim
32a4(rgyud): ni rtse dang ni shing drung du// rtag tu snying po nye snying gdon// lha dang mi yis mthong mi 'gyur// de bas yul phyogs 'di dag tu// bsgrub pa po ni rtag tu gnas// shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas// 
32a5(rgyud): yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can// mi phyed par 'gyur pha mar ni// sa 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan du min// bdag gi lus la rnam dogad de/ sa la ku sha'i stan du nyal// yige bdun gyi bdag nyid
32a6(rgyud): gnas// brgya rtsa brgyad ni nyid du bzlas// rmi lam du ni bya ba kun// yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur// dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams// bya ba kun du gang 'gyur dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan
32a7(rgyud): dang gzhan// thams cad rmi lam dag tu ston// de bzhin sngags bzlas ral gri chu// mthe bong mar me me long dang // sngags bzlas nyid rtag rnal 'byor pa// pra se na ni 'bebs par byed// 
32a8(rgyud): bsgoms dang lan bdun bzlas bkod pas// dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur// de nas dpa' bo yi ge bdun// sngags dgod pa'i dbye ba nyid// nyi ma'i dbus su bsams nas ni// stong gi
32b1(rgyud): bar du bzlas nas su/ shel gyi rnam pa lta bur ni// nad kyis gdungs pa blta bar bya// mthe bo tsam gyis skad cig gis// nad rnams sel bar the tsom med// nad rnams rnam par grol 'gyur na/ 
32b2(rgyud): ston ka yi ni zla ba 'dra ba// zla ba'i dbus su rnam dgod cing / lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo byed/  pa yi ge shel gyi mdog ltar snang / gzugs lnga ru ni ngalta bar bya// nad rnams kun la dgod par bya/ 
32b3(rgyud): rims dang gdon dang brjed byed dang / gzer sogs kun dang mdze can dang // dug gis zin pa'i nad rnams dang // gang zhig nad kyis sdug bsngal ba// zla gzugs yi ge bsams nas ni// phyogs
32b4(rgyud): bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur// mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te// mgo mangs ni mngar gsum brtag/ yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang // stong rtsa brgyad du sbyin bsreg byas// sngags
32b5(rgyud): pas nang par dus su ni/ gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur// sprin bsreg stong phrag bcu yis ni/ yul 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur// yang na gsang sngags rgyal po ni/ gnas ni gang du
32b6(rgyud): bsams pa dag/ de dang der ni de'i tshe// skye bar 'gyur bar the tsom med// / dkar po yi ni zhi bar 'gyur/ nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod// dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste// 'phral
32b7(rgyud): du nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// ser po thams cad gnon pa ste// 'di ni bstan chos nges pa yin// / ser pos dpung ni gnon pa ste/ grub dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon// dkar pos
32b8(rgyud): bsams pa tsam gyis ni/ 'chi ba nges par slong bar 'gyur/  / sbrul chen brgya yis zin nas ni// 'ching myur du slong bar 'gyur// dug gis rgyal bar gyur pa dag/ 
33a1(rgyud): gsal bar byas na zad par 'gyur// rims dang gdon deng rjed byed ni// lag pa mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur// rgyan pos khu tshur bcings nas ni// yid la rtag tu bzlos
33a2(rgyud): byed na/ ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol bar/ rings par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dgra bo gal te lag na ni// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar ba yang // ji srid khu tshur ma dgrol bar// mtshon tsha gtong
33a3(rgyud): bar mi nus so// yang na bya ba thams cad ni// ji bzhin nyid du bsgrub par byed// 'bras bu me tog 'dab ma dang // so rtsi de bzhin zas rnams lo// lus kyi sbyor ba dang po ste// de bzhin gnyis pa nus pa yin// 
33a4(rgyud): gsum pa dag ni phyi'i nyid// bzhi pa yis ni dmigs pa med// sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// sa gzhi shing dang bcas pa dang // rgya mtsho ske rags brtags pa yang // de la nges par 'grub pa ni// 
33a5(rgyud): 'grub pa 'di la the tsom med// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// slod 'debs phan 'dogs nus pa yin// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ nye ba'i snying po'i las bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gsum
33a6(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas pho nya rnyed na ni// yi ge bdun par ldan bsgrub pa// gang du las ni yang dag rtsom// de'i las ni mur 'grub bshad// de bzhin du ni yi ge bdun// lag pa'i
33a7(rgyud): dbus su rnam par dgod// rnal 'byor ma ni drug yang dag/ rtsibs drug 'khor lor yang dag gnas// g.yon pa'i 'khor lor bskul dang gnas// gang gi gzugs 'dzin bsams nas ni// kha nas
33a8(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po bzlos// gang la lag pa de bstan na// des ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// tsan dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni// ske tshe de bzhin len tshwa dang // bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes sa// 
33b1(rgyud): gcig tu bsdus nas brtag par bya// lag pa gnyis mnyes kyis nas ni// rnal 'byor ma'i sbyin bsreg bya// mtshan mo sme sha can me 'am// dur khrod me la phye ma bsreg/ bsgrub par bya la mngon bsres te/ 
33b2(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di na brtsam par bya// ji srid brgya'i bar du bzlas// de ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// sa'i bdag po bdag nyid dang // / nor yang dbang du 'gyur ba yin// sbyor ba 'di ni 'grub par skye/ 
33b3(rgyud): gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra// rdul de nyid ni blangs nas su// lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsre// dur khrod ras la btums nas ni// lan bdun bzlas nas bzhi mdo ru// sor brgyad tsam du brkos nas ni// dgra'i
33b4(rgyud): ming dang bcas pa bri// gang gi ming smos sbas 'gyur ba// de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur// phye ma nyid ni blangs nas ni// 'bad de de'i 'o ma dang // de ni slar yang gsos 'gyur na// 'grub pa nyid du
33b5(rgyud): the tsom med// phye ma de ni blangs nas ni// myos byed lnga dang ldan pas su// de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcings// / dgra'i ming yang bcing bar bya// bzlas brjod lan brgya byas nas ni// dur khrod
33b6(rgyud): du ni myur sbas na/ 'phral du spro ba nyid du 'gyur// bton pa nyid kyis thar bar 'gyur// bton nas gos dang phrad nas ni// 'bad de ba'i 'o ma dang // slar yang gso bar byed pa dang // 'grub
33b7(rgyud): par 'di la the tsom med/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa lces/ rnal 'byor ma drug dang yi ge bdun gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas lus kyi rab
33b8(rgyud): mchog ni// ngag gi dngos grub bsgrub byed pa'o// ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar// brgya rtsa brgyad ni blangs nas su// 'bad de ba'i 'o mas bkru// bzlas brjod brgya dang bya ba yin// lan bdun bzlas
34a1(rgyud): ba/ pa'i me tog gis// ling ka'i spyi bor snun par bya// de ltar shin du mnyam gzhag pas// nyi ma bdun du bya ba yin/ de ltar nyim zhag bcu gcig la// me tog dag ni blangs nas su/ 
34a2(rgyud): chu bo chen por song nas ni// re re nas ni chu la dor// de nas thams cad rims bzhin du// lan re bzlas nas rab tu sbyar// chu bor me tog mtha' ma yin// rgyun las bzlog ste rab 'bab na// chu dang bcas
34a3(rgyud): par blangs nas ni// sos ma reg par des mthungs na// gsang ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba yi// bsgrub po'i tshi ga ni 'grub par 'gyur// de nas skye gnas brgyas bcings la// sngags pas bsgrub par mngon
34a4(rgyud): phogs na// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas// de nas yid ni gnas bzhin du// blo ldan thun gsum mthe chung bskyod// bram ze gsod pa 'ang zhag bdun gyi// brgya
34a5(rgyud): byin yang ni nges par 'gugs// tsan dan dmar po'i lus las ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la// tsha ba gsum gyis lus la sku// spra tshal gyis kyang rab tu byug/ bsgrub pa po yis
34a6(rgyud): gsang gnas su// zangs me'i khab kyis phug nas su// seng ldeng me mdag du med la// lan brgya bzlas te sros nas su// rgyal po blon bcas mdun na 'don// chung ma 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ 
34a7(rgyud): myur du 'gugs par byed pa yin// mi'i bdag po 'khor btsas ni// gro ga'i 'dab mar bris pa 'am// dur khrod ras la sen rtsi dang // 'gri wang dag gis bris nas ni// ming dang spel nas gang la ni// 
34a8(rgyud): mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas// dur khrod me la de 'dungs ma/ dur khrod me ste grub phyir bshad// ji srid spra tshil ma zhu bar// bsros par gyur na rgyal po ni// 'khor lo bsgyur dang bcas pa yang // 
34b1(rgyud): nges par 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes sa// tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// dur khrod thal bar bsres pa rnams// bsgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus la// seng ldeng me ni du med la// 
34b2(rgyud): rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni// mnyes la sbyin bsreg byas nas ni// ji srid thams cad bsregs pas 'grub// rdul de blangs nas ma yengs par// dbugs mi 'byin par sbas nas ni// brgyal zhing sems
34b3(rgyud): dang bral 'dra la// rmongs shi sems ni smyon rmongs la// rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni// bsgrub pa po'i steng du ltung // phyugs sam yang na po nye mo// de nas las kyis pho nya mo// bya ba 'di ni
34b4(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur// ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas ni// brlan bcas dpung pa'i tshad mnyam blangs// 'bar 'gyur ro bsregs me la dor// ji srid de ni ma tshig pa// myur du song ste de blangs nas// rig pa lan
34b5(rgyud): bdun bzlas nas ni// gang zhig bzlas te bskor na ni// de ni de'i skad cig la// bud med dang ni skyes pa dag/ rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// ka ra bi ra'i me tog dmar// brgya bzlas rgyal gyi sbyor ba
34b6(rgyud): las/ bsgrub pos 'gi wang gos byugs la// me tog chu la gnas pa dag/ chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni// lte ba nub pa'i bar du ni// lag pa'i sbyor bas dbus gnas la// rig pa stong du bzlas nas ni// 
34b7(rgyud): lag pa gnyis kyis phyer sbags te// chu dang bcas pa btung bar bya// de nas bsgrub pa po de yis/ tshig gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni// yid kyis nges par 'gugs
34b8(rgyud): par 'gyur// ltar bcas lha min mi rnams ni// myur du dbang du byed par 'gyur// khros pas tshig gis gsod par 'gyur// dbye dang bskrad pa nyid dang dbye/ 2/ bsgrub pa po ni tshig nyid kyis// tshar gcod pa
35a1(rgyud): nyid byed par 'gyur// tshig tsam gyis ni chu bo dang // shing rta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang // glang po rta dang de bzhin sprin// skyes bu 'am yang na bya ba gnon// yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa/ 
35a2(rgyud): tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas gzhan gyi las bshad pa// dpa' bo chen pos rang nyid gsungs// 'gugs pa yi ni sbyor ba dag/ bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa// ka ra bi ra'i me tog ni// 
35a3(rgyud): dmar po yang dag blangs nas su// rig pa lan bdun bzlas pa dag/ skye gnas dbus su gzhug par bya// me tog de ni kha sbyar byas// gsang ba'i gnas su nges par sbyar// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor
35a4(rgyud): ldan// sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas// skye gnas dbus gnas me tog de// bsgrub pa po yis gcig blangs nas// me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa// de'i mod la dbang du 'gyur// brgyal zhing sems
35a5(rgyud): dang bral ba dang // yan lag tshig kun gzhan dbang ste// yid ches sems ni 'jug pa ru// skad cig gis ni dbang du byed// 'di ni mngon du 'grub pa ste// don yod dbang du byed pa yin// dpal 'khor lo sdom
35a6(rgyud): pa las/ rnal 'byor ma drug gi tshig gi dngos grub dang / dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de yang yi ge he lnga ni// las rnams thams cad grub byed pa/ chogang
35a7(rgyud): gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub thob par bshad// hwe ho haM huM haH// yi ge ha ni lnga po dang // lag pa mnyes pas bskul tshig bcus// kha nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing // dgra bo de'i mod la
35a8(rgyud): 'chi/ shin du mdzes pa'i thod gnas pa// srin lag khrag gis mnye bar bya// ji srid skams kyi bar du ste// des ni bsgrub bya rnam par 'jig/ gel te khro ba 'bar ba dang // mig dmar gyur pas bzlas
35b1(rgyud): nas ni// dpung tshogs gzhon par bcas pa yi// rgyal po myur du glag par byed// byi la dang ni le'u dang // khyi khra wa dang chu skur dang // mkha' 'gro ma la gtor bsreg bya// 'di dag myur du 'grub yin/ 
35b2(rgyud): par/ rgyud la de ni the tsom med// / ri bong la sogs spu las ni// srad bus byas te lan stong bzlas// gang gis mgul du bcings gyur pa/ 1/ de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// lag pas bzlas
35b3(rgyud): brjod stong byas te// ka rA bi ra'i me tog dang // yi ge re res mngon bzlas te/ sbrum ma la ni rag 'gyur na// mngal ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur ste/ datang na sbyar bar gyur pa yin// gang la sdigs 'dzu
35b4(rgyud): byas te 'tsho / slar yang 'tsho bar byed pa yin/ ska pal 'khor lo sngos pa las/ yi ge ta lnga'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcun drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya
35b5(rgyud): mkha' 'gro kun gyi snying po ste// 'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / gdangos grub thams cad skyed khyen min// de la mkha' 'gro ma'i rig pa chen po bzlas na/ rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 
35b6(rgyud): hu bzlas brjod pas pa ni/ dpal chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// mi rus kyi rgyu las phur bu sor drug pa byas la/ brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs rnams gcod par 'gyur ro// 
35b7(rgyud): zhing dang ra ba dang me he dang / glang po che dang / rta'i gnas su brkos te sbas na thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang dub par 'dod na/ rgyal po'i sgor sa las byas pa'i gzugs
35b8(rgyud): ban mo brgyad par byas la/ mkhas pas gzhag nas/  na nyin 'ag dang pos man du lung kakhri 'bras bu dang / me tog sres te/ sbyin bsreg brgya ma byas ni dbang du 'gyur ro// sngag po 'di nyid kyis
36a1(rgyud): dgug pa dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs pa dang / skems pa dang / rmugs pa dang / tshig 'phrog pa dang / long bar byed pa dang / slar gtong bar byed do// de nas skyes pa bud med du
36a2(rgyud): bya bar 'dod na/ ro'i me tog dang / ka ka an tri ka'i 'bras bu dang / bsgres pa'i sen mo dang / rkang pa'i 'og gi lpags pa cha mnyam par byas la/ ri bong gi khrag dang btags te ri lu bcu gcig byas la
36a3(rgyud): drib ma la skam mo// de bzhin du zhag dang po la lag pa bcings te/ nyi ma bcu gnyis pa la gang gi phye ma mgo la gzhag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro// de nas skyes pa khyer bya bar 'dod na/ rgya lcag sa ne'u
36a4(rgyud): le'i spyi bor gzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong bzlas la/ nyan zhag brgyad pa la gur gum dang mnyam por byas te/ len brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la phye ma'i sbyin bsreg byas na/ gang gi spyi bor
36a5(rgyud): gzhag pa de khyir 'gyur ro// slar gso ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma byin na/ de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyur ro// rdzas rdzas ma yin par 'dod na/ 
36a6(rgyud): gser shing gi 'bras bu sbyin bsreg brgya byas na/ rdzas rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro// a ru ra'i sbyin bsreg byas na rnal mar 'gyur ro// de nas blo bur ba rnams bskyed par 'dod na/ bya chen po'i gnas/ 
36a7(rgyud): kyi sbyin bsreg pas na zhag bdun gyis blo bur ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sla ru zlog pa ni 'bras phub kyi sbyin bsreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// byi la'i spu zla ba bzas zin pa'i tshe/ bsdus nas gang gi ming nas
36a8(rgyud): brjod nas sbyin bsreg byas pa de'i thal ba blangs te/ mgo bor byin na bi lar 'gyur ro// slar bzlog na rnal mar 'gyur ro// bya rog gi rgyus pa la srang bu byas la/ brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ 
36b1(rgyud): gang gi mgul du bcings pa de khur 'gyur ro// sems can gang la gang gi 'argyus pa srad bu blangs la mngon par bzlas te/ bcings pa de dang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du khwa dang thi ba dang / rma ba dang / chu
36b2(rgyud): sbyar dang /  'ug pa dang / khwa dang / bya rgod kyi gzug sa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi spu las srad bu byas la/ lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas mgul du btags na ba lang du 'gyur ro// 
36b3(rgyud): gang dang gang rkang bzhi pa de'i srad bu byas lo/ mngon par bsngags pas mgul du btags na de dang de'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// dkrol na thar par 'gyur ro// 'bru la bzlas la nor gri bdag blo'i khyim du bcug la/ 
36b4(rgyud): lha bdag nyid dbang bskur na//  mtshan mo bdun gyis 'bru thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// 4/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyi las thams cad pa'i cho ga
36b5(rgyud): le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ba// mkha' 'gro kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// 'dod pa'i las kun bsgrub pa'o// 
36b6(rgyud): gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po g.yo byad cing // rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag dngos grub rims kyis ster// ha swa phaT hUM hUM ye ni rna wa dz+wa ba ye ni ki DA dA bu zas oM/ 6/ sngags
36b7(rgyud): 'di bzlas pas 'grub pa ste// las rnams kun byed dge ba yin// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // khan d+ha ro ha la ma stsogs// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi// sngags ni 'di nyid yin par
36b8(rgyud): bshad// sa 'og yang na mtho ris sam// / de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang // las ni gang dag yod pa rnams// glags pas de dag thams cad 'grub// 'di las shin du mchog gyur gang / 
37a1(rgyud): / 'jig rten gsum na ci'ang med// gang phyir 'di ni bla med pa/ las rnams thams cad 'grub byed cing // mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas// mdo bshad rgyas par ma yin no// 
37a2(rgyud): me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi// ri bo bzang po bri bar bya// de'i steng du rtag bsgoms pa// mkha' 'gro de bzhin la ma dang // khan d+ha ro ha rnal 'byor ma// dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' bo mchog/ 
37a3(rgyud): heha ha he he zhes bya ba// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin pad ma gar dbang dang // shri he ru ka nyid dang // mkha' snying dang / 
37a4(rgyud): nirta mgrin nyid// rin chen rdo rje stobs pa che// mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang // rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang // rdo rje hUM mdzad dpa' chen po// de bzhin rdo rje ral pa can// myu gu can dang rdo rje'i
37a5(rgyud): lus// rdo rje'i 'od ni nyid dag dang // 'od dpag med dang lha'i dgra/ de bzhin mche ba rnam brtsigs dang // keng rus keng rus chen po dang // thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi
37a6(rgyud): yisa'agro ba 'di dag thams cad khyab// dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid// rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs// lus rnams kun la bsgrub pa pos// 'khor lor zhugs par blta bar bya// 
37a7(rgyud): grub 'dod shin du mnyam gzhag pas// 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom// sngar bshad pa'i cho ga yis// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod// 'khor lo chen po grub kun gnas/ 
37a8(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang // dpa' bo bye bas rab tu gsungs/ mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yi// 'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' 'gro nyid// gzugs can ma dang
37b1(rgyud): dum skyes ma// de bzhin la ma la sogs ni// dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin// dpal 'khor mo sdom pa las/ dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste
37b2(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyugs las de bzhin cho ga ste// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ 8/ myur du dngos grub 'thob 'gyur ba'o// 
37b3(rgyud): sa lu btags pa sngags pa yis// phyugs kyi gzugs byas rims ji bzhin// rus sbal rnga mo phag dang wa// khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // khrung khrung khra dang se ra sa// de rnams las ni bshad pa ste/ 
37b4(rgyud): de'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya// skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis// gsum dang bzhi dang lnga nyid de/ skye ba drug dang bdun du yang// skye ba brgyud par gdon mi za// gang dag khwa'i dri zhim zhing // mig mi
37b5(rgyud): 'dzums par rnam par lta// bden par smra zhing mthong na dga'// rtag tu dam chos dga' 'gyur zhing // rang gi skye ba shes pa dang // lus kyi dri ni rtag tu zhim// mtshan nyid 'di dang ldan pa ni// skye ba
37b6(rgyud): bdun du 'byung ba yin// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// lha'i gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// bsnams pa 'am reg pa tsam gyis ni// gang zhig thig le byas pa de// mod la 'grub par 'gyur ba ste/ 
37b7(rgyud): 'di ni rarung dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur// de 'i snying khwa'i ri tsa na// mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas nas ni// de'i thig le bya ba yin// sems can gang dang gang gi ni// 
37b8(rgyud): gzugs su byed par 'dod pa na// de dang de'i gzugs su ni// thig les 'gyur bar the tsom med// mkhas pas shing lo'i khu ba ni// ro tsa nar bces blangs nas su// dpral bar thig le byas nas ni// 
38a1(rgyud): @de gzugs 'dzin par the tsom med// phyogs nyid kyi ni ba spu dag/ lag pa 'am spyi bor bcing bar bya// de'i yan lag lnga ldan zhing // de'i spu dang rnam bsres la// lag dang spyi ba
38a2(rgyud): bcings nas ni// de'i gzugs 'gyur the tsom med// rnal 'byor ma ni bsgom pa zlos// mi rnams nus par ldan yin yang // brkam zhing sdig la mngon dga' rnams// dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa
38a3(rgyud): yin// glang po rta dang bong bu dang // rus sbal rnga mo phag dang wa// khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // khrung khrung khwa dang sa ras/ gzugs bzang ba dang gzugs ngan pa// lha'i gzugs su de 'gyur ro// 
38a4(rgyud): nale 'byor pa chen rang dga'i gzugs// skye 'gyur de ni the tsom med// de la shin du mchog gyur pa/ 'jig rten gsum na yod pa yin// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ skye ba bdun du bsgrub par
38a5(rgyud): bya ba'i gzugs yongs su rje ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas sbyin bsreg cho ga ni// nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du
38a6(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gom sa dang myos byed bsre// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin bsreg bya// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na// phran tshegs mi ni smos ci dgos// spyugs pa'i so shi
38a7(rgyud): dor ba dang // de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes po// ming gi myos byed btags bsres pas// khams gsum dag ni dbang du 'gyur// zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni// zos nas zlon pa'i zas dag dang
38a8(rgyud): mi'i sgra dang ldan pa yis/ mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin// rang gi lus byung skyugs pa dang // mkhas pas rang gi sgra dag ni// nim pa'i shing la rab sbyar na/ mod la dbye bar
38b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin/ 1/ rab monyam gzhag pas dngur mer// khwa'i gshog pa nyungs sur la/ 9/ sres pa'i sbyin bsreg byas 'gyur na// 'phral du 'chi ba 'am smod par 'gyur// gnyid log ma log yangs
38b2(rgyud): ba 'am// zas la spyod stsogs me thun nam// sngags pas rtag tu zlos byed te/ de la bdud ni yod ma yin// lce spang gis ni bsreg lugs bya// yang dag sprin lugs byed pa'i mi// de'i zla ba gsum
38b3(rgyud): rjes la// rigs kyi dbul ba 'jigs par 'gyur// sha chen dag gis la lta zhig/ myos byed ldan pas sbyin bsreg byed// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// bsgrub pa po'i thun ga gsum du/ 
38b4(rgyud): ma lus sa rnams spyod pa ni// zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur// dgos par 'gyur na mkha' spyod ma// rgyal srid ster bar gdon mi za// lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni// thun gnyis bar du
38b5(rgyud): sbyin bya sreg bya// rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis// mkha' la spyod pa nyid 'thob 'gyur/ go ma yu dang myos byed kyis// sprin bsreg phyi nang bya ba byas// de'i lag tu myur 'grub ste// dngos grub
38b6(rgyud): thams cad du 'gyur ba// sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan mo bzlas// yul 'khor gcig ni 'jig par byed// de ltar nyin re byas nas ni// rgyal po nyid du de byed 'gyur// 'di las rab mchog
38b7(rgyud): gzhan dag ni/ 'jig rten gsum na yongs yin// rnal 'byor chen po rang dag ro'achi// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol/ 3bil ba de bzhin pa lang na/ u dus 'bar ba nyid dag ni/ 
38b8(rgyud): sbyin pa sreg 'bus byas myur du ni// nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur// go mad sa dang myos byed bsrel// khye/ rgyal srid 'dod cing sbyin pa byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes byas na/ dbul po nyid dugs
39a1(rgyud): 'gyur// gos suni bsreg pa'i rgyus/ ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur/ gos su'i sbyin pasreg gis// myur du no bungadag mnyam par 'gyur/ brtul thugs gtsang sgra med de yang/ 
39a2(rgyud): gnang bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// lhag pa'i tsher 'gyur gu sman du// mud dga' ma sha tsan ka/ sbrang rtsi'i rtsigs ma skye tshe dang // ta ma la'i 'dab blangs te// gang zhig kha ni 'chang bya ba/ 
39a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ci 'dod gyur pa yis// gang du dga' ba der 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gnas la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma// he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag/ kun du brtan g.yo'i bdag
39a4(rgyud): nyid can// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// tshan dro ha ni mngon 'gyur yin// u btsun do sbyang ka ba/ 'dus pa
39a5(rgyud): ring du song ba yin// nye ba'i 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros yin// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shri he ru ka'i yul du spyod// 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid sa// pha rol phyin bcu'i sa
39a6(rgyud): rnams dang // rnal 'byor ma'i brda'i skad// mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag// bu la sogs pa gang brten pa// phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan
39a7(rgyud): khragra 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun du phag dang zhabs ldan pa// kun du mig dang mgo bo'i zhal/ kun du thos ldan 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs par rnam par bzhugs
39a8(rgyud): de bas dngos grub bsgrub bya yi// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// bsgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa las/ dbang gi sbyin bsreg
39b1(rgyud): dang / gnas la sogs pa'i sa brtan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// san ngag shin du rnyed dka' ste// dpa' bo'i brda'i skad du ni// nga yis
39b2(rgyud): rgyud du smras pa yin// gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra/ a li gA li zhes brjod pa/ brgya stsogs stong pa mngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ ji srid bsdus
39b3(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ldan zhing // bdud rtsi tshom byed ma ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pa dbang bskur ba// go cha chen po yang dag bsrung // sngags rnams kun gyi mchod pa yin// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus
39b4(rgyud): nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing // skye dang skye gnas der gshegs kyi// rigs skyes chos ldan rgyal por
39b5(rgyud): 'gyur// ji srid mngon bsags sdig pa yi// bag tshogs kun zad mtshan nyid ni// gang zhig 'di ni rtag bsgom pa// sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod// me'i dbus su gzhag
39b6(rgyud): na ni// mar sar zhu zhing zhu 'gyur zhing // snod kyi dri ma dag par 'gyur// de bzhin shri he ru ka'i// mtshan gyis sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur/ bsam gtan sems dpa' tsam gyis sam/ 
39b7(rgyud): klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba// yang na 'khor lo bsgyur ba 'thob// rnal 'byor pa rnams 'phro ba'i tshe// dpal ldan khrag 'thung stsogs mkha' 'gro/ 
39b8(rgyud): lig na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan pa den sna tshogs dang / ru// rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / 6// sna tshogs klu'i mchod pas mchod// 'chi ba zhes bya'i nam rtog 'di// mkha'
40a1(rgyud): 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor ma// sa stengs na ni rnyed par dka'// dpal ldan he ru ka rgyud chen// gang gis shes nas ma dang be// dbul po sdug bsngal gyis
40a2(rgyud): gdungs pa// de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// mgul brgyan gdu bu dpung brgyan dang // rna cha tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // do shal mgo bo'i phreng ba dang // ske rags sil sil sgra sgrogs pa// ri sted sna
40a3(rgyud): tshogs pad ma yi// lte bar a li ka li skyes// dbu ma'i bdag po rnams non cing // rdo rje dril bus sku la mkhyud// nyi shu rtsa bzhi phyed ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bskor// shri he ru ka
40a4(rgyud): rgyal chen po// go 'phang mchog ni sgom par bya// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor bcas dbus su 'byor ldan pa// thams cad dges shing gnyis med 'gyur// 'byin dang sdud par byed pa
40a5(rgyud): yin// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// sprod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad do// sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya la// thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yan// zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la// gal ta mos bar ma
40a6(rgyud): gyur kyang // smad pa dag tu mi bya ste// chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran pa// gang gis 'di dag yul min pa// bdag gis chos nyid mi shes shing // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sres ni// bdag nyid chen po
40a7(rgyud): rnams kyis mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung 'gyur tam// ma byung na yang rnam kun du// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// de ltar rnam par gzhag
40a8(rgyud): nas kyang // 'jig rten pa kun yod mi smad// de'i 'gro ba bsam yas shing // sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// ji srid mdo bya spyod pa ni// rnal 'byor gsang mtha' dbye ba nyid// sems can
40b1(rgyud): mos pas 'jug pa rnams// de dang de la dga' ba yin// dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba/ dngos grub kyi chog shin du rmad du byung ba/ bstan chos thams cad dpal he ru ka/ raba'
40b2(rgyud): bo chen pos glags pas 'grub pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// 'dod na grub pa'i mchog gi mchog/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ le'u lnga
40b3(rgyud): bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// rdzog s+ho// dge'o// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad ma ka ra bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phub pa/ slad kyis pan Ti ta chen po
40b4(rgyud): sum ti kIr ti dang / de lo tsha ba mal ban d+he blo gros grags kyis zhus te gtan la pa'i ba'o// / @/ rgya gar skad du/ a bi da nod ta ra tan tra nA ma ma hA tan tra ra dza/ bod skad du/ 
40b5(rgyud): nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo bsgyur// sku gsum
40b6(rgyud): ye shes lnga ldan pa// 'gro ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rtog pa'i 'ching ba gcod mdzad cing // 'jig rten bya ba rab bsgrub pa// de snyed rnams la rtag phyag 'tshal/ 
40b7(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ma khro bo mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi dra ba gsang ba'i snying po la bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan
40b8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / 
41a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba nges par brjod pa/ bla ma'i bla ma'i snying po gsang ba bshadang du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ lag na rdorje khro bo chen po'i bdag po
41a2(rgyud): 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs dang bcas pas rnam par rol pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa/ 'phro ba bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ de la bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ 
41a3(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min// dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i
41a4(rgyud): don kun bsgrub byed pa// bla ma'i bla ma mkha' 'gro ma// dra ba'i sdom pa bshad par bya// gsang ba mchog gi dgos pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems
41a5(rgyud): dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan dpa'// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom yin// srid pa'i sgra tshul las nges byung // dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod tshul yin// 
41a6(rgyud): thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba las// 'chi med ci lta ci lta bur// rang bzhin 'od gsal dag pa ni// gsang ba'i gnas byung las
41a7(rgyud): byung ba// nyes bral rtag pa zhi ba ste// nam mkha' dang mnyam bskyed pa po// rang bzhin dag pa las byung ba// rnal 'byor ma'i bde ba ster// bzlas dang bsam gtan sogs ldan dang // sbyor nyid
41a8(rgyud): tshig shes pa nyid// de nyid rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang po'i bdag po rab tu nyon// dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang // dri'i chu dang bcas pa dag/ mkhas pas ri lur byas nas ni// 
41b1(rgyud): pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dag pa mchod// 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la// pho nya rnams ni de la mchod// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste// mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung // 'di ni nang du bsdus pa yis/ 
41b2(rgyud): 'dod na dngos grub bsgrub par bya// rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod bya zhing // rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// rang dang gzhan la'ang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa
41b3(rgyud): dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar 'di la the tsom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed// bzlas dang bsam gtan
41b4(rgyud): dga' bas kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma las/ gsang zhing sba ba'i dam tshig la 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
41b5(rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba/ khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i shi
41b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba
41b7(rgyud): dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi gtso'o
41b8(rgyud): rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' pe chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' de chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / rna dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sor sna rdo rje dang / 
42a1(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje dang / tshedapa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang / 
42a2(rgyud): dpa' bo nam mkha'i dbyings rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa/ rnam par 'phro ba gsang ba'i snying po las byung ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil
42a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs pa mchog rnams/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig chen po'i 'khor la bzhugs pa la/ dpa' bo chen po thar pa'i dum bu la/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen
42a4(rgyud): bo rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lta dgra dang // dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dpag med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo
42a5(rgyud): chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpo' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa'
42a6(rgyud): po chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rje mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha
42a7(rgyud): snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / de lta bu la sogs
42a8(rgyud): ba dpa' bo dang / rade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bur gzigs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa thams cad kyi bdag po de rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnyis su
42b1(rgyud): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rloms par zhugs te/ dam tshig chen po'i rang gi gsang ba'i b+ha g.yas 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ dpa' bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa sbyor ba'i dmatshig chen po gsungs bya 'di
42b2(rgyud): lnga ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / 
42b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad ma'i drab zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen me rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje la ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha'
42b4(rgyud): 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab tu gtum mo ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum pa'i mig can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen me 'od ldan mo zhes bya ba dang / 
42b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang
42b6(rgyud): / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jig byed rje mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
42b7(rgyud): ma chen mo sngo sangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rnam zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor pa chen mo bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i
42b8(rgyud): shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gos rings ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i gau cha ma zhes bya ba dang // rnal 'byor ma
43a1(rgyud): / chen mo rab tu dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo bsgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang
43a2(rgyud): de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis nam mkha'i khams mthar thug par hU~M phaT ki li ki lA'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi dam tshig dang mkhyud pa dang / rtsub ma nas snying rje chen po'i nyams yongs su rdzogs pa'i
43a3(rgyud): dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gang bar gzigs so// dpa' bo rnams kyi dam tshig dgongs shing gzigs nas/ dbul rdorje me kha' 'gro ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
43a4(rgyud): yang dag par 'byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba
43a5(rgyud): dang / derje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rjem mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje brtan ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rjem mo gshin rje po nya mo zhes bya ba dang / 
43a6(rgyud): rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba me zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs/ 
43a7(rgyud): su bkang nas/ rigs ma lus pa'i bdag po chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las byung ba'i dpal he ru ka'i dam tshig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid ste/ 
43a8(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig chen po gsungs pa ni// chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag byung // 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// 
43b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
43b2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang // rnal
43b3(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rta mchog ste/ rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste/ dam tshig mchog gi bsrung ba'o// gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang thabs dang gnyis su/ 
43b4(rgyud): med par gyur pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba spos pa gsungs pa ni/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma chen me rdo rje phrag mo dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma chen mo gshin rje ma dang / 
43b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma chen mo g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug me chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo can ti
43b6(rgyud): ka ste/ de lta bu'i nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag pa'i bsrung ba'i sbyor ba gsang pa chen po'i snying po/ de lta bu la sogs pa rnal 'byor
43b7(rgyud): A mang po du mos blo ba'i kA ta garog gi rang gi 'od par kyis phyu rnam sa yod do// 8// de nas dgongs pa sna tshogs pa'i dmi tshig na po sa nam sol bas do rje zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'a'adzin la snyegs par zhug
43b8(rgyud): ma lus shing lus pa myed pa'i sems dpas chos kyi dbyings kun du gang bar gzigs nas/  rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas 'khor gyi tshogs sna tshogs spros te/ sna tshogs pa las 'dul ba'i
44a1(rgyud): thabs kyi nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po sna tshogs pa'i sku 'dzin pa/ sems can la phan par rjes su dgongs pa
44a2(rgyud): thugs rje chen po dang khro bo'i nyams gnyis su med par sbyor ba ni// ngo mtshar sna tshogs shing mtha' yas pa'i cho 'phrul chen po/  rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i khams gsum gyi bdag po nyid du yang dag par bstan
44a3(rgyud): nas/ chu dang me dang rlung gi dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che'i sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/  de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las spros pa/ rdo rje khro bo/ 
44a4(rgyud): chen po las byung ba'i/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa la/ kun du bzang po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i 'khor rnams 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te/ rnam pa sna tshogs
44a5(rgyud): mdzes pa'i/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa dril bu dang / dza yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer kha'i rabs mig mangs ris su bris pa/ rdo rje theg pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi
44a6(rgyud): 'khor lo 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / gdon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin du
44a7(rgyud): gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang / re srog pa dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang /  lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs po/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra sgrogs pa/ 'phyed pa dang / a la la'i
44a8(rgyud): sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dang / cang te'u yi sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo med pa rnams gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa li phyag na rdo rje bsnyen bkur bas/ sems can thams cad dge ba la gzud pa'i snying rje'i nyams kyi rol pos
44b1(rgyud): rnam par grol ba/ pad ma ltar g.yo bar gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa'i lag pa'i thal mo sbyor te/ bcom ldan 'das thod pa bsnams pa/ mchog tu zab pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi khro bo'i rgyal
44b2(rgyud): po chen po rnam par sgeg pa'i sku chen po 'dzin pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du zab pa'i gsung gis nges par brjod pa 'byung ba'i bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyal mo
44b3(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa dang / 'thun par phan zhing bde ba sna tshogs pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad du gsol/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje legs pa
44b4(rgyud): nyon cig/ nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma las zhu ba po'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ rdo rje'i
44b5(rgyud): gsang ba gsungs pa/ snying khar zla ba bsgoms nas// rdo rje phra mo rnam par sprul pa/ bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa// de la 'di ni byin brlabs pa/ bla ma'i yang bla ma
44b6(rgyud): ste/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dra dra sdom pa// gsang ba'i snying po mchog nyon cig/ oM swa b+ha ba shud d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha ga shud d+ho haM/ oM swa b+hA ba shu n+ya ta sarba dArma sa b+hA ba shud+d+hoH/ oM shu n+ya ta gnya' na badz+ra swa b+hA ba
44b7(rgyud): ad ma ko haM/ oM badz+ra shud dA sarba d+harma badz+ra shud d+ho hAM/ oM yo ga shud d+ha sarba d+harma yo ga shud d+ho hI/ oM gnya' na shud d+ha sarba d+harma gnya' na shud d+hi d+ha/ oM sa ma shud d+ho sarba d+harma sa ma shud d+ho haM/ 
44b8(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta shru n+ya ta a nu ra ga badz+ra swa b+ha beng bud+ho ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su b+hi shud d+ha d+harma d+ha du gnya' na badz+ra so b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta man tra shud+d+ha sarba man tra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM kro d+ha shud
45a1(rgyud): / d+ha sarba d+haHkro d+ha shud d+ho haM/ oM tsang t+ya shud d+ha sar+b+ba dA tsid ta shud d+ho ha~M/ oM bag shud d+he sarba d+harma br-ig shud d+ho ha/ oM ka ya shud dA sarba d+harma ka ya shud d+ho hAM/ oM gnya' na a mri ta shud d+ho
45a2(rgyud): sarba d+harma gany+dza ra na a mri ta shud d+ho ha~M/ oM na nA sa sa ya shud d+ha sarba drA rba nA nA sa ma yang shud d+ho ha~M/ oM tsir+yan ya~M shud d+ho sarba d+ha ma tsar+ya na ya shud d+hed+ha/ oM tri lo ga pa ri shud d+ha sar+b+ba dAm tri yo gi ni shud
45a3(rgyud): d+ho hrIM/ oM a b+hi shi ka shud d+ho sarba d+harma a b+hi shi ka shud d+ho haM/ oM pU tsa shud d+ha sarba d+harma pU tsa shud d+ho ho/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta a dA ya pU dza badz+ra sa b+ha ba ad ma ko haM/ oM man d+ha la shud d+ha
45a4(rgyud): sarba d+harma man d+ha la shud d+ho haM/ oM a ti ba ti shud d+ha sar+b+ba dArma a ti pa ti shud d+ho haM/ oM pa ri shud d+ha sarba d+harma bi ra shud d+ho haM/ oM yo gi ni shud d+ha sarba dArba yo gi ni shud d+ho haM/ oM tad tA
45a5(rgyud): shud d+ha sarba dArma tad ta shud do ha~M/ ShAhi i te he tu a b+haM ga ta sarba dArma he tu a pa gA ta taM/ ru i ti ru ka ra a ba ga ta sarba d+harma ru ka a ra ba toH/ ka yi ti na ta tsid ta sarba d+harma na kA
45a6(rgyud): tsid ta sde toHoM d+hi tA kAr shud d+ho sarba d+harmad+hi tIHka ra shud d+hoH/ oM b+hA ba shud d+ha sarbad+ma rma pA ba shud d+ho/ oM dza ba shud d+ho sarbad rma dzab shud rtena.oM a ra shud d+has
45a7(rgyud): d+harma a ra shud d+ho haM/ tAM au bAk+Sha shud d+ho sarba dArma bAk+Sha shud d+ho hraM/ oM sa ma ya ta shud d+ho sarba durma a sa ma te ta shud d+hoH/ AM sa saM be da ni shud dA sarba d+harma swa saM bi da na shud d+ho haM/ 
45a8(rgyud): oM be sha shud dwe dArma dwe sha shud dro ha~M/ oM mo hA shud d+ha sarba d+harma mo ha shud d+ho ha~M/ oM rA ga shud d+ha sarba d+harma shud d+ho t-i/ oM ma nA shud d+ha sarba d+harma ma nA shud d+ho ho/ oM ir sha shud d+ha
45b1(rgyud): sarba d+harma ir sha shud d+ho he/ oM kha badz+ra shud d+ha sarba d+harmakha badz+ra shud d+ho haM/ oM tri tsakra ba ri shud d+ha sarba d+harma tri tsakra pa ri shud d+ho haM/ oM dA ki ni shud d+ha sarba d+harma ki shud d+ho ha~M/ oM sha ta ku la shud
45b2(rgyud): dA sarba d+harma shata ku la shud d+ho haM/ oM ma tri shud d+ha sarba d+harma ma tI shud d+ho ha~M/ oM bI tha shud d+ha sarba d+harma pi tha shud d+ho ha~M// de bzhin du ji srid nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par
45b3(rgyud): shes par bya'o// pu dza o a go ra de ma kA/ oM kri ki ka la ka hi pre tri so su na si ma ku// sa bcu rnam par dag pa dang // pha rol phyin bcu de bzhin te/ shes bcu rnam par dag pa'i
45b4(rgyud): bdag// rnam pa bcu po rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo gsum po yongs dag phyir/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ dus dang gnas skabs las grol zhing / rnal 'byor ma'i yid dga' ba/ 
45b5(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// he ru ka ni 'byung ba'i mchog/ nges brjod bla mo'i bla ma ni// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon bskor ba ni bskor ba yis// mchod pa dgod dang bskor ba bya
45b6(rgyud): gang gis de nyid shes pa yis/ brda' ni lnga po bstan par bya// gang yang dbang bskur med pa la// / gzhan du de nyid ma stan cig/ nges brjod rgyud ni rim pa yis// bla mas slob ma dbang bskur
45b7(rgyud): lus// gzhan du byis pa rmongs pa dag/ blun po phub ma brdung dang mtshungs// glegs pam rjes gnang la brten pa'i// slob ma de ni shi ma thag/ rmongs pa yis ni 'jigs byed pa'i// mnar med
45b8(rgyud): sogs su ltung bar 'gyur// bol mig rims dang drug dag dang // mkha' 'gro'i gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur// mi srun bgegs dang tshogs dag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ 
46a1(rgyud): depas pams kyis/ bram rdzo sa mas bzhin sa rnams sasapa/ grags pas myur du 'grub par 'phrul// des rjod chung kyi ma pa/ 
46a2(rgyud): de nyid rtag tu gsang bar bya// gnyis med ye shes sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor ma mchog bsgoms nas ni// de ma thag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur// mi'i bu mo 'di 'dra ba// dam tshig mi
46a3(rgyud): shes ngan bdag nyid// drag cing log lta dman pa dang // skal med snying rje med pa dang // brkam chags ser sna ldan pa dang // g.yon can phrag dog can med smra// 'dod chen gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par
46a4(rgyud): rtog pa mang ba ste// sngags pas dngos grub ring 'gyur phyir// 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor cig la goms byams shing // brtul zhugs brtan la
46a5(rgyud): dam tshig shes// dpa' zhing chags bral 'dzom pa med// nga rgyal ser sna med pa yi// pu ka si ni mchog blangs nas// de dang lhan cig brtul zhugs bya// spyod pa sngags rig bdag gis spyad// phyag rgya
46a6(rgyud): lnga ni bdag gis bcang // mgo la thod pa'i brgyan yang bya// thod pa khwa TaM ga bzung zhing // thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byug/ rtag tu ma ha man sa bza'o// myos byed gzung bas myos pa dang / 
46a7(rgyud): ro'i gos kyi dum bu ni// lpags pa chen po gos su gyon// lhag ma zos kyang mi nyams shing // khrag gi btung bas tshim pa dang // skyed mos tshal dang grong rnams su 'ang // rtag tu chags med gnas pa
46a8(rgyud): zhing // rtag tu bzhi mdo 'am dur khrod du// yang na tshong dus gnas par bya// nyan thos 'jig rten skal med cing // mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa'i// nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i// gtsug
46b1(rgyud): lag lang du gnas mi bya// byang chub sems dpa' rnams nang na// skyes bu dbul po bzhin gnas bya/ rjerje ga gyis rnam par rog// rtag tu du khrod la gnas shing // 'a 'ong brgyas dang theg pa ma / sha chen
46b2(rgyud): chen bza' zhing myos byed btung // dga' ba'i sems kyis gnas nas su// dpa' bo'i gtso bo bsgom par bya// med na phyag rgya chen po ni// g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa// de nyid ye shes las byung zhing / 
46b3(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin byung ba// gzung du med cing brjod du med// gnyis su med pa'i nyid la gnas// rtse cig sems ni byas nas kyang // bsgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na// bde dga' ba'i dngos grub 'grub// 
46b4(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim// / phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis// gnyis pa thams cad las grol ba// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yos
46b5(rgyud): pa de bzhin thabs yin no// bsgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sum bcu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed// thog ma'i grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma 'am// gnod sbyin klu mo dri za mo 'am// gzhan yang sna tshogs pa
46b6(rgyud): rnams ni// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod// a li ka li mnyam bsgoms nas// gsang ba mchog gi mchog de nyid// rang gi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag/ dpa'
46b7(rgyud): bos brda' rnams bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor pa'i lag g.yon te// 'di ni dpa' bo rnams kyi ni// brda' rnams 'jug pa'i gnas yin no// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsungs// 'gro kun g.yon las byung
46b8(rgyud): ba nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' shing nyid la/ rnam par snang mdzad yul gar zhugs/ du skye bras padas gar dbang phyug/ srin lag dApa' bo grub gsol ga/ nga ma myi bzang nam mkha'i sku// sen mo'i ngos la ta mchog
47a1(rgyud): ga/ ste/ g.yon pa las byung rgyu'i phyir// dpa' bo rnams kyi gzhi yin no// lag 'thil po nye 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab ni nges par legs sbyar nas// bsgrub bos brda' lnga bstan par bya// sa ni
47a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan du grags// mu khams ma ma kau ru bshad// me ni gos dkar mor bshad de/ rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu grags/ sbubs ni stong pa pha rol phyin// nang gi dpa' bo rnams kyi gzhi
47a3(rgyud): rgyab ni mkhas pas gshegs su gsol// gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar dpa' bos brde' byas nas// de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'// dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor
47a4(rgyud): baHmkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin// phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad dang // sna tshogs brda' dang tshig dang ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid dang / pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// bsgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// 
47a5(rgyud): de dag thams cad 'chad pa yin// ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dang // de bzhin bris dang dam tshig dang // sku mdog dag gi khyad par gyis// gang gis bsgrub pa pos 'grub dang // sna tshogs dga' ba'i sngags
47a6(rgyud): rnams dang // gzhung lugs sna tshogs dkyil 'khor dang // yid 'ong dam tshig mchog rnams dang // sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma mchog dang // yid 'ong dpa' bo sna tshogs dang // rnal 'byor ma'i man ngag dang / 
47a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag dang / sna tshogs rigs mchog dam pa dang // bla ma rgyud pa'i man ngag ni// slob ma rnams la phan phyir ro// bdag po'i las ni shin du mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la legs par
47a8(rgyud): slabs// / nges brjod rgyud kyi las nyid las// rgyud gzhan cho ga'i rim pa ni// sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par rnams// sngags pas rmongs par shes par bya// rnal 'byor ma'i spyod pa dang // mkha'
47b1(rgyud): 'gro ma yang de bzhin to// ma mo phyi rol phyag rgya ni// phag mo'i rigs las byung ba dang / dpa' bo kun gyi spyod pa dang // 'khor lo spyod pa shin du skrag/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi// spyod pa mkhas pas shes
47b2(rgyud): brgya// he ru ka dpal rigs las byung // spyod pa dge ba dag las bsgrub// slob dpon spyod pa'i khyad par dang // yul gyi spyod pa dag la bslab// / rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud spyod pa// rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya chen
47b3(rgyud): dang // bya ba'i rgyud kyi dpe ba'i rim// thams cad rgyud rnams rnam par shes// lung las grub pa'i bstan chos dang // mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te/ bla na med pa'i spyod pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin las
47b4(rgyud): byung / phyi rol bstan chos yongs shes shing / spyod mchog sna tshogs bslabs nas kyang // / rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i// mthar thug gnas la bslab par bya// bza' dang spyod pa thams cad ni// yid
47b5(rgyud): gnyis med pa'i sems kyis bya// yi ge brgya pas thams cad du/ gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su// rang gi ming bzhin ldan par ni// gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya// don rnams thams cad 'grub
47b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ bla ma yis kyang bla ma ste// / mkha' 'gro dra bu'i sdom pa yi// phreng ba'i sngags ni rtag tu bzla// gsang sngags btubs cho ga dang / snying po dang ni nye snying dang // bsrung ba'i sngags chen 'a bya ste/ 
47b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shin du mdzes pa la/ dbus kyi lte bar dgod pa ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed/ yi ge'i phyi mo mchog rnams te// sngags rnams kun gyi dam pa'o// gsang ba'i gsung ba dgos pa ni/ 
47b8(rgyud): gsad sngags thams cad bsdus pa ste// gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin zhing // yi ga'i phyi mo 'gro skye ba'o// / de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te// dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yin// bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin no// 
48a1(rgyud): @#/ 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med// sgoms na skyo ba 'di nyid la// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang snyed// byams pa'i go chas bsgoms pa ste// snying rje yi ni go chas bsgoms// shes rab mtshon chas
48a2(rgyud): bsgom ldan pas// nyon mongs bdud las nges rgyal 'gyur// phyir zlog chen mos bsrung ba dang // rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rim pa gsum ni rdo rjes mtshan// thams
48a3(rgyud): cad mchog gi bsrung ba che// dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol// bka'i 'khor lo bsrung ba che// phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur// bsrung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis// bsgrub pa po la byang chub gsol/ 
48a4(rgyud): rdo rje phur bu dridra ba dang // rdo rjes gzhi dra ba dang // steng gi bla re dga' ba yis// gdug pa'i bdud ni bskyod par byed// bdud min bdud min pa yang min// rang gi sems ni bcing bar bya// rang gi rang sems bcings pa la/ 
48a5(rgyud): bdud kyi 'jug pa ga la yod// mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te// gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin// lus la ste'u tsan dan ni// mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no// me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pas gtor ba
48a6(rgyud): yin par bshad// rang bzhin dag pa mar me ste// mnyam nyid bsgom pa gdug pa yin// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i yang bla ma las de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// / 
48a7(rgyud): / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsung ba gsungs pa/ de nas yang dag bshad pa ba// nges brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// bsgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ 
48a8(rgyud): bla ma rgyud pas gsal rtogs 'gyur// phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni// mnyam nyid dam tshig mchod dam pa// yid gnyis med cing spyod pa med// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// chos grangs
48b1(rgyud): med cing skar ma med// bsnyung ba'i cho ga 'ang yod ma yin// gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i bya ba 'ang yod ma yin// dus dang tshod las rnam par grol// dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ 8rang rgyud
48b2(rgyud): sngags dang rnal 'byor shes// sems can kun gyi don gzhol ba// ri sul dang ni ri rtse dang // chu bo'i ngogs dang 'dus pa dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dga' dang // shing gcig dang ni zhi ba'i gnas/ 
48b3(rgyud): ma mo'i khyim 'am dur khrod dam// sna tshogs skyed mos tshal mchog gam// lha khang dang ni mchod rten nam// khyim 'am gzhi mdo dag tu ni/ bsgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na// 'dod pa kun gyis 'bras
48b4(rgyud): bu gsol// gnas ni rtag pa byas pa 'am// yid ni gang du dga' ba der// sna tshogs bde mchog dam pa ni// de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur// dbye ba du mos sgom pa ni// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i
48b5(rgyud): dbang gis so// ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis ni// sa ni byug pa byas nas kyang // bzod pa'i pha rol phyin me tog/ 'bad pa'i sa ni gtor bar bya// sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong ldan// rgya cher mnyam par gzhag
48b6(rgyud): pa yis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin dmigs nas// rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis bya// tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams dang // dge ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni/ 
48b7(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don yang bya// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams na// thams cad stong pa nyid bltas nas// byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa// sems tsam la ni rab gnas bya// rang gi snying ka'i mkha'
48b8(rgyud): dkyil du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa bsgom// de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa// ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin// sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi// rnam par 'phro bas kun du khyab// sngon grub
49a1(rgyud): @pa ni bskul nas ni// byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin// nam mkha'i khams ni nyams dga' bar// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba ste// til gyi gang bu lta bu yi// lha dang khro bos
49a2(rgyud): khyab par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // byang chub sems ni bla ma'i gtso// lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni// bdag gis mchod cing brjed par bya// sangs rgyas spros pa sprul pa'i tshogs// khro bo
49a3(rgyud): rgyal po rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba ris drug sems can rnams// sangs rgyas rnams su dgod par bya// nam mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i// mchog rnams bzhugs par mthong nas ni// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// 
49a4(rgyud): gsum po kun la skyabs su mchi// sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams// sangs rgyas go 'phang de la gzhag/ der ni bsgrub pos gsol gdab dang // rtag tu skyabs su 'gro ba bya// rmongs pa'i phung sogs nga rgyal ba// 
49a5(rgyud): bsam pa mchog ni bskyed pa ste// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no// b+h+rUM a~M hI ho hUM hri zhes bya ba ni// de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang // rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug/ rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa/ 
49a6(rgyud): yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog de bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// he ru ka dpal rdo rje'o// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin// oM hU~M traM aM khaM hAM/ zhes bya ba ni// gti mug zhe sdang phra
49a7(rgyud): dog dang // 'dod chags ser sna'i de bzhin du// skye mched dag ni thams cad la// dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin zhing // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nem mkha' nyid dag go// la~M ma~M pa~M taM khaM zhes bya ba ni// ltung byed ma
49a8(rgyud): dang gsod byed ma// 'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dang // lha mo pad ma'i dra ba ni// mkha' mnyam nam mkha' lta bu'o// de ltar rnal 'byor pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched sbyang ba'i phyir/ oM pra kri ti da ri
49b1(rgyud): shud d+ha sarba darma pra kri ti pa ri shud dro haM/ zhes bya bas rnam par dag pa'o// de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya// sngags kyi skur ni 'gyur ba yis// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni he ru kar 'gyur zhing / 
49b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad he ru kra'i// go 'phang mchog la dgod par shog/ oM swa b+ha ba shud d+ha swarba d+harma swa b+ha ba shud d+ho ha~M/ lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya// phyogs bcu'i srid rtse'i bar du ni// 'od zer
49b3(rgyud): phreng ba spro bar bya// 'od des bltas nas de 'og tu// ra ba dra ba de bzhin te// rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlabs// bla re mda'i dra ba dang / 1/ rdo rje me ni 'bar skor ba// phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya// oM me di ni
49b4(rgyud): badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra b+han dA hUM/ oM badz+ra bA ka ra d+hu be druM/ k+Sha oM badz+ra ban dzar hUM ba hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tan hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha ka ra dz+wa la traM satraM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na laka hU~M hUM hUM/ khrag 'thung bka'i 'khor lo ni/ 
49b5(rgyud): rtsibs brgyad 'brar ba'i 'od byed bltas nas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra/ 
49b6(rgyud): phyag rgya che dang snyoms zhugs po// bkas sgo'i dkyil dkrung legs par bzhugs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi bskyod pa ni dbu la bzhugs// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ 
49b7(rgyud): mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'i// mtshan ni sum bcu gnyis kyis bsgyings// dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste// thod pa khwa Ta~M ka 'dzin cing // rdo rje dril bus legs par mkhyud// zhags pa
49b8(rgyud): lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing // dpa' chen bde ba go 'phang bzhugs// dkar dang ser dang ljang khu ste// zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur// rim dang rim las bzlog pa yis// de las khro
50a1(rgyud): @#/ brgyad kyang spro// rdo rje drag po rdo rje nyid// rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// thabs sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje nag po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i// khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod
50a2(rgyud): sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu du ba'i mdog can dang // dkar dang nag dang sngo dmar dang // rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan can// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes/ 
50a3(rgyud): sna tshogs pad ma nyi dbus su// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jig rten bskyong ba brgyad po dag/ nyid kyi zhabs kyis mnan par bsam// thod pa dang ni khwa Ta 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang
50a4(rgyud): 'dzin// thams cad dril bu cang te'u ste// bde ba mchog ldan shes rab mkhyud// dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes// mi bzang mche ba rnam par brtsigs// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis
50a5(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// de yongs gyur nas bdag nyid ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnams bsgom pa// khro bo 'bar bas rnam par 'khrugs// mche ba brtsigs shing shin du 'jigs// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// 
50a6(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// lcags kyu zhags pa khA TaM ka/ rdo rje dril bu thod pa 'dzin// mgo bo'i do shal drag po'i sku// thod pa'i phreng ba'i ske rags can// gdug pa thams cad zhabs kyis
50a7(rgyud): gnon// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya// steng 'og gnas par bsam pa yis// khro bo gnyis ni bsgom bya ba// gtsug tor
50a8(rgyud): gnod sbyin sa 'og dge// dkar dang mig sman sngon po'i mdog/ thod pa khA TaM ka 'chang zhing // 'khor lo rtse gsum phyag na snams// zhags pa lcags kyu rdor dril 'dzin// g.yas brkyang gnas pas gnas
