144b8(rgyud): sbal ba'i rus pa la byas dag/ klu shing dag gi bye brag dang // rus sA le rus pa glang po'i so// khyad par drin tshar yang 'bebs// bram ze'i rus bzhi pa ste// glang po'i rus pa rgyas pa yim/ 
145a1(rgyud): debadal ti'i rus pa ste// gsad pa la ni ma he rus// dgar ba li ni rnga mo'i rus// sdang la rta dang mahe'o// dris par bya 'a khri'i rus// dgug pa la ni seng ge'i rus// sa'i 'on
145a2(rgyud): tu 'gro ba la/ phag gi rus pa dag la bya// sa dkar dag la byas pa ni// rtag tu zhi bar grub pa yin// rgyas pa la ni ser ba yis// dbang la dmar ba'i sa yin te// gsad pa lA ni sa nag
145a3(rgyud): ste/ 'di ni mdor bsdus cho ga'o// dri min chu dang zhag dang khrog/ mig sman chen po de bzhin te// mi'i u'i bdur ba yi// mdog tu lhan cig sbyar nas yang // rang 'byung me tog sa bon
145a4(rgyud): dang / rigs ngan dang ni bram ze dang // gdol pa mo dang g.yung mo dang // khrus mkhan mo dang gar mkhyen ma// ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo yi ni bye brag gi// 'di dag las ni
145a5(rgyud): blangs nas su// shu kra rag ta'i khyad par dang // sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sku gzugs bri// grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag dang // shi ba'i skra dang rus pa yi/ 
145a6(rgyud): pir gyis dam pa bri bar bya// thig skud ro'i ke sha yis// sku gzugs thig skud mchog yin no// yi dgas phreng bas lta gnas bya// bsas pas kyang ni mar me bya// dpa' bo chen po
145a7(rgyud): gdug spos bya// bgrang ba lnga bshos bya ba ste// dri chen rdo rje chu'i dri// thod pa dang ni bum pa ste// arga'i snod ni thod pa'o// mchod yon rus pa'i rtswa rna ste// ci nus pa yi yo byad kyis/ 
145a8(rgyud): der ni byugs kyang dbul bar bgyi// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa ni// sku gzugs sam yang ri mo 'am/ gzhan yang mkhas pas chog bya/ 
145b1(rgyud): ci lnga'i las kyi rjes 'thun par// de lha'i gos kyi tshul 'chang zhing // gtsor bu sman bkrol ba dang // gzugs mdog dag ni bsgyur nas kyang // dz+ra bo dang ni rnal 'byor pa// slob dpon yang ni rdo
145b2(rgyud): bzhin te/ phyag rgya ldan pa der gnas bya// dri chen chu dang man sa bzal// mtshon nams la mi khyad par du// mnyam par gnag nas bzlas pa bya// glu dang gar gyi rnam pa dang / bza' btung mchog gi
145b3(rgyud): spyad bya ba/ de dag rdzogs kyi bar bya ste// de 'di cho ga'i rim pa'i 'o// rab tu gnas pa'i bar dag la// gnyis 'gyur tshogs pa bsam bya ste// gdu bu dang ni kang ka na// dpung rgyan gos kyi bye bras
145b4(rgyud): dang / sor rngub dang ni mchod phyir thogs// rkang rgyan dang ni thod dang ni// gdugs dang rnga ya ba de bzhin te// sna tshogs phyogs ni dbul bya zhing // man sa sna tshogs mchog dang ni// myos byed btung
145b5(rgyud): bya'i bye brag dang // dam tshig sna tshogs mchog rnams dang // sna tshogs ro dang bcud rnams dang // sna tshogs me tog mchog rnams dang // rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // slob dpon
145b6(rgyud): phyag rgya sbyor ba dang // slob ma tshogs kyi khyad par rnams// bza' ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod// gdug pa'i dri mchog rnams dang ni// sna tshogs rgyal ba'i gdug pa dang // gtor ma
145b7(rgyud): dang ni gtor ma'i mchog/ khyad par du ni mar me'i phreng // gdugs dang bla re de bzhin te// me long dang ni rnga ye ba dang // dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang // chun 'phyang dag gis rnam par brgyan/ 
145b8(rgyud): bumo pa ras dang ldan pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang bu// rin chen lnga dang sman dang ni// dri'i bye brag dag gis ni// arga'i snod ni khyad par du// tsu ta tsam pa'i yal gdong / 
146a1(rgyud): aM bu tsa bu ka dam pa// bil ba pi tsu pu ra dang // ba la mo ta kri ta dza// gi ri kar ni kar ldan pa// e ga pa ri he de ba// sman rnams kun shes bya ba la// lnga po de dag shes
146a2(rgyud): bya ste// mkhas pas bum par gzhug par bya// hi ran na ni pa la dang // glu gor sho sha de bzhin no// gser gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// bsgrub pa po
146a3(rgyud): kun gcer bu yis// bkra shis glu yis glu len cing // rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni// dad pa'i blo ni sngon 'gro bas// dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du// sna tshogs rgya che'i mchod
146a4(rgyud): pa bya/ nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ras ris la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhon yang ba shad bye ba/ 
146a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// dpal ldan he ru ka 'byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa yin// shin du mnyam gzhag bsgrub pa pos// dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya// dam
146a6(rgyud): tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// sbrang rtsi sil dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po dang sbyar ba// tshogs kyi nang du rab gzhag na// kun mchog bcud
146a7(rgyud): kyis len du 'gyur// rdo rje kun mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin// sbom po mtha' lhag rtse sbyar ba// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu spyad// zhi ba'i btong ba bzhin myangs nas// dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ 
146a8(rgyud): mi 'chi bcu phyed gyur pa yin// dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin// mchod bzhi de bzhin dpa' bo ni// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi// snyoms par 'jug pa de nyid 'dzin// sngon du
146b1(rgyud): bsnyen par bya ba ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla// 'khor lo'i gsang sngags 'bum bzla zhing // rang gi lha yang 'bum du byakra// gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya// bka'i 'khor lo bri bya zhing // lha dang mi ri 'adz+re
146b2(rgyud): bre ye/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya// sngar bshad nas ni gang yin pa// der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sa nI yongs su sbyangs byas nas// brtul zhing legs par brdungs nas su// mnyam zhing zung rngu
146b3(rgyud): rnam par spang // der ni chu dang lci ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug/ dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang // mi 'chi bcu phyed ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyer byugs te// der ni dkyil 'khor
146b4(rgyud): yang dgra brtsam// dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing // ro bsregs stsol ba'i phye ma dang // dur khrod so phag ldan pa yis// slob dpon legs par mnyam gzhag ste// dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ 
146b5(rgyud): slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// mtshan nyid min pa kun spang zhing // yang dag shes ni rgyud shes bya// dpal he ru kr-i'i gsang sngags shes// khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang // sbyor shes/ 
146b6(rgyud): ye shes pha rol 'gro// thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas shing // yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang // phyag rgya dag gis lus brgyan pa// rus phreng rus par yang dag ldan// dum cig spyi bor brgyan pa
146b7(rgyud): dang / rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyong/ 8/ kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas// bdag nyid shri ni he ru kar// byas nas de'i 'og tu ni// dpal he ru kar dran bya// 'khor lo 'di'i snying khar dgod// de ltar
146b8(rgyud): bdag nyid go dgos nas/ sarab rnams ni phyogs su dgod// 'og tu yang mtshon cha dgod par bya// 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid kyi/ steng gi med 'dridra ba bya// bdag nyid mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bya/ de ltar/ 
147a1(rgyud): go bgos sum bcu ni// rtsa gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus// de ltar bdag nyid rang bsrungs shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brgyan nas// dngos grub chen pos ster ba yi// 
147a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// de nas sems med srad bu la// du di ra ni chen pos brlam// dpal he ru ka'i grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya// khru bzhi pa 'am/ 
147a3(rgyud): khru brgyad pa// sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa// sngags pas gnyis 'gyur rnam spyad cing // mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog mchod// de'i 'bras bu gzhag pa ni// 'dab rgyas lte ba 'bar dang banas
147a4(rgyud): ge sar yang dag ldan pa yin// sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad pa// lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni// 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la// mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar// ha ha zhes
147a5(rgyud): bya'i sgra cher 'bar// thod pa'i phreng ba'i brgyan dang ldan/ bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'// glang po'i lpags pa rnam par bgos// sprin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes// phyag na kha Ta~M ka bsdus
147a6(rgyud): shing / brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de mdun yang dag gonas lha mo// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can bya
147a7(rgyud): ka ba li ni rag tas bkang // kha na sa ru ti ra 'dzag cing // lte dang lha min min mir bcas dang // phyogs kun du ni sdigs 'dzub byed// mkha' 'gro mi ni nyi shu bzhi// phag mo yi ni rigs
147a8(rgyud): las byung // 'khor lo'i lte bar mchod byas te// phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams su// de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yong// 'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod// bsgrub po gal/ 
147b1(rgyud): yongs grub 'dod// gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya// de nas bum po 'ang bya ba ni// rtsa ba nag nog la sogs med// mu ti ga ser dang rin chen dang // bai dUr+ya dngul zangs ma ste// bza' ba
147b2(rgyud): kun gyis legs bkang ba'i// snod ni steng du gzhag par bya// 'grin pa srad bus bkri ba dang // khwa ni 'dab mas brgyan dpar bya// glos zung gi ni legs bkres pa// brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par
147b3(rgyud): dgod/  gos zung gis ni bkris pa yi// bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhog/ 9/ gser dang de bzhin dngul dang ni// rin chen mu tig gis mdzes pa// rnam dges thams cad dkyil 'khor du// rin chen
147b4(rgyud): gser gyis nye bar mdzes// grong khyer yid 'ong mchod na ni// grub pa nyid du the tsom med// bdag nyid kyis ni sgo kun nas// dri'i chu yis legs par bsangs// / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod
147b5(rgyud): na// mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod// sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin// dkyil 'khor kun du dgod par bya// gang
147b6(rgyud): yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma// de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod// ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni// phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dri dang me tog
147b7(rgyud): bdug spos dang // mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing // dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gnas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod pa// rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser// dkar dang nag dang ser skya
147b8(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang // me tog phreng ba du ma dang / bu re dag dang bcas pa yi// mda' ni shin du mdzes pa dang // de bzhin bza' bcas btung ba yi// rab mnyam gzhan
148a1(rgyud): so mchod pa bya// de nas bsgrub pos dang sa grub kyi/ dang bar slo byed pa na mnyas par bya// dngos grub shin du mnyam gzhag pas// ci nus pa ni tha ma mchod// d+hi bu'i dbying ni
148a2(rgyud): dmigs nas su// me tog bdug pa rnams kyis brgya ni// shin du sgra sran dril bu 'khrol// bsgrub pa po yi rnga yab brdung // he ha'i sgra ni brjod par bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ 
148a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i kun lhun mchod nas ni// de'i bu sdug gdong la ni// dar gyis legs par dka' nas su// snyim pa me tog gis bkang nas// pad ma'i gar bskor byas nas ni// g.yon phyogs
148a4(rgyud): bskor nas phyag bya ste// hUM drang phaT gyi sgra yang brjod// g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa'i yis// slob ma sras po bzhugs par bya// snyim pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // gang du babs pa'i
148a5(rgyud): bsam pas ni// bskor ba drag kyang byas nas ni// shin du mnyam gzhag bsgrub pa pos// de nas grong mchog 'jug pa ni// de nas g.yon phyogs grong khyer du// de nas g.yas phyogs
148a6(rgyud): lus gnas nas// slar yang snyim pa'i me tog ni// dkyil 'khor steng du dor bar bya// dkyil 'khor gang du me tog dpes// de'i rigs ni bstan par bya// de nas slob dpon legs par ni// 
148a7(rgyud): rab mnyam gzhag ste phyag rgya mchod// de nas zhag ni gnyis pa la// 'tshal chen rab tu bzlas pa yis// de la thig le bya ba yin// de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la// dkyil 'khor dag ni
148a8(rgyud): bstan par bya// gong gis lha'i gnas gang yin// der de yang dag bstan par bya// slob dpon dag ni lhan cig tu// rab tu 'dud pas byas pa ni// chog yon nas rtsam bu'i rim pa
148b1(rgyud): yis// de nas bskor ba rab tu bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la// ci bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o// / de nas bla ma dag las yon// de bzhin gshegs pas gsung ba dbul// gser ni brgya stong
148b2(rgyud): dbul ba dang // rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ras ni zud 'gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang zan brgyan dang ni gradu bu dang // mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang // gser las
148b3(rgyud): byis pa'i mchod phyir thogs// chung ma bzang dang bu mo dang // bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams// phyag byas nas ni dbul bar phyinade nas brtsams te bran du ni// khyed la bdag ni 'bul lags
148b4(rgyud): te/ ye blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni 'bul bar bya// de ltar nges par byas nas ni/ bsgrub pa po yis rab nges bya// de nas de las mkha' 'gro ma// rnal 'byor ma rnams
148b5(rgyud): mnyes par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can mo// bsgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig/ de dang rnal 'byor spyod 'gro kun// bsgrub pa po ni de dag gi/ 
148b6(rgyud): mngag gzhug byed par the tsom med// rnal 'byor dngos grub grub 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum du mi zlogs shing // mi snang 'dzul dang nam mkha' rgyu// rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len// / 
148b7(rgyud): rtag par rgyun du skye bar 'gyur// bsgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis// gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'kha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par gyis// 'gro ba kun
148b8(rgyud): kyang nges par gnon// lhan cig mthong ba'i sbyor ba yis// lhan cig gis ni rnal 'byor bskyed// sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar// gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod// ma'
149a1(rgyud): la khu tshur gyis brdeg dang // smig rgyu'i chu ni mthung dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang // sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yi mi// gang zhig rtag tu 'dod 'gyur ba// de ni
149a2(rgyud): lha mi zil gnon 'gro// de gnyis bsdus par gyur pa 'am// de bzhin bde mchog 'khor lo 'am// gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po ni/ 
149a3(rgyud): ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ba shid dang ma bi shang gang ci yang rung // de kun dpal he ru kar bshad// // nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ste le'u bye'i
149a4(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid de// mtshams gang chu ni mi dgos dang // gos pa med cing chags spangs
149a5(rgyud): pa'in mtshams de sems can thams cad kyi// srid pa 'jig par byed pa'o// he ru ka'i dbyangs skyong nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom zhing bzla// skad cig rnam pas blta ba'i
149a6(rgyud): gcig par 'byung bar snang ba ste// dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin// rkyen rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan rnams kun gyi mtshan pas ste// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug/

149a8(rgyud): thun bzhi ru ni bsgrub par bya// dga' ba bzhi pos dga' bo ste// lte pa'i snying khi'i pad ma'i dbus// lce'i rtsa dang mgo steng du// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid// bral
149b1(rgyud): dga' lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// dang po 'dab ma drug bcu bzhi// gnyis la brgyad pa mchog yin te// gsum pa pad ma bcu drug pa// bzhi po sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'dab/

149b4(rgyud): bar bya ba ste// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // thugs rje'i stong nyid spyan gsum pa// / rnam thor gsum dang sku gsum gyis// cig char lam ni rims kyis sbyang // rdo rje dril bus yang
149b5(rgyud): dag mkhyud// thod pa dang ni kha rje 'dzin// mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs// zla ba yi dgas pad dbus su// skra bkrol phyogs kyi
149b6(rgyud): gos can yin// dgas pa'i nyams kyis myos pa ste// mtshams ni rtag tu bsgom byas na// sdom pa mchog ni bsgrub pa yin// dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni/ rin chen snang ba mtha'

149b8(rgyud): ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog// / oM shri he ru ka ya byis ma te b+hid d+hir dza d+ha ya d+hi ma he tan no bi ra pra dzod ya a hUM// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa

150a6(rgyud): pus mo sra la btsugs nas ni// de'i mchod yon dbul bar bya// de nas phyag ni byas nas su// bsgrub pa po'i rtag tu mchod par 'gyur// bsgrub po rtag tu dga' ba yis// 'dod yon gsol
150a7(rgyud): btab de mod la// dpa' bo thams cad mkhyen pa dang // thams cad mdzad pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// khams gsum kun du rnam spyod pa'i// bsgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni

150b5(rgyud): ba'i dbu brgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang // dbu la zla ba phyed pa nyid// phyag rgya drug gis sku la rgyan// 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa dag/ g.yas brkyong ba'i zhabs kyis

150b7(rgyud): 'thung ste// gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma// gsum pa drag gtum ma yin te// bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma'o// lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste// drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// g.yon gyi phyogs
150b8(rgyud): nas dgod par bya// lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing // spyan gsum dbu skra bkrol ba ste// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin// thams cad yi dgas steng nyid bzhugs// sngo dang
151a1(rgyud): ser dang ldang ba dang // de bzhin dmar dang dkar ba ni// cang te'u dang dril bu 'dzin// thams cad na ra'i lpags pa 'dzin// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu brgyan can// 
151a2(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs// yi ge drug las yang dag 'byung // nye bar gnas mdzad lha mo'o// ji ltar mgon po'i mdog bzhin du// phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ 
151a3(rgyud): phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhin no// ser dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// lha mo'i byin pas mnyam par mkhyud// mchog tu dga' bas rnam par myos/ 
151a4(rgyud): oM hr-i ha ha hUM hUM phaT// yi ge de las mkha' 'gro ma// yan lag bdun pa rnam par bsgom// bdun pa dbus su bkod pa ni// yi ge hUM las he ru ka/ dbus su dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi
151a5(rgyud): yan lag ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag he ru ka'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje he ru ka ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje
151a6(rgyud): 'jigs byed ma'o// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum ma'o// shin du spangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje nyi ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi
151a7(rgyud): yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'di bdun ni// ci lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing bsgom// khro bo
151a8(rgyud): kun gyi gnas mchog ste// mnyam med gsang sngogs bzla bar bya// bsod nams chung ba'i bsgrub pos kyang // bral phyed nang du dngos grub ste// rtog tu zhag re bsgom pa ni// 
151b1(rgyud): zhag bdun gyis ni the tsom med// dpyid bla tha chungs nya la ni// ma sring bu mo che mo dang // shes rab thubs kyi cho ga yis// nyin mtshan bzlas shing bsgom byas pas// tho rangs he ru ka mtshungs
151b2(rgyud): 'grubanges par brjod pa'i rgyud tha ma'i tham las/ nye ba'i snying po bsgrub pa'i bskyed pa'i bsgos pa'i 'u ste/  bcus gcig pa'o// 
151b3(rgyud): gzhan yang snying po bshad par bya// sems can kun la phan 'dogs shing / 9/ hUM gi ye shes las byung ba// bde ba chen po bde las byung // sngo zhing drag la 'jigs su rung // zhal brgyad pa la
151b4(rgyud): shin du 'jigs// spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug/ mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu brgyan can// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la
151b5(rgyud): mtshan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i mgo bo ni// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnon// dus mtshan shin du 'jigs pa yang // g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs
151b6(rgyud): kyis gnon// rdo rje dril bus mkhyud pa yi// phag mo yi ni kun tsha'i tshar// tshangs pa'i lpags pa brkyang ba ni// rgyab tu rab tu 'dzin pa ste// mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta dang // ral gri
151b7(rgyud): cang te'u gri gug mchog/ brgyad pa la ni lcogs kyu thog/ g.yas pa phyag rnams de bzhin no// thod pa dang ni khA taM ka/ mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa mchog/ tho ba sdig 'dzub dam pa ste/ 
151b8(rgyud): shri las ye shes yang dag rdzogs// pang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te// dmar zhing dkar la drag pa ste// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par mkhyud// sku bkrol ba la spyan gsum pa/ 
152a1(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de'i zhal dang phyag gnyis ldan// dum bus brgyan pa'i ske rags can// mche ba rnam par rtsigs pa'i zhal// phyogs kyi gos can chags
152a2(rgyud): bas gzigs// sku'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang che// sngo dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// ser dang ljang dang dud ka ste// du ba thal ba sprin gyi mdog/ 'di 'dra'i zhal dang gzugs su yang // 
152a3(rgyud): lha mo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i lpags pa rnam par spangs// sna tshogs pad ma'i steng du ni// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs// 'khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus gnas par// phyi rol
152a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad bsgom// bad pa'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod// oM shar phyogs kyi 'dub ma la// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod
152a5(rgyud): byang gi 'dab ma la ni ba// rta gdong mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod// nub tu dz+wa las mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje drag mo dgod par bya// lhor ni he las mkha' 'gro ma// gser mdog can ni
152a6(rgyud): dgod par bya// ser dang sngo bsangs dkar dang dmar// zhal gsum rnam 'gyur drag po ste// phyogs kyi gos can skra bkrol ba// ro'i steng du bzhugs pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yis
152a7(rgyud): bdud bzhi 'joms// thod pa'i phreng ba drag mo ste// pad ma rgya che lus bong thung // chags pa'o spun gyis gzigs shing bzhad// thugs rje'i nyams kyi bde ba yin// mda' dang gzhu
152a8(rgyud): yang 'chang ba ste// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa mchog/ thod pa dang ni khA tre 'dzin// cang te'u yi sgra yang sgrogs// ser dang ldeng khu sngo ba dang // sngo bstadas dmar dang dkar ba dang
152b1(rgyud): dkar dang ljang khu sngo ba dang // dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste// de lta'i mdog gi khyad par gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par bya// mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dang // byang chub sems
152b2(rgyud): kyis grang ba gzhag/ shwar gyi rtsibs su he las ni// / mid ni hI lI ka zhes bya// byeng gi phyogs su ru las ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni ru ts+yai ki/ nub kyi phyogs su ru las ni// ru ts+yai ka ma wi zhes bya
152b3(rgyud): lho'i phyogs su ka las ni// keng rus ma zhes grags pa sbyin// me'i phyogs su hUM mdzad ma// bden bral du ni phaT mdzad ma// rlung gi phyogs su da ma ri// dbang ldan ki li kI la ste/ 
152b4(rgyud): lha mo chen mo de rnams ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol// ci lho'i zhal dang gzugs bzhin du// de bzhin 'dir yang 'gyur ba nyid// thod pa dang ni khA ti 'dzin// dril bu tsang te'u
152b5(rgyud): gri gug dang // spyan gsum pa la skra bkrol ba// phyogs kyi gos 'chang g.yas brkyang bzhugs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i rkyen can te// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams
152b6(rgyud): thams cad yang dag ldan// drag cing gtum la rab 'jigs pa// thams cad ro'i steng du bsgom// spyan gsum pa la chags pas myos// dbang ldan phyogs su sngo 'byung ma// rlung gi
152b7(rgyud): phyogs su dgra mchog ma// bden brel phyogs su gsus 'phang mu// me'i phyogs su sha pa ri// ser dong sngo bsangs sngo ba dang // dom re ba nyid ni bzhi po ste// thod pa kha taM ka 'dzin
152b8(rgyud): cingang gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te/ bzhi pa rdo rje mdung yin no// phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol// bzang mo lto ba 'phyang ba ste// skye gnas ring la lus che ba/ sman ni rnam
153a1(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing drag/ skra bkrol ba la rab tu 'jigs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// shar skor ba las rnam par
153a2(rgyud): gtsigs ma zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma/ lho sgor ra las rol gtum zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma/ nub kyi sgor sa lus 'bar ma'i mchog ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod do// byang gi
153a3(rgyud): sgror ha las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ sngo dang dkarare dang dmar ba nyid// lcags kyu dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa khA traM ka bsnams te// gri gug ma go nI/ 
153a4(rgyud): sdigs 'dzub dang // dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // zhags pa dang ni tsang te'u 'dzin// thod pa khA taM ka 'chang zhing // sdigs 'dzub gri gug mgo bo 'dzin// dmar dang sngo dang ljang khu ste
153a5(rgyud): lcags sgrog cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa kha ta ka 'dzin cing // mgo bo dang ni sdigs 'dzub mchog/ ljang dang dkar po 'dres pa ste// ser dang dmar po'i zhal mdog yin// dril bu
153a6(rgyud): cang te'u gri gug dang // khwa tA ge dang thod pa dang // mgo bo dang ni sdigs 'dzub phyag/ skra bkrol ba la cher grag pa// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// zhal gdangs ljags ni
153a7(rgyud): bskyod pa ste/ g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// ro dang pad ma nyi dbus bzhugs// mgo bo'i phreng
153a8(rgyud): khas rnam par brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // mgo bo'i do shal rnams kyis brgyan// mi bskyod pa'i cod pan 'ching // zur gyis lci zhing g.yo ba ste// yi ge nyi shu
153b1(rgyud): gnyis 'byung ba'i// snying po mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT dA ki ni dz+wa la shaM ba ra swA hA/ 
153b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma rnams snying khar ni// yi ge re re de bzhin dgod// hUM dang shri ni lha dang lha mo ste// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba las// dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par dag pa
153b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya'o// zhal brgyad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ste/ gzugs la blta ba'i stong pa dang / nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la blta ba'i stong pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdig pas
153b4(rgyud): bya bas blta ba'i stong pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du blta ba'i stong pa dang // rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du blta ba'i stong pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched du blta
153b5(rgyud): bo'i stong pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du blta ba'i stong pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog par lta ba'i stong pa rnams so// phyag bcu drug ni stong pa nyid te/ nang stong
153b6(rgyud): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
153b7(rgyud): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
153b8(rgyud): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das dang de bzhin du/ phag mo yang gzugs
154a1(rgyud): med nyid te/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka nI num par shes pa ste/ phag mo ni nam mkha'o// lA mo ni zhi ba'i rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ni/ gsal
154a2(rgyud): byed mkha' 'gro ma ni/ don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// rta gdong ma ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ma drag mo ni/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dge bar/ 
154a3(rgyud): rig pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma gser mdog can ni/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de rnams ni dbus kyi 'dab ma'i lha mo'o// rton pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ he la ni don la
154a4(rgyud): rton pa'o// ru tsa ki ni tshig 'bru la rton pa'o// ru tsa ka ma la ni ye shes la rton pa'o// keng rus ma ni rnam par shes pa la rton pa'o// shar dang byang dang / nub dang / lho phyogs kyi
154a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rtsibs la'o// chos kyi mdo bzhi ste/ hUM ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// da ma ra ni chos thams cad bdag med pa'o// 
154a6(rgyud): ki li kI li ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o// me dang bden bral dang / rlung dang / dbang ldan gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa ni/ lha mo bzhi'i mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhi sngon du byung ba ni chos
154a7(rgyud): thams cad la 'jug pa la mi 'jigs pa'o// dra ba mchog ma ni chos thams cad nye bar ston pa mi 'jigs pa'o// gsus 'chang ma ni ma ngan pa'i lam la 'jug bya la mo 'jigs
154a8(rgyud): pa'o// she ba ri ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa spong ba la mi 'jigs pa'o// de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni mtshams kyi lha mo dag gi rnam par dag pa'o// sgo bzhi'i lha mo rnams la rnam
154b1(rgyud): par gtsigs ma ni dad pa'i dbang po'o// rol gtum ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// 'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// phreng ba rnam par rgyal mchog ni/ ting nge/ 
154b2(rgyud): 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o// mtshan sum bcu gnyis ni shes rab ste/ phag mo bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje
154b3(rgyud): ga mi nyid yin no// dab par brjod pa'i rgyud bu ma'i tham lam/ mig nyi sa sa gnyis kyi snying po bskyed pa bsgom pa'i ladu skye lnga ba cu ga
154b4(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor gI ni rnam dag ga/ sa'i nA ni spyan ma yin te// thig skud rnam par snang mdzad bshad// cha dbye ba'i
154b5(rgyud): rim pa yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdabo bya// rdul ni sna tshogs rigs zhes bya// de bzhin mchod pa sna tshogs snams// pad ma bu li ra yin te// dza lan da ra thugs 'khor
154b6(rgyud): lo// u rgyan gsung gi 'khor lo ste// skra'i 'khor lo ar bud da// go ta pa ri zur bzhi pa// ra mi shwa ra me'i mtshams// de ba ko di bden bral bshad// ma la be ni rlung gi zur/ 
154b7(rgyud): dbang ldan mtshams su ka ma ru// grwa bzhi rnam par dag pa ste// de la the tse med pa yin// shar gyi sgo ni oM de ba ste// lho ni tri sha ku ner bshad// nub kyi sgo ni ko sa la/ 
154b8(rgyud): byang gi sgo ni ka ling ka/ shir gyi rta babs lam pa ka/ kan tsi lho'i rta babs yin// phyi ma la ya nub phyogs so// byang gi rta babs pre ta pur// gri he dobo lha snam bu/ rin
155a1(rgyud): chen snam bu so ru rA sta// dra ba dra phred gser gling ste// rnga yab g.yer ka rgyal mtshan dang // gdugs dang ba dan nu ga rA// rdo rje thig ni zlum po ni// sin du nyid du
155a2(rgyud): bshad pa yin// sgo khyud de bzhin ma ru ste// rdo rje rin chen ku lu ta// de ltar dkyil 'khor mchog thib gdab// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// 
155a3(rgyud): dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes// sbubs rnams kun ni don yod grub// sku'i
155a4(rgyud): 'khor lo sku dbang phyug/ gsung gi 'khor lo snang mtha' yas// mi bskyod thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// dbus su pad ma rin chen 'dzin// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gzugs rnams ni// 
155a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsgom// sku'i 'khor lo tshor ba ste// ye shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin// 'du byed thugs kyi 'khor lor grags// pad ma don yod rnam shes so// 
155a6(rgyud): ri mo lnga ni gang yin pa// shin du rnam dag rang bzhin te// ri mo sa gzhi thams cad ni// dpa' bo rnam par dag pa bsgoms te// ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// de ni dpa' bo rnam dag
155a7(rgyud): pa'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni rnal 'byor ma// lte ba rdo rje phag mo so// sa bon zhes grags khrag 'thung mchog/ 'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma rang bzhin// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor
155a8(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog/ sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag pa'o// dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus nas// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor dang po ste// gnyis pa mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ 
155b1(rgyud): lag pa'i phyag rgya gsum pa ste// gzugs brnyan dgod pa bzhi pa'o// me tog bkram pa lnga pa ste// drug pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o// dbus kyi pad ma lte bar bcas// rab tu dga' ba'i
155b2(rgyud): sa yin no// thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med// gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa// sku'i 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba// de bzhin gru bzhi sbyang ga pa/ lha'i snam bu mngon du 'gyur// sgo bani ring du
155b3(rgyud): song ba ste// zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje thig/ rta babs chos kyi sprin zhes bshad// 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rtag tu bsgom zhing mchod par ga/ 
155b4(rgyud): dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur// 'khor lo bde mchog sdom pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchog go de nyid ni// he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog/ phrag mo'i sku las byung ba'i mchog/ b+ha ga pad
155b5(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor lus su bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med kha sbyar dkyil 'khor yin/ 
155b6(rgyud): bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin// lha'i de nyid de bzhin te// sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin// de ltar dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog/ yan lag kun bsgom las 'das pa// rtog dang
155b7(rgyud): rtog dang rtog med rnam par spangs// phyi mo thig le las 'das pa// / de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// chos rnams thams cad rtag tu med// chos dang chos min rnam par spyod
155b8(rgyud): de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni// rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa// chags dang chags med rnam par mnyam// pad ma ra ga chu dang mtshungs// rang sems chags
156a1(rgyud): dmar po'i mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ shu ba'i khams kun dang // gzugs dang gzugs med du ma med// bskul nI la sad par
156a2(rgyud): byed pa yi// sems kyi dkyil 'khor bstan// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor ba ga yin par bshad// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems yin te// dkyil
156a3(rgyud): 'khor gsum du gsungs pa'o// sa gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// de lta'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhyen// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
156a4(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byA ba// sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// a li kA li las byung ba// chos
156a5(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/ dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa// dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de'i dbus su rdo rje che// kha bzhi pa la rnam par gdengs// de'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// 
156a6(rgyud): sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas// nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa// dbus kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te// 'khor lo lte ba'i dbus dag tu/ 
156a7(rgyud): sna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad pa// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam 'dres pa// lha'i bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa// lte ba'i dbus su gnas pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// hUM las he ru
156a8(rgyud): kar byas te// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste// rdo rje dril bus legs mkhyud pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsha 'tshir// stag gi lpags pa gis su
156b1(rgyud): bsnams// phyag rgya drug gis sku lnga brgyan// gdug pa kun gyi mgo bo la// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnon// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ rgyal zhing rnam par myos
156b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // gcer bu'o dod 'bod pa'i// mgo bo la ni zhabs kyis gnon// rgyal bye'i lpags pa sted du ste/ lcags kyu phog gis 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang nang te'u de bzhin te/ 
156b3(rgyud): thod pa kha te ka yang 'dzin// gzhan la yang ni mgo bo 'chab// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan// zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chad// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi bskyod pa yis spyi
156b4(rgyud): gtsug brgyan// tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// khro bo mi zad pho bdag nyid// ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// phag mo'i mdog kyang de bzhin te// sku lus nag po 'bar
156b5(rgyud): bu'i mdangs// gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste// gri gug thod pa khA tra ga/ dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni// lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin te// lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ 
156b6(rgyud): dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni// ser dang ldang ba'i gzugs can te// gzhan ni bdag po ji bzhin du// phyeg mo yang
156b7(rgyud): ni de bzhin 'gyur// / gcer bu swa ni bkrol ba ste// dum bus brgyan pa'i sku rags can// pad mu bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma// zur la thod pa dum bu ste// thugs kyi 'khor lor sbyar
156b8(rgyud): bshang ba'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo gnyis// shar deng byang dang nub dang lho rulo// mtshams su gshin rje brtan ma sogs// rdo rje sa
157a1(rgyud): la sgo srungs rnams// yang na gshin rje brtan sogs dang // grwar ni khA gdong la sogs pa'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni// rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// gnas/ 
157a2(rgyud): dang bla ma brgyud rim gyis// kha cig rnal 'byor ma rung 'don// sngar bshad kha dog sna tshogs rnams// ji ltar 'dod par bsgom par bya// gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni// mkha'
157a3(rgyud): 'gro ma'i mdog bzhin du// phyag mtshan phyag rgya sngar bshad bzhin// sna tshogs rim pa ji ltar dgod// sngar bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin// gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod// sum
157a4(rgyud): bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// bsgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// a li ka li na 'byung ba/ bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag paro// sems can
157a5(rgyud): khams ni rab tu gzhug/ shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ni// su la yang ni bstan mi bya// / nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer bsgom
157a6(rgyud): pa ste/  le'u lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya baM// b+ha ga pad ma bsgom pa ni// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis
157a7(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan gyis bka' bstsal pa// yang dag gsang ba des gsang po// a li ka li gru gsum gnas// pad ma 'dab gsum rnam par bsgom// rdo rje
157a8(rgyud): pha ga mo he ru ka/ lte ba la ni rnam par bsgom// rdo rje mkha' 'gro la ma dang // gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo// phag mo yang ni dmar
157b1(rgyud): sngo ste/ mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang // la ma dmar la ser ba ste// dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// bcom ldan 'das mgon po zhal bzhi pa// zhabs
157b2(rgyud): bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha taM 'dzin// dril bu rdo rje legs par mkhyud// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan ma ste// zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang
157b3(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pa yis spyi gtsug 'ching // stag gi lpags pa gos bsnams shing // thod pa'i phreng bas yang dag brgyan// phag mo'i zhal mtshan de bzhin te// byin pa gnyis kyis
157b4(rgyud): legs par mkhyud// gcer bu dbu skra bkrol ba la// spyan gsum pa la dga' bas khyab// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis// zhabs gnyis rnam par gnon pa ste/ 
157b5(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// sku lus phyag rgya drug 'dzin cing // mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang // thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// g.yas pa dkar zhing sngo
157b6(rgyud): ljang khusteng gi sngo la cung zad dkar// gzugs can ma ni b+ha ga'i brtag/ a li ka li b+ha ga mchog/ yang na gru gsum dbus dag tu// pad ma'i 'khor lo rnam
157b7(rgyud): bsgom ste/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad ma rtag tu brtag/ dbus su he ru phag mo dang // 'drab ma la ni mkha' 'gro dgod/ 8/ zur du sa bon
157b8(rgyud): zong pa dag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' spyod ma/ shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo// rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la// kha la sogs pa rnam brgyad do// gsung gi
158a1(rgyud): 'khor lo bden bral du// 'khor lo gsum po zur gsum pa// shar du sku'i mkha' 'gro ma// rlung phyogs dam tshig mkha' 'gro'o// bden bral gsung gi
158a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ste// dbus su rdo he ru ka/ sngo dang dkar dang dud ke dang // sde zhing dam rab bzhi po yin// rang gi phyag mtshan ldan pas mkhyud// gang zhing rang dbang mdog bzhin du/ 
158a3(rgyud): dpa' bo 'kho'i lo mdog de bzhin// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma// dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam// dpa' bo'i mdog ni de mar ba la// gnyis med mkhyud pa'i sbyor
158a4(rgyud): ba'o// sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog/ dbang po gnyis ni rab tu sbyor// kha gdong gshin rje ma la sogs// 
158a5(rgyud): gzugs gzugs phyed ni bud med ste// rang gi thabs dang lan cig tu// dges shing chags pas rnam par myos// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar// mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang khu'o
158a6(rgyud): sna bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams// de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so// thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad phag rgya lnga 'chang
158a7(rgyud): zhing // phyag rgya drug bdag la dgod bya// thams cad rang gi cod pan can// ci lta ba'i rim pas bsgom// mkha' 'gro rgyud pa'i sbyor ba yis// ci lta'i rim pas rnam bsgoms na/ 
158a8(rgyud): go cha'i gsong sngags dgod par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag/ sngar bshad cho ga'i rim pa yis// dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa bsgom// gsang zhi sba ba'i gnas 'di ni/ 
158b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i zhal rgyud pa'i// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag nas su// sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu bsgom// 'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te// 'di nyid du ni brjod mi bya// dbang po
158b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag/ rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing // bza' dang bza' ba'ang spyad par bya// bgrod dang bgrod min dus bzhi nyam/ 
158b3(rgyud): 'char nub dag tu rnam par sbyar// gang zhig ye shes 'di bstun pa'i/ sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// / nges par brjod pa'i
158b4(rgyud): rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa bsgom pa'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gi mchog
158b5(rgyud): rigs sngags sngags rgya chen po ni// bsgom pa nga yis bshad pa yis// log pa'i shes pas shes ldan pa// cung zad ngas ni ma bstan gang // ji ltar bla ma'i rim bstan pa// gang gis
158b6(rgyud): myur du shes 'gyur ba// skye ba bye ba stong phrag du// nga'i ye shes kyis bskul zhing // dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa dang // lkug cing glen la sdig ngan can
158b7(rgyud): byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan chos la mcher la// de dag kun gyis mi shes te// mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang // mngon
158b8(rgyud): po'i nga rgyal la dga' dang // nga rgyal gyis ni sems khengs la// de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// 
159a1(rgyud): he ru ka dpal phal pa la// myur du dngos grub bskyed byed pa// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// kun spyod chog shes nas ni// sna tshogs cho ga bsnyen par bya
159a2(rgyud): des ni srid gsum ma lus pa// kun mkhyen nyid du shes byas nas/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // mthong ba dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba// de ltar 'di la the
159a3(rgyud): tsom med// lha rnams zlog ste bkod pa dang // sngags kyi dbye ba zlog pa dang / zlog pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang // dkyil 'khor kun yang zlog pa dang // so sor bsgom par mi bya ste/ 
159a4(rgyud): yi ge zlog pa btus nas ni// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste/ thun mong gi ni rgyud thams cad// yongs su ma smin sem ldan la'o// 'di ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams dang / 
159a5(rgyud): de bzhin dam tshig 'jug pa rnams// dag pa'i sku ldan skyon med pa'o// ma lus de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// bsod nams chung ba'i bsgrub pos kyang // nga brnyes byas pas
159a6(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur// bsrung ba med cing bza' ba 'ang med// dkyil 'khor med cing dkyil 'khor ba 'ang med// sngags bzlas med cing dka' thub sbyin bsre ge med// mdor na sems ni mnyam pa
159a7(rgyud): nyid du bya/ bla ma mnyes la brtson pa yis// bzung ba'i rnam shes ye shes bya// lam gyi tshig rnams la min zhing // bstan chos las kyang ring ba yis// / rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni/ 
159a8(rgyud): bla ma bsnyen bkur la brtson la// mtshan nyid bstan chos bstan pa ste// dpa' bo de nyid bstan pa yin// skad cig rnam pa rnal 'byor skye// skad cig pa rnams phyag rgya dang // kun nas
159b1(rgyud): thams cad skad cig te// skad cig gcig ni gsang sngags brjod// pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gang ba// mya ngan 'das gnas rgya chen po// gnas gang du ni
159b2(rgyud): gnas gyur nas// brtan g.yor bcas pa rol par ni// bcom ldan lha yis bstan du gsol// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni// ci rigs bshad kyis legs par nyon// rtag byas b+ha sam min
159b3(rgyud): bzung bya min// thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs zhes// gang gis sngar ni bshad pa nyid// dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad// de'i sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur// lte ba'i dbus su 'khor
159b4(rgyud): lho che thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad// rdo rje can ni der bzhugs pa// cha med cha ni rnam spangs la// lus kun la ni rnam par rol// lus las 'das shing gos pa med// la lar/ 
159b5(rgyud): gzugs can dag tu bzhugs// lA lar gnas dang ngag dag dang // la lar rna ba sgra dag dang // la lar dri chen rdo rje chu// la lar tshor ba bcas pa'i sems// la lar skom dang lha lar bkres
159b6(rgyud): la lar khro dang la ltar zhi// la lder 'dod pa rnam par chags// la lar bud med 'dod chags bral// la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste// la lar rol mo brdung bar mdzad// la lar me tog
159b7(rgyud): 'bras bur bcas// la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur/ la lar srog tu rnam par gnas// la li re sa chu me rlung ste/ la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga// la ler rigs kyi bye brag gis/ 
159b8(rgyud): bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag/ la lar ma dang sring mo ru// la lar chung ma bu mo ru// la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang // le lar khye'i 'jug nyi ma nyid// la ler zla ba skar mar bcas/ 
160a1(rgyud): la lar nyin dang mtshan mor 'gyur/ stsol ltar khams gsum pa rnams// byed pa po dang mi bzang rgyal// la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum// mi gsal stong pa'i rdo rje
160a2(rgyud): can/ dz+wa la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lngar pha rol bdud las rgyal// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo che// la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang // la lar ngan pa'i spyod pa rnams// 
160a3(rgyud): la lar dge slong cha lugs kyis// la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis// la lar rgas shing khogs pa nyid// la ltar nad chen gyis gzir pa// la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ga/ la lar sngo dang leb
160a4(rgyud): rgan dpa la lar dkar dang ser po'o// 9la lar sangs rgyas rnam sdang mdzad// la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ khrel ler spun dang sa ma kI// la lngar dka' thig zhi pamo// 9/ le lar 'ad/ 
160a5(rgyud): chags mngal du 'jug/ nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba nyid khwa zlal lar klu dang sbrul chen po// la lar smad 'tshong gar mkhan ma// lo ltar rmi lam mthong ba dang // la lar gnyid kyis
160a6(rgyud): ldog par gnas// la lur rlung dang khris pa dang // wa lar khrag dang lpags par 'gyur// la lar mya ngan gdung ba dang / la lar bsreg pa'i mi dag yin// la lar mtho ris skye
160a7(rgyud): rko ba ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu// gang zhig thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs// de ni khyod la bstan pa yin// lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa// de'i rgyu ma sna tshogs 'di// rtag
160a8(rgyud): tu bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ b+ha ga'i dbus na bzhugs pa de/ lte ba'i dbus su pad mo ste/ bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par// yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas/ 
160b1(rgyud): kha sbyar bya ba byas pa yin// de dbus stong pa chen po ste// 'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o// de ni de kho na nyid te// rang byung kun la khyab pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes/ 
160b2(rgyud): mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang ba mchog gi dges pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thams cad mkhyen par 'di bshad te// kun du 'gro ba mi 'jigs pa'o// 
160b3(rgyud): sA ni rtse mo brgyar bshags pa'i/ cha'i tshad kyi ri mo bsam// stong pa ma yin dmigs su med// yi ge med cing stong pa min// rdul med srog ni med pa dang // gzugs med mtshan ma med pa ste/ 
160b4(rgyud): rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni// rnam shes ye shes dag tu bzung // thams cad sgron ma'i rnam pa ni// dang po'i mtshan ma blta bar bya// mkha' snang lta bu'i snang ba ni// mtshan ma gnyis
160b5(rgyud): bur shes par bya// dkar po'i 'od kyi snang ba ni// phyogs bcu dag tu mthong ba na// gsum po nyon mongs 'byin byed par// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/ 'dod pa'i lha'i
160b6(rgyud): longs spyod ni// rnam shes la snang bzhi pa yin// gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams ni// mthong ba ye shes lnga pa'o// drug po gzugs med ye shes te// bdun pa dag ni
160b7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings// brgyad pa rang 'dod sangs rgyas kyi// 'bras bu rnal 'byor pas thob bo// gsang ba blta dang de bzhin du// lag pa bcung ba nyid dang ni// de la mkhyud pa bstan pa ni
160b8(rgyud): dgu pa blo ma'i zlum ste// thams cad 'di ni bstan pa yin// gzhan dag snying po med zer mtshungs// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ 'di nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ 
161a1(rgyud): dbying 'ams su bya ba byed de/  sa sum pa ni rnam pa gnas yi nyid pang rgyas sa dang pazhin ba pa / skyes 'am ma sa migs
161a2(rgyud): snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin// ye shes bdag 'byung de la ni// sa dang bstan chos thams cad dang // rig byed pa'i mthar gnas par// gong zhig rab tu gnas pa rnams// ye shes 'di la yang
161a3(rgyud): dag 'byung/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur// reg byed grub pa'i mtha' kun gyis// snying po gcig pur rab tu 'ashad // 'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// mjug
161a4(rgyud): dang rdzogs pa nyid dgu dang // byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa dang / de nas 'dir ni cho ga'i ming // rang nyid shes rab thabs dag nyid// de nyid lus ni thams/ 
161a5(rgyud): cad 'byung // 'byin dang srung bar byed pa skye// a A i I u A e I o I A A// ka kha ga gA nga/ tsa cha dzets+tsha/ mak+Sha Ta D+ha ma/ ta tha da dA ni/ kha p+ta ba b+ha ma/ b+hA ra
161a6(rgyud): sa ha kA // 'di ni bcom ldan lha mo ste// kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur pa'o// de bzhin kun rdzob du shes bya// don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te// brgyad khri bzhi stong theg pa me// sngags kyi spyo / 
161a7(rgyud): pa la gnas pa// des na 'di la thams cad ste// thams cad shes rab thangs kyis 'gro// thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya//  dgu dang mi dge gang yin pa/ de ni lha tshogs rgyan yin / 
161a8(rgyud): ska rags thams cad gnas yin te// rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed la// chos rnams thams cad brtag pa yin// oM li ki li mdun bsams nas/ rnal 'byor chen po ngas so
161b1(rgyud): phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de// sems kyang brdeg par mi bya'o// sems de nyid kyang mi bsam mo// de nas 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba/ khyod
161b2(rgyud): lnga yang dag bshad pa yim/ 'di ni 'bad pas snga bya ste// tshogs gnyis 'jig pa med pa'o// rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang // dpa' bo yan lag thams cad kyi// rnal 'byor pa
161b3(rgyud): yis 'bras bu thob// srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin// bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la mi// bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad// gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing // sdug bsngal gyis ni sems/ 
161b4(rgyud): kyang 'khom/ sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo // ji ltar bud med byis pa du ba la/ kun smra bsten pa'i gtam yang brjod byed pa// lam ma bshad cing 'ching bu ma
161b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'ang yin// rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad// he ru ka dpal sku yan lag/ kun du brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba yiso// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma
161b6(rgyud): med/  zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya/ nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// mdun pa mngon du gyur pa yin// nye ba'i mdun pa spyad dka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye ba'i 'dus pa mi g.yo ba
161b7(rgyud): dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shri ha ru ka'i gzhung skyong ba// 'di ni nang gi bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma'i brda
161b8(rgyud): skad/ rgyu mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i ba dag/ pu la sogs pa gang bsten pa// phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// rgyal chen dpal chenani he ruM kA/ 
162a1(rgyud): @'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun du phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // kun du spyan dang dbu dang zhal// kun du thos ldan 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs te rnam
162a2(rgyud): par bzhugs// de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// bsgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba de nyid gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang
162a3(rgyud): mdo sder ni// shin du rnyed dka'i man ngag ste// gleng bzhi sogs su sbas pa ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byar ma'i brda'// gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu 'dra// 
162a4(rgyud): a li ka li zhes brjod pa// rgyu ma la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin// 'jug pas sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ba nyid// bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i
162a5(rgyud): mchod pa dbang bskur ba/ go rgya chen pos yang dag bsrungs// sngags rnams kun gyis bsrungs pa yin// de rnams de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// 
162a6(rgyud): mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing // skyes shing skye bar 'ang gshegs kyi// rigs skyo rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ 
162a7(rgyud): de ltar cho ga ldan byas nas// dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol// zla ba nya la sa steng du// 'di ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgom na// de'i bsod nams gyur pa yis// lha klu mi la sogs/ 
162a8(rgyud): pa kun de'i bsod nams gang 'gyur des// bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan// bsam gtan sems dpa' tsam gyis ni// klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris
162b1(rgyud): longs spyod 'thob 'gyur ba// yang na 'khor lo bsgyur ba thob// / rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// dpal khrag 'thung la sogs pa mkha' 'gro// lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ 
162b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan bre dron sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu'i mchod pas mchod// 'chi bya zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su khyer// de 'dra'i
162b3(rgyud): dpal ldan rnal 'byor pa // sa steng na ni rnyed pa ni dkal/  // nges par brjod pa'i rgyod bra ma'i brag las/ gsang ba'i lo ge bskyed pa'i bsgrub pa'i
162b4(rgyud): rdzi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ 'cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btug gAg cig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ rje mamakhas pas sa ni skam
162b5(rgyud): nas ni//  mkhas shing dri yis byug par bya// ma hA rag tas byugs nas kyang // bodag nyid he ru kar byas la// rigs ngan rdul ldan mo blangs nas// me tog la sogs bkram par bya// dpa'
162b6(rgyud): bo chen po bdug spos 'bul// bya sra la sogs mar me sbar// cang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya// glu dang gir gyis mchod par bya// lha'i rol mo'i bye brag dang // phyogs kyi gos can skra
162b7(rgyud): bkrol ba// lus kyi phyag rgya drug dang ldan// a lI ka li mnyam sbyor bas// sde tshan la ni thim pa dang // bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas nas// thub pa'i mchog ni rab tu dgram// 
162b8(rgyud): gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa/ bzhi pa'i lnga bu gang yin dang // lta ba yis kyang lnga pa yang / lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i gsum pa/ 
163a1(rgyud): nga dzin pa/ de bzhin sa dgupa// ba'i ta'i dang gro yang yin dpa ma thar gnas pa'i bzhi pa /  nyid kyin gnyis pa dang // sum bcu pa ni yang dag blan/ 
163a2(rgyud): nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin brgya'i phyed kyi phyed// de nas kas bcu rtsa gsum dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa dang // lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang ni// dang dro
163a3(rgyud): yi ni gsum pa nyid// sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang / sa yI De A pa dang // de nyid kyi ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // mthar granas pa'i dang po gang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum
163a4(rgyud): ba dang / gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / lnga pa de yang lnga padang po yi ni dang po dang // de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang // de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// dang po'i dang po gang yin/ 
163a5(rgyud): dang / gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang // dang po yi ni dang po dang / u sma na'i gnyis pa nyid// gsum pa'i dang po gang yin//

163b1(rgyud): rtsa bdun pa// an ta s+tha'i dang po dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// an ta s+tha'i gnyis pa dang // de bzhin yang ni sum bcu pa// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // u sma'i dang po gang yin da //

168b2(rgyud): bcu dgu dang sbyar// sgra dang thig les rnam par brgyan// rta'i rgyal po bskyod par byed// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni// yi ge bcu drug po dang sbyar// yi ge grangs ni brgya steng du/ 
168b3(rgyud): dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste/ 'di'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad par bya// dngos grub kun gyi gnas yin zhing // mkha' 'gro ma'i yid dga' ba
168b4(rgyud): dpal ldan he ru lha rigs rgyal// klags pas 'grub pa don yod pa// oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya// hUM hUM phaT ni mtha' sbyar ba// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// dngos grub thams
168b5(rgyud): da ba sgrub byed yin// de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkho' 'gro ma'i bde mchog go// ha stor ba sha la dzA ni kid Ta/ pa d+hU hUM kai ru ru he he badz+ra shri oM/ 
168b6(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// Ta pa hUM hUM ha ha hri oM// yi ge bo dang oM dang yang ni// yi ge oM dang hri nyid dang // hUM dang phaT ces bshad pa ni// oM ba badz+ri hri maM
168b7(rgyud): mAdz+dzi dz+dza trA~M hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor ma ni drug du grags/ zur drug la ni rnam par bsgom// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las
168b8(rgyud): cho ga dang snying po'i sngags bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// snying po bla med bshad par bya// oM badz+ra bI ro
169a1(rgyud): / tsa ni ye hUM hUM phaT// lha mo'i snying po'i rnal 'byor ni// bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge// pad ma'i dbus su phag mo ste// 'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs
169a2(rgyud): su ni/ lha mo'i snying po rnam par bsgom/ oM na mi dang rgod ma dang // rdo rje ma dang dpa' mo dang // khro byed ma dang g.yo byed ma// khug rnam dang zur ldan ma// hUM mdzad ma dang sreg mdzad ma/ 
169a3(rgyud): phaT mdzad ma dang zhi mdzad ma// de rnams lha mo bcu gnyis so// ha las dbus kyi gtso bo ste// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// dngos grub thams cad gsol mdzad pa// sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang // 
169a4(rgyud): ldeng khu steng zhal dkar po ste// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams 'gyur// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can// gsus pa rlo zhing skra bkrol bya/ 
169a5(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rang snang thabs dang gnyis med sbyor gnas pa// 'jigs byed tsa mun di ni 'jigs pas myos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// blod pa/ 
169a6(rgyud): dang ni khA TaM 'dzin// mdung dang gri gug cing te'u// rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang // lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // dgra sta dang ni sdig 'dzub dang // na ra'i lpags pa steng du brgyan// 
169a7(rgyud): ska rags rkang gdub dpung brgyan dang // phag rgya yis ni rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can// thugs rje khro bos 'jigs pa ste// 'dab mar lha mo kun bkod pa// 
169a8(rgyud): ma mo dag ni brgyad po ste// ser dang ljang dang dmar ba deng // lho phyogs su ni sngo mdog can// me'i phyogs nus dbang ldan par// dmar dang dud ka spo dang dkar// spyan gsum pa la sku
169b1(rgyud): bkrol ba// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// dkyil dkrung phyed pas grwar gyis bzhugs// mthong ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnams 'gyur// thams cad yi dgas
169b2(rgyud): gdon la bzhugs// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// rdo rje gsor la brtson par mdzad// thod pa nag tus bkang ba dang // dril bu cang te'u yang dag sgrogs// lha rnams dga'
169b3(rgyud): bar byed pa yin// sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// dbang po la sogs steng du ni// g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la dbu skra mdzes// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
169b4(rgyud): brgyan can// klu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// thod pa dang ni khwa tAM 'dzin// rdo rje mgo be phyag na bsnams// thams cad rnam 'gyur gsus pa 'phyab / thams cad mgo bo'i phred bas brgyan
169b5(rgyud): sngo dang ldang dang dkar ba ste/ ser zhing phyag bzhis rnam par mdzes// gcer bu pad mo'i rgya yang tshe// rang gi rigs kyi dbu brgyan can// thams cad ring snang thabs gnyis med/ 
169b6(rgyud): yi ge bcu gsum la bsgom bya// snying po mchog ni bsgom pa yin// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu gsol/ nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 
169b7(rgyud): lha mo'i snying po'i bsgom pa'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin du rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste// gang zhig shes pa
169b8(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub bsgrub pa'o// sa'i cha ni mnyam nyid 'ong// tsan dan gyis ni nye bar byugs// dri bzung dri ldan sa la ni// me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing // spos kyi
170a1(rgyud): dri yis nyams dga' bya// bdag kyang cha dang bcas byas shing /  phyogs bcing bla ni byas nas su// de nas rdza lnga'i baning ba byas te// re mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu zlum po la/ 
170a2(rgyud): yi ge phyi mo dgod par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun bsgrub byed brgya// rim bzhin byung dang rim min pas// dbyangs dang yi ge bsgrub pas so// de'i grangs nid// 
170a3(rgyud): gnas thub po'i// re mig sum bcu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya// khargya phyed kyi ni phyed pa blang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re mi gsum bcu drug pa bla // gsum pa
170a4(rgyud): yis ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum bcu gnyis pa blang // re mig lnga pas khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa bzung // nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum bcu rtsa gsum yang dag blang // ri'u
170a5(rgyud): mig bcwo lnga pa yir ldam lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas// mchog tu mdzes pa yin par 'dod// re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa// me'i bu dang yang dag ldan// re'u mig gsum pas rnam par
170a6(rgyud): dbye/ tshirab mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig sum bcu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger byung // slar yang yi ge de dag nyid// 'dod pa'i don kun bsgrub byed yin// de nas/ 
170a7(rgyud): rang byung blangs nas su// re'u mig lngas ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig lnga dag dang sbyar// don kun bsgrub byed ces bya ba'i// tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu pa
170a8(rgyud): nyid ladzinanyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis dun// gsum pa drag dang yang dag ldan// sum bcu gsum pa legs blangs te// re mig gi ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan/ 
170b1(rgyud): mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa nyid// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni// shin du mnyam par gzhag ste btu// de nas go/ 
170b2(rgyud): rims bzlog ste bzung // re'u mig las ni dang po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bcwo lnga pa dang bcas// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin par
170b3(rgyud): bshad/ de nas nyi shu gnyis pa nyid// bcu gcig pa 'ang de bzhin te/ re'u mig gnyis pa'i se bon dang // re'u mig sum bcu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu dgu pa nyid// sum bcu gsum
170b4(rgyud): yang dag blang // re'u mig sum bcu sum bcur ldan// re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rims bzlog pas bsgrub pos blang // re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re'u mig nyi shu
170b5(rgyud): gsum pa la// gnyis pa dang ni yong dag ldan// steng du thig les brgyan par bya// de nas chu yis sa bon bzung // brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me'i bu yis khyad par dbye/ yi gr-i/ 
170b6(rgyud): hUM ni mtha' ru sbyar// sngags bzhi yis ni rnam brgyan pa// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// oM ni kun la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// / rig rgyal 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i
170b7(rgyud): sngags/ 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed dang // khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sku brgyad zhal ni bcas pa ru// dkyil/ 
170b8(rgyud): 'khor srung ba'i don du ni// gdug pa kun la khyad par du// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang // rtag mi dges par 'i ching bar 'gyur// sha chen dag gis thams cad kun// rdo rje las skyes
171a1(rgyud): 'jigs par bshad// rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM su b+ha ni suM bA ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM gri h+Na gri hA hUM hUM phaT/ 
171a2(rgyud): oM grih+NA pa ya gri h+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaH/ oM a na ya ho b+ha ga wAn badz+ra hUM hU~M phaT// 'di ni gdug pa thams cad kyi// 'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do// nam/ 
171a3(rgyud): mkha'i khams ni yid 'ong bar// pad ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// gdug pa thams cad gnon byed pa'i// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom par bya// phyag ni bcu drug bsgom par bya// phyag
171a4(rgyud): ni bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal brgyad pa la rnam par 'jigs// mche ba gtsigs shing drag pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ 
171a5(rgyud): rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drag po'i thugs rjes khyab// g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa yis// dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon/ 
171a6(rgyud): u ma mchog gi ku tsha gnon// khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// sku ni mgo bo'i do shal can/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i ske regs ldan// rdo rje dril bu phyag na thogs// 'jig
171a7(rgyud): rten gsum rgyal de nyid ni// sdigs 'dzub lcags kyu 'ching ba ni// dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas// thugs kha dang ni dpral bar yang // bgegs rnams 'joms pa'i phyag rgya
171a8(rgyud): gnyis thod ba dang ni kha tri 'dzin// ral gyi lugs kyu'i ching ba ste// zhags pa sdigs 'jub 'khor lo dang // rin po tshe dang thong ba 'tshang // mdung dang mgo bo na to'u
171b1(rgyud): lpags pa'i gos ni steng du 'dzin// phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs bsdams// rang snang rig dang gnyis med bde// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang
171b2(rgyud): dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sgo dang ser ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste// spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag las/ las/ 
171b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon// stobs rdor mi g.ye rdo rje bsnams// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // dud khwa dur smrig bsres pa ste// mche ba rnam
171b4(rgyud): par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis ni// bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i lpags pas sku brgyan cing / 
171b5(rgyud): sna tshogs khro bo'i sngags kyang 'phro// thod pa dang ni khA te 'dzin// rdo rje stod dang sdigs 'dzub byed// rang snang rig dang gnyis med mkhyud// khro bo'i blta bas gzigs mdzad cing // 
171b6(rgyud): rang gi mtshan ma dril bur bcas// phyag rgya bcing bas yang dag mkhyud// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya yis/ 6khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs
171b7(rgyud): bsnams/ spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste// tho ba dbyug to mdung dang ni// ral gri dril bu de bzhin no// yang na thams cad rdor dril ste// khro bo'i rigs kyi rjes 'gro ba'o// 
171b8(rgyud): mkhyed pa'i phyag ni de bzhin no// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog/ sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa
172a1(rgyud): sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag pa// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ oM suM bA ni suM bAM hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na gri h+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ 
172a2(rgyud): oM a na ya ho bA gu ban badz+ra hUM hUM phaT// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams ni// thams cad bskyed nas bsgom par gyi// dkyil 'a khor chen po'i sbyor ba ste// kha sbyar lnga'i ngo bo nyid// grub
172a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// snying po mchog ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin byi dang phag gi sha// zangs kyi gtsug pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin bsreg
172a4(rgyud): gtor ma dang // ma lus lus pa med grub cing // rgyal srid thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// dud dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char rgyu las byung yin na// chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi/ 
172a5(rgyud): thod pa la ni su zhig smod// dpa' bo'i thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // zla ba phyed pas brgyan du byas// dpa' bo'i dpa' bo las skyes bshad// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sprul
172a6(rgyud): bzhi pa'i bsrung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rdo rje khro bo bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor dang rdo rgyus kyis bris te btu ba'i le'u ste/ drug bcu pa'o// 
172a7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sde tshan brgyad ni rnam bsgom pa// mkha' dbyings pad ma'i dbus gnas pa// he ru ka rdo rje rnam par bsgom// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu ga/ spyan
172a8(rgyud): gsum shin du dmar b+he ste// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// zhal rnams 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam
172b1(rgyud): por brgyan// drag po'i zla ba phyed pa 'dzin/ sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu lnga mnan// ral pa'i tsid pan 'ching ba ste/ phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan/ bstag gi lpags pa gos su
172b2(rgyud): bsnams// rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams// sku la thod pa'i do shal can// thugs rje'u nyams kyis khyab pa ro myos// dkar dang sngo dang mo bzang sku// sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag
172b3(rgyud): tsan/ g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal dag ni// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba dang // dud kA'i ni mdog can no// rdo rje dril bus yang dag mkhyud// rang snang rig pa'i yang dag 'dus dang / 
172b4(rgyud): tshangs pa'i lpags pa brkyang ba ni// sku'i rgyab tu nges par bsnams// thod pa khA tra ka 'dzin cing / mdung dang cing te'u gri gug dang // mgo bo dag ni 'dzin pa ste// dzA bra las byung bcom
172b5(rgyud): ldan 'das// 'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs// shar 'dab lha mo dgod bya ba/ ji srid lto'i phyogs kyi char/ me la sogs pa
172b6(rgyud): dgod pa bo// ji srid dbang ldan tshogs bar du// a li mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// pad ma yi ni mkha' 'gro ma// / gtum pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// 'dod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dag ste/ 
172b7(rgyud): dkar dang dmar dang serare ba dang // sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogs su// dmar dang dud ka ljang khu dang // ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta pa ni'i mkha' 'gro ma// tang gi mkha'// 
172b8(rgyud): 'gro ma de bzhin/ ya ma mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// sha bo ra mkha' 'gro ma brgyad gi// de kun spyan ni gsum pa ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po ni/ 
173a1(rgyud): / g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon mdzad pa// rnam 'gyur mche ba rnam gtsigs tham/ phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// sgra brkam
173a2(rgyud): thugs rje khro ba'i nyams// drag de yul khrug byed pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun bsgrub byed yin// 'gro ba thams cad spro byed te// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// thod pa dang ni khwa tI 'dzin// 
173a3(rgyud): dril bu cang te'us brgyan pa// sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba che// 'di dag rnal 'byer pa yis bsgom// phag mo 'am ni yong ni gzhan/ bdag mor yang ni gzhag bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag
173a4(rgyud): por ni/ mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba'i bdag/ de ma thag tus gsum 'khrug/ oM a ka tsaT ta pa ya sha hUM hUM phaTaswahA/ brtan dang g.yo ba'i
173a5(rgyud): bdag nyid ni// ma lus ji snyed 'di yis 'grub// sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rta dang khwa dang pha bang dang // Ta dang wa gra de bzhin sa// ma
173a6(rgyud): na dzad ye ma b+ha he/ sha ra b+ha ste brgyad po rnams// sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni// dus rnams kun du bza' byas na// dga' dang na dang 'chi med dang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur/ 
173a7(rgyud): chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa// byin pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// ma rnyed 'bras btags phye ma las// skye ba bdun pa nang btags pa'i// pa shu rtag tu bza' byas shing // rtag tu bza
173a8(rgyud): bzos nam// myur du mkho' 'gror 'gyur ba ste// 'di la dbyung bar mi bya'o// // nges par brjod pa'i rgyung bla ma'i bla ma las/ sde tshan gyi
173b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// 2 / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya bya/ bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor mchog/ sngar bshad dkyil 'khor la bkod pa'i/ 
173b2(rgyud): dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// ma mo mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pas so// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni/ khong bu'i rnam pa'i gzugs su bya/ 
173b3(rgyud): phag mo'i gzugs kyi de nyid kyang // zhal ni bong bu'i rnam par bya// sngar bshad pa'i mtshan dang dbyibs// gzhan yang mtshan par bya ba yin// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rtse gsum 'tshod// 
173b4(rgyud): sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad ni// mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can// gsung gi 'khor lo rmo bya'i gdong // sku'i 'khor lo song ge'i gdong/ 
173b5(rgyud): khyi dang phag pa 'ug pa dang // khwa'i zhal gdong de bzhin te/ zur la gshin rje brtan sogs kun// ma he ri dgas zhal gdong ni// dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kyi// spyan gsum mig
173b6(rgyud): ni shin du dmar// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog dam pa// sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed// blo ldan rnal 'byor dngos grub dang // rnal 'byor pa la mchog ster 'gyur// rdo rje theg pa'i mun
173b7(rgyud): ngag dang // ngag gi dngos grub rab tu sder// ma thos pa'i chos bstan pas// sems can rnams ni srid lus grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi spang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur// 
173b8(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na gang cung zang // de kun skud cig gis mthong 'gyur// sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i// gsung sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te/ mkha' 'gro ma mo de bzhinan/ 
174a1(rgyud): sngar bshad sngags kyis bdag po rnams// bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing // rtag pa'i bde ba thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni nye snying bzla// bong bu'i
174a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub thob// brtul zhugs med pa brtul zhugs thob// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// nad dang ldan pa yang nang
174a3(rgyud): mod 'gyur/ long ba yis kyang mthong ba bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// kha ra'i sha dang ha yang dang / 6/ sha na glang po na ra dang // u ShA sri ka la de bzhin/ 
174a4(rgyud): brgyad po dam tshig mchog yin no// rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bzung // dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar// bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas na// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur
174a5(rgyud): gzugs spongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub dang // 'dod dgu'i gzugs su 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par// bza' dang bza' min 'gyur ba dang // bgrod du
174a6(rgyud): bgrod min de bzhin te// btung dang btung min dngos grub 'gyur// ma dang bu mo sring mo dang // rang gi gnyen dang tsha mo dang // blo ldan ji ltar 'dod pa yis// phyag rgya phyag rgya chen de// 
174a7(rgyud): 'grub/ bong bu'i mkha' 'gro bsgoms nas ni// bkug na myur du dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi ba// 
174a8(rgyud): nges par brjod pa'i brgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu bslab pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad// 
174b1(rgyud): byabyabye mtha' 'gro lda ni ni sgom pa/ rigs las skyed pa'i go cha yis// gnas dang phyag mtshanas bon dang/ 'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o/ ShaTha na mthe pa/ 'di ni gtso bo'i sa bon 'grub/  ni rdo rngam pa' 'gro ste// zhi ni sangs rgyas ma khA 'gro yim nan
174b2(rgyud): ma pa sbyim ni bdas rim po gro'i sa ma'i ts+tsha tshogasas gri / sa r+ya gros mi mchog yin no/ zhesang 'i ngag rmyi sa 'do rjem pa phrag ngos pa na/  khod dag kyi/ 'ad du
174b3(rgyud): 'i thas du mo pa/ rdo ma sems pa ma la lnga ba sbyin/ sno nga dkar po rgod dang mi gser dang dmar po lnga phul// rdo rdo'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog chen phyag rgya rang de bzhin no/ 
174b4(rgyud): pad ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// ral gri phyag rgya lnga pa yin// glang po seng ge rta dang ni// rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin mo// khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang / dbang phyug che dang dbang po'ang de// rang snga
174b5(rgyud): rig ma'i yan lag bcus// gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ byang du'ang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor ni 'di rnams dgod// lnga po de dag sangs
174b6(rgyud): / rgyas lnga dz+dza lnga lnga yi ni bdag nyid 'gyur// dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te// shar bu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// lho dang nub dang de bzhin du// byang de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang nu
174b7(rgyud): dbus su zla ba ste/ shir du yang ni nyi ma'i gdam// der ni dpa' bo 'dri rnams te// 'di lta ste/ rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang // rdo rje sra ba ste/ bzhi po
174b8(rgyud): de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i snying po ste/ glang po che'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal mdzad dang / rdo rje sgra ste/ de dag ni mkho' 'gro dkyil 'khor te// seng ge'i/ 
175a1(rgyud): gdam bri'o// rdo rje 'od dang / rdorje sprin dang / rdo rje dra ma rA dang / rdo rje bzhad pa ste/ de dag ni rin tshon ma la na 'gro dkyil 'khor te/ rta'i gdam br-i pA'o// rdo rje gnas dang / rdo rje 'jom
175a2(rgyud): mdapa kyirdo rje sreg byed dang / rdorje chos dang / de dag ni pad ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri bya'o// rdon ba den pa/ rde gru dang / jirje stobs dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed ste/ de dag ni la
175a3(rgyud): kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ nam mkha' lding gi gdan khri bya'o// dpa' bo de rnams kyang rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ spyan gsum pa dang / rang snang ba'i rig
175a4(rgyud): mas mkhyud pa/ rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung gis yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs po/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing / rnam par 'gyur ba/ stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams pa/ zhal gcig pa
175a5(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang khyA ti ka 'dzin pa/ cang te ru yi sgra hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shul gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'tshang ba dang // rang gi rigs kyi dbu brgyan can/  rol pa dang zla
175a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang khu/ nub dmar po/  lho ser po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar sor po/ byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ DApad ma'i mkha' 'gro'i
175a7(rgyud): shar dkar po/ 9byang ljang khu/ nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang khu/ byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lto sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byung ldeng khu
175a8(rgyud): nub dkar po/ lto ser po de rnams go rims ji lta bar rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / pad ma dang / rin po che dang phreng bas bskor bar bya'o// grwa bzhir ma mo bzhi bsgoms te/ gti
175b1(rgyud): mug ma mo dang / zhe sdang ma mo dang / 'dod chags ma mo dang / ser sna ma me dang / phrag dog ma mo rnams so// me'i phyogs la sogs par dgod do// dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / 
175b2(rgyud): ljang khu dang / skra bkrol ba la bzhin 'gyur ba/ spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhal gcig pa/ yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ dbang chen dang me dang rlung gi
175b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas pa/ rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / pad ma dang / ral gri dang / thod pa dang khA tA ka dang / gri gug 'chang ba/ ma ni las byung ba'i thod lha mo'i
175b4(rgyud): thod pa'i phreng ba can/ dkyil dkrung phyed pa bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje 'gring ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje mde mchog dang / rdo rje
175b5(rgyud): dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo brgyad po de dag ni// sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste// sngo dang ldong dang dmar ser po// dmar dang sngo dang dud ka dkar// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags
175b6(rgyud): sgrog dang // dril bu thod pa khA twaM ka/ cang te'u dang de bzhin te// tho ba dbyug to mdung dang ni// dgra sA thod pa khA tAM ke/ mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ 
175b7(rgyud): dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// thod pa yi ni phreng ba 'chang // mgo bo'i do shal rnam par brgyan// nyi ma bod ma'i steng du ni//

176a1(rgyud): gnyis med sbyor// snying rje yi ni nyams can te// rdo rje phyi rol yi dgos kyis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// thog ma oM dang ming dang hUM// mtha' ru

176a3(rgyud): mtshan ma dril bu yis// gnyis su med par yang dag mkhyud// mdung dang lcogs kyu thod pa dang // khA to ka dang mgo bo dang // cang te'u dang rtse gsum gri gug dang // na ra'i lpags pa
176a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa yin// sngo dang ser dang dmar dang ldang // dud ka dang ni dkar ba dang // dkar dang sngo dang skyer ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu thul mdog sprin// ser dang sngo dang dkar dang dmar/ 
176a5(rgyud): ljang dang dmar ba'i mdog can te// dmar dang dkar dang sngo ba dang // ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i mdog/ ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/

176a8(rgyud): swAhA/ oM ma hA tsu ga rang na da ki ta d+h+r-i ga ni dzI la shi bA ra a hU~M phan swehA/ oM mahA su kA pad ma hA ki hr-i ki ni dz+wal shaM bar ta hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su ka'i shwad ki b+hi khai da ki ni dz+wa li shi / 
176b1(rgyud): ha hUM A phaT swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i sngags te/ 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no// oM badz+ra dA ka daM hUM phaT/ oM bud dA dra ka \u0f85 hUM phaT/ oM rad na da ka tsa hUM phaT
176b2(rgyud): oM pa da ma da kA ne hUM phaTa.oM bi shwa da ka naM hUM phaT/ ye shes dam tshig ro cig par// mkhas pas bsgom pa byas nas su// dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur// sna tshogs

177a1(rgyud): kha ba kun da'i mdog lnga bu// dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug ni bste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i rnams// sna tshogs pad ma zla dbus

179b7(rgyud): grol/ lus kyang bsnam zhing yid du 'ong // de'i snying dang mgo bo dang / lte ba ro tsa na ru 'gyur// grib bdun dang ba'i 'gros su 'gro// snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te// dkon mchog gsum
179b8(rgyud): lnga rtag tu dang / sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs nas// 'chi med me yis mi 'tshig cing // srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dang // nam yang
180a1(rgyud): bza' bar mi 'gyur ro// de ni mtshan mo mi mthong la// mi snang ba'i dbang phyug mchog// 'di 'dra sngags par rtogs nas ni// bdag la sbyin pa gsol zhes bslang // dri chen
180a2(rgyud): chu dang byang chub sems// mkhas pas blangs te ri lu bya// lugs gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum
180a3(rgyud): bzlas/ de nyid lag tu byin nas ni// sbyin pa 'di yis bdag la byin// de mi de ma thag shi ste// mi 'khrug pa'i rnam pa thob// de ni dben par mkhyen nas su// mnyam par gzhag ste bsgrub
180a4(rgyud): pa bya/ de nas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i mchog/ las kyi tshogs rnams bshad par bya// de'i spyi bo'i skra bcad nas// gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni// de bsres srad bur byas nas ni// gang zhig/ 
180a5(rgyud): mgul pa bcing byas pa// de 'dra'i gzugs su 'gyur ba ste// sna tshogs gzugs ni byed pa yin// de'i lpags pa blangs nas ni// de la he ru ka dpal bri// mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni
