365b8(rgyud): dang / dar dang rdo rje mdung thung dang // gtun shing zhags pa de bzhin du// rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags kyu dang // zhags pa bshol dang kha TaM ka// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag can dang // dbyug pa mdung thung gri gu/ 
366a1(rgyud): dang / mdung thung rdo rje lcags sgrogs can// gri gug ral gri de bzhin du// rdo rje dang ni mdung thung ba shol// ge da rdo rje kyo de bzhin// chu srin rgyal mtshan tho ba'o// zhi ba'i zhal du shes bya dang // 
366a2(rgyud): rtsigs ma dang ni rab 'jigs ma// chos kyi dbang phyug rab stor ma// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun mchog ma// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab ster ma// yang dag rmongs pa'i zhing ster ma// gtsigs ma rmongs pa'i
366a3(rgyud): zhing ma dang / 'jigs chen ma dang de bzhin gzhan// gtum zhal ma du dgra 'joms ma// rmongs pa'i zhing gi 'jigs byed ma// dpa' bo kun la mchog ster ma// long spyod grol ba sdig 'joms ma// bde ba kun
366a4(rgyud): gyi mchog ster ma// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma// gtsigs ma drag cing 'jigs pa mo// shrI'i gdan can ma dang ni gzhan// bde ba'i dbang phyug mchog ster ma// mdzes shing thams cad dgos ma/ 
366a5(rgyud): dang/ 'jig rten dngos grub ster ba mo// lha mo brtsigs ma 'jigs par byed// shin du drag mo gzugs bzang ma// dbang phyug thams cad rab ster ma// dongo grub tra cad rab ster ma// 'jig ma bsgrub ma grag ster ma// nag pos
366a6(rgyud): gzugs dang drag chen po// dgra thams cad kyi 'jigs pa zhon// thams cad dbang du byed pa dang // sems can thams cad 'jigs byed ma// 'khor lo kun rgyal ma nyid dang // 'jigs par byed dang de bzhin
366a7(rgyud): gzhan/ zhi ba'i zhal ma gzugs bzang ma// bsgrub bo rnams la thun byed ma// snyan grags ma dang rab bstod ma// de ltar thams cid rim bzhin no// aT Tar rgod par 'khor lor bzhugs// ko la'i rir ni
366a8(rgyud): ro la bzhugs// ba ru N+ya sid d+ha sa~M ba Dir// lha mo'i 'khar du yi btags gnas// bi ra dza ru shing leb bzhugs// e ra n+ye ru phag la bzhugs// de nas grong du yi dgas bzhugs// e la'i glong du bong
366b1(rgyud): bur gnos// kha tshor gnor sbyin la ni gnas// ma ru'i yul dum nyer gnas// grong du 'gro'i rgyab tu ste// pun Da ba d+har ro lnga gnas// dza lan t+ya keng rus gnas// preSh+Ta'i grong du brtsegs par gnas// soH/ 
366b2(rgyud): red pa re ta la gnas// ka ran dzar gnas tsa ri trer//  u rgyan du ni bdud la bzhugs// 'bar ba 'dzin par ro la gnas// k+Shi ra kAr ni me la gnas// sgra'i grong du ro'i steng // a ma bu ke tu seng ger gAn+d+ha
366b3(rgyud): rgyal po'i khab tu 'khor lor gnas/ khyod kyi yul du yid btags nas// ror gnas mo lwa bar de bzhin// ke rus kyi ni rabi sbyor bas// de lta'i zhing du dngos grub 'gyur// keng rus las byung bde
366b4(rgyud): ba ni// rtswa rtsa ba las yongs langs// mtshams rnams kun du khyab par ni// ye shes khu ba de mthong 'gyur// mgo med las byung ba'i ngag 'di// khams de nyid ni za ba'o// dbang po gnyis kyi mkha' gnas la
366b5(rgyud): dri yis bde ba mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// mkhas pa 'di rnams cung zad med par 'gyur// de'i rang bzhi ni 'gro ba sgyu mar ni// lto ba bsdus pa mthong bar 'gyur// 'phyang ba yis ni thams cad
366b6(rgyud): du bdud rtsi de ni 'gro ba dang 'od // 'jog bzhin po yis rnal 'byor ma// rang gi zhing skyes rnam par spro// phyin du bdag nyid gsang ba yi// de rnams la ni mchod chen bya// mi shes ri bo gcod pa yi// dngos grub cem
366b7(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur// sngon bshad dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de nas keng rus bsgom par bya// skye 'gro'i gtso bo'i dpa' bo yang // shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can// gsung ba'i don du rnal 'byor ma// 
366b8(rgyud): de nas rab tum sogs mi ste/ sgrub pa pos ni dngos grub rgyur// der ni 'du ba yang bya'o// bza' ba dang btung sogs yang dag brtsams// nyer spyad lnga sogs mchod pa dang // nyer spyad gtor ma'i snod rnaMs
367a1(rgyud): ni/ rlom pa'i sha dang nye la sogs// bza' dang rdzas rnams thams cad dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang de bzhin gzhan// g.yon par snod rnams bzhag byas nas// g.yas su khro bo bsta
367a2(rgyud): par bya// shing cig dang ni dur khrod dam// ri dang khrod dang khyim dang ni// grong dang grong khyer ngos rnams dang // khrung stong lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // chu la 'gro dang thang la rgyu// sa dang ma mo'i khyim dang
367a3(rgyud): 'gram/ nag mo drag mo drag chen mo// lha sbyin yang dag rten ma dang // nag mo brtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren dang // tsa mun Di dang drag gzugs ma// lha mo/ 
367a4(rgyud): dbu ma dang ni ma// rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub ma dang gzhan mi thub// bzang nag mo dang nag chen mo// sdom nag mo dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo zla ba mo drag mo// sdang ma 'phyang ma
367a5(rgyud): sum bcu'i dbang // kam po dza mar me mjib ma// grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// drag gzugs ma dang gzugs chen ma// mche ba drag mo brtsigs pa mo// lha mo thod pa'i phreng can dang //

367a8(rgyud): oM ka k+ka keD+ha na pa tha ban d+ha na kha khA d+ha na sarba duSh+Ta na ha na g+hA ta ya cho ga mo'i dgongs mdzad cig/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaHswA hA// bdud rtsis kha ni yongs bkang nas// lha thams cad ni mnyes pa/ 
367b1(rgyud): byas rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// so ba kA sarba ye ga sha raHhUM hUM dzaHsahA/ ji lta'i la sogs yongs sbyor ba// gtor ma'i la sogs
367b2(rgyud): yongs sbyar bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// dgug dang gsang dang dbye ba dang // rengs pa gtor ma'i de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor rnams kyis las rnams kun// bsgrub bya'o ye shes lcags kyu yI/ 
367b3(rgyud): rang nyid 'dod pa'i lha tshim bya// zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin 'gro// grong khyer ram ni rI byo ru// 'byung po mang po rab tu bsdu// de'i tsho gas ni 'du ba'o// rtsa thams cad kyi kun spyod kyis// de'i srog kyang bsdu ba'o/ 
367b4(rgyud): rang gi mdud pa'i gnas 'dus pas// de ni lte ba'i snying khar 'dod// rnal 'byor ma la gus 'dud pas// bsgrub pa pos ni mchog thob 'gyur// rtag tu gnas dang nye gnas su// sdod la lha yis mchog

367b6(rgyud): mnyam gzhag pas bslab// lha'i chu yis khrus byas te// khyad par du yang bdud rtsi lngas// yan lag mar nag chen pos byugs// de nyid kyis ni bdug spos sbyin// nges par gru bzhi gru gsum
367b7(rgyud): pa'iHdbus su 'bad byas bya ba yin// ji lta bar ni sngon bzhin du// sangs rgyas thams cad gsan du gzhug/ gad mo rnam pa brgyad bya ste// hA hA hU~M hrIM hUM hUM he he/ zhes bya ba bsgrub pa po yis so// 
367b8(rgyud): me'i sa bon yang dag zhon// rlung gis su ni phye ba yi// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sbyar byas nas// sa'i mthil du mchod byas nas// skye gnas dbus su dgod bya ste// 'bad pas zhu ba lta bar bya// skye gnas/ 
368a1(rgyud): dbus su rim ji bzhin// bdag nyid nges ma bya rnal 'byor pas// pho nya'i 'od zer kun nas 'khrigs// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rgya mtsho lta// de ltar rnam par bsams gyur pas// rnal 'byer/ 
368a2(rgyud): thams cad bde ba'i gnas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni keng rus kyi cho ga ste/ rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// 
368a3(rgyud): de nas mche ba rnam par brtsigs pa yi// ting 'dzin sbyor gnas bshad bya ste// gzhu 'gengs rim pa 'ong ba ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas yod te// srog gi thig le son bsam pa// mtshams thams
368a4(rgyud): cad du de rgyud te// gzhung dbyug mtshan mar bsam par bya// sgra thams cad ni bskul ba yis// kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa yi mda'// dbus ma'i le bar 'dzom pa yis// rnam par shes pa'i
368a5(rgyud): dben gzhom bya// 'byung gnas thams cad gsad pa yin// bgrod bzhin pa'i bde ba chen// re reg pa yis gzhan du 'gro// mche ba rnam par brtsigs pa yi// rab sbyor rnams kyis nges 'byung
368a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ mchen bya zad pa med 'joms pa// skye bo kun la 'jug par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul las// gzhan gyi grong rnams su 'jug pa'o// sngon gyi sprul pa'i bag chags ni/ 
368a7(rgyud): de la rgyun du 'joms par byed// rnam par zhu ba'i bdag nyid che// zhi ba'i gzugasu ster bar 'gyur// Sh+Ta zhes rkang pa'i 'thil bar du// nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du bgrod// na de mtshams kyi don dam par// 
368a8(rgyud): nyes gsum po la lta bar 'gyur// de phyir skye bo thams cad la// mtshon bya mtshon nyid kyis 'byed do//  po de rnams thams cad la// bdag nyid kyis 'bugs slar ci smos// 'gro ba gzhan du rab 'jug
368b1(rgyud): bar/ mchog tu rmad byung 'gro bar 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra bar yang dag gnas// skye ba kun la rnam par lta// mig sogs rnam par shes pa ni// nang rnams su ni bskyod par byos// ma hA 'gro'i rnam parare shes bya// mkha
368b2(rgyud): 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi gtso// dkyil 'khor sngon du sprul par ni// mche brtsigs la sogs bsgom par bya// rang gi khams ni bde ba'i gzugs// rang rang gtso bor bya ba yin// de las skyes pa'i mkha'
368b3(rgyud): 'gro che mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs// thams cad chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'i// snying por gzhom du med zhig/ chos kun gcig tu yongs bsdus pa// sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri// A li kA
368b4(rgyud): li mnyam byas nas// sde tshan rnams kyis yongs brjes pa// 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed bya// der gnas dpa' bos yang dag btu// ye shes la sogs sku bzhi po// zhes bya thob 'gyur the tsom med// steng / 
368b5(rgyud): 'og rtag tu dngos grub ster// bdag nyid pho nya kun 'gros so// yi ge lnga bcu sde tshan brgyad// de nyid mkha' 'gro mchog rmad byung // sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor ram yang na ni// chu ngu rgyud dang 'dra ba mchog/ yi ge thas
368b6(rgyud): cad kyi ni tshad// sdom pa sogasu mtshon par bya// yi ge rnams dang ming rnams dang // sdom pa rnams su de brjod do// dkyil 'khor rnams dang rgyud rnams dang // le'u rnams ni de bzhin du// lus tshogs rnams ni thams
368b7(rgyud): cad te/ nyis 'gyur thung ngu ring ba'o// de nyid du ni kun nges rgyal// 'byin cing sdud par byed pa'o// sems can rigs zhes 'dir de bshad// re re yi ni mtshan nyid do// re re yi ni bsgom pa ni// ji lta'i rim pas shes
368b8(rgyud): par byaHyi ge yi ni ming dang gzugs// de ni sems can gzugs su 'dod// gsang sngags de ni zlos bzhin pa// de nyid du ni rab gzhug bya// a yig thig le dang bral ba// dmar po phyi mo rnam par spangs// a yig/ 
369a1(rgyud): / thig le dang bcas pa// de phyir mtshal gyi rigs can no// gun dza'i me tog dang mnyam paro// i yig la ni brgyad par 'dod// i yig sin d+ha ra'i mdog/ bzang po la bar shes par bya// 
369a2(rgyud): u yig dbang po'i gzhu'i 'od// u'i yig ge drug pa nyid// glog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o// ri yig du ba'i kha dog ste// phra me'i lus ni spangs pa'o// ri'i yi ge mun pa'i gzugs// li ni bya rog gshig pa'i
369a3(rgyud): mtshungs/ li'i yi ge mtshal gyi mdog/ e'i yi ge dmar skya ste// e srin dA ra dmar mdog/ ai'i yi ge nyi ma 'dra// 'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar// I'i yige rtag 'bar ba// nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam yod// zla byed de
369a4(rgyud): bzhin du thig le// e yig sngon du bshad pa can// zla ba gnyis dang tshig drag ste// oM yig rgyal po de bzhin no// de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug/ las rnams kyi dag pa'i rgyu// myos dang brla rjel rmongs pa dang // sems bral
369a5(rgyud): dang po'i stong nyid de// rmongs pa dang 'khrugs dbang dang ni// myur du thams cad ster ba'o// bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang // brlag gdol du ni gsal ba'o// stong pa nyid kyi las bsgom pas// de ni dmugs dang dbang du'o/ 
369a6(rgyud): yang dag rmongs dang rnam rmongs 'gyur// lus brlan pa dang sems dpa' bral// dbang de 'ong dang dgug pa dang // ye shes shes bya can mchog go// bskrad bu dang ni bzhu ba'i las// rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin// so'i
369a7(rgyud): zil gnon 'dzin bzhin dang // sngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems// skye ba 'di la nam du yang // de'i slar yang 'ong min pa'o// rnam par sdang dang thams cad kyi// 'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o// 'jig rten kun dang 'thun med
369a8(rgyud): skad cig gnas pa spangs pa'o// yid kyi las ni thos cad rnams// de phyir 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur// bde ba'i kha yis bkug byas nas// dbugs med ri mo 'dzag pa nub// phyi mo'i yal ga rnaMs kyis
369b1(rgyud): bya dam chog dbang phyug ma'i gnas kyis// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med// sangs rgyas ri mo steng 'og tu/ kabad sna can la rab tu gnas// A li kA lI mdor bstun
369b2(rgyud): dbacud len khams kyi lus las so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha/ zhal du yongs su 'gyur ba'o// de'i 'og dang gang gzhan du// yi ge thams cad nges par gnas// so sor snang ba ma byung bar// sku
369b3(rgyud): ba gyis zhes bdag gis bshad// sems ni rjes mthun dbyangasu 'gyur// sems stong pa yi rang bzhin can// zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang // ji ltar
369b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i las bya'o// slar yang thams cad byed pa yi// stong pa nyid ni so sor dgod// thog ma nyid ni rkang gnyis dgod// baiR+Ya dang gsang ba byed pa dang // lte ba'i snying khwa stong dang ni// mgrin pa dang ni rkan de bzhin// kha
369b5(rgyud): dang sna dang rna dag dang // dpral ba mgo bo rgyab tu ste// rang gi khams ming 'du shes kyis// dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do// slar yang re re yi yang ni// las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid// stong nyid de nyid rig
369b6(rgyud): byed pa/  rgyan du nang du bsgom par bya// ka yig la sogs ma yig mthar// lha mo bdag nyid chen po nyon// gang gis sa gsum gyi ni lho// thoms cad lha ma yin dang mi// sgrub po'i legs par nges pa ni// de
369b7(rgyud): rnaMs thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de nyid nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// ka yig sogasu 'du shes so// bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni// lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags// rnam shes ye shes snying po dang // dus dang rgyu dang
369b8(rgyud): 'bras de bzhin// 'bugs dang bcud len las dang ni// gtor ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan// dbang po dbu ma sgyu ma dang // mtshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te// lung ni rjes su rig pa dang // mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim/ 
370a1(rgyud): ji ltar/ de ltar de nyid las mdzes pa// shes rab chen pos shes bor bya// rang bzhin gyis ni brjod pa'i las// dus kyi me'i ma'i mdog can no// ji ltar ma'i mdog can no// ji ltar dbang la/ 
370a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i las// lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin// dmar dang nag dang de bzhin dkar// ser dang ljang khu de bzhin no// bsgrub po'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni// de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'od// ya yig la sogs
370a3(rgyud): dgu rnams kyi// ji lta'i tsho gas yi ge rnams// phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang // yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa'o// ji lta'i rim pas blo ldan gyis// dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya// las ni de rnams
370a4(rgyud): shes bya ste/ 'dus pa bde mchog bla ma dang // bde mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang // 'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed sam bu Ta// ji lta'i tshogs gzhan du yang ngo // de ltar nges brjod 'bum gsuM/ 
370a5(rgyud): las/ phyung ba bde mchog chung ngu ste// a yig la sogs kA yig mthar// le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis// de kho na nyid ldan par sbyar// sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro skyes// mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad
370a6(rgyud): pa'i/ de'i bsgrub thabs bshad par bya// ji ltar dbus ma'i pad mar ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsal bar bsgom// sku'i rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang // 'dod chags rgya mtsho phra dog rgya mtsho ste// phyogs bzhi
370a7(rgyud): por ni bsgom par bya// ngad 'dab rnams su rnal 'byor ma// rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma// pad ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma// g.yon bskor du ni bsgom bya ste// 'dab ma bzhi la thod pa ni// rgya mtsho bzhi/ 
370a8(rgyud): po yi ni gzugs// dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o// slar yang grwa bzhi po rnams su// ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na// thar pa'i rgya mtsho ga yon bskor du'o// gzugs/ 
370b1(rgyud): dang sgra dang dro dang ro// reg dang chos dang yid dang sems// kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste// g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya// sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni// rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste/ ye shwe she bya'i rgya / 
370b2(rgyud): dag/ sngon gyi ri bra dgod par bya sgo skyong ba'i lha'i cheg rno du go cu/ glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho// seng ge rgya mtsho ma ho rgya mtsho'o// grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo ni// sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma// gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i
370b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho ma/ kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin// byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che'i// dkyil 'khor de yir shes par bya// dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni// bsgrub tha ba pa sgom par bya// sangs rgyas
370b4(rgyud): gzugs kyi zhal nas ni// pad ma'i yub nges par 'thon// kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po// pad ma 'dab ma stong phrag can// de'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// mekha'i 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste// phyag stong
370b5(rgyud): pa'i rnam par bsgom// zhal ni sum bcu rtsa bdun no// zhabs bco brgyad kyis gar du mdzad// spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan can gyi gzugs// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can// rgyas
370b6(rgyud): tu dbang phyug chen po 'dzin// lhag mar dpa' ba dpa' dbang mo// bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lhor// ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o// shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad te// g.yas par rgyun du
370b7(rgyud): thabs yin no// khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs// gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang // bden bral dang ni thag bzangs ris// dbang po tshogs bdag kan ti ka/ dgra bcom zla ba nyi ma dang // bla mi skyeb
370b8(rgyud): pa bla de bzhin// nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me// myos pa zhabs kyis gnon bya ste// rang rang khyim thab yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshon che yang bya'o// ngag mo yis ni mkhyud pa ste// de'i gzug can ni phyag gnyis skyes// 
371a1(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma// slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs cin ma'o// 'dab ma stong du bsgom bya ba// rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te// bcom
371a2(rgyud): ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba// de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya// / thung ngu ring po yon tan 'phar// e yig la sogs bsde brgyad te// phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phyi ba// stong phrag rnal
371a3(rgyud): 'byor ma'i yang po// ka rdo rje sogs zhes bya ste// khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so// 'khor lo drug bdag rnal 'byor can// de thams cad ni gar du mdzad// thams cad kyis ni
371a4(rgyud): ro la gnon// phyag gnyis pa 'am mkha' 'gro'i bdag/ thod pa kha TaM ka 'dzin ma// bde chen rnam pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma'o// sangs rgyas kyi thugs kha nas spro ba// 'khor
371a5(rgyud): lo gsum 'gro 'od zar phreng / srog ni 'og dang steng lta bas// sdom pa rgya mtsho dgug par bya// slar yang dbugs kyis dbyung ba ni// mkha' 'gro rgya mcho gnyis ma bdag/

371a7(rgyud): blta bar bya// gzhan po'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya// dam tshig gi ni spyod pa tsa mo// sdom pa chu ngur rab tu bshad// thams cad sog ma bzhin dor la// thams cad
371a8(rgyud): sdom pa gzung bar gyis// mche ba rnam brtsigs rab sbyor bas// gzha 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis// de'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang // sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par
371b1(rgyud): bya/ 'og dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis// bde mchog mkha' 'gre'i rgya mtsho dag// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ 58/ hUM phaT yi ge mthar sbar gyis// yang dag ting 'dzin
371b2(rgyud): rdo rje yi/ gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o// thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang // sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no// bdag gis bdag pos rgyud 'di ni// gsungs pas
371b3(rgyud): yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas// phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar legs// khyod kyis 'og dang stang phyag rgya// rab bshad bya yis lce me nyon// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
371b4(rgyud): shes rab che// thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho lo/ 2/ 'og dang stang du snyoms 'jug pas// de'i phyag rgya mngon brjod 'gyur// zhal las nges par mthon yu ba// ngag gis bsgos pa'i

371b6(rgyud): sdom pa/ bdag nyid chen po ye shes gzugs// de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs// der ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje
