371b8(rgyud): byas nasaphyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsol// sems can rnams kyi sdom byung ba// bcom ldan 'badag po nyid kyis gsungs// lha dgra yis ni rab sbyor bas// rab bsha
372a1(rgyud): bya yis lha me nyon// byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi// bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig na// sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i// rnal 'byor dor ni rnam par spro// 'dod chag
372a2(rgyud): chags bral rnam 'dres pa// sdom pa skye 'gro'i gzugs can ne// gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa// sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o// bAM nam mkha' nam mkhar te// sku gsum rnams kyi
372a3(rgyud): kyi yang dag bzhugs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa// gzugs kyi dbus su tham par gyis// rang rig
372a4(rgyud): bdag nyid byang chub ldan// lhan cig skyes po'i sku thob 'gyur// ting 'dzin skad cig reg med pa// gang gi srid gsum la thim gyis// de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste// lus can gzhan/ 
372a5(rgyud): rnams kyi sdom min// rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa// de ltar de nyid des shes bya// nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang // de yis sdom par bshad par 'gyur// mtshan nyid
372a6(rgyud): thams cad yongs ldan bI/ A lI kA li sogs sde tshan// dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs// gang du ming ni nges par mthong // rigs ni de ru shes bya ste// ang ka yang sems can yang / 
372a7(rgyud): dag ldan/ mtha' yas la sogs klu gad dang // nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin// mkha' 'gro ma'i ming thog byas nas// ma me do rnams su rab grags// lha rnams kun gyi skyed
372a8(rgyud): pa dang / sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud kyi yang ngo // 'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te// de yis ma la yang dag rten// rtsa ni dgu po 'gog pa las// srog rgyu rnams su shes par bya// 
372b1(rgyud): a AM ka tsa Ta ta pa dang // ya sha'i sde tshan yig ge dgu// i I kha tsha Sha tha pa dang // ra Sha gnyis par+ra brjod pa'o/  u U ga dza Da da pa dang // la sa sde tshan gsum pa'o// e AM
372b2(rgyud): g+ha dzA D+ha drA bA dang // wa ha sde tshan bde bzhi pa'o// e IM ai aHda nya Na dang // na ma de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid// bzhi po yongs su grags pa ste// nyi nan lnga rnams kyis de bzhin/ 
372b3(rgyud): de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi de// sdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas// sgyu chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis// sa bon gzugs kyi tshogs dran bya// de rnams ra sir yang dag grags// rgyu skar
372b4(rgyud): kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba dang ni nyi'i ma'i chas// 'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis// rgyu skar dang ni ra sar bshad// srog zung du ni de bzhin grag/ 
372b5(rgyud): ri dang chung ngu rgyal dang 'pham// steng du de'i rgyal bar bshad// 'og du 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam// nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun// rgyu ska ra rA si gza' de bzhin// rA si rnam gsum
372b6(rgyud): spyod gang phyir// nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur// srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan/ 69/ cha shes lnga'i ra si kun gyis shes par bya// kar ka Ta seng ge bu mo dang // bum pa rigs
372b7(rgyud): drug yang dag ldan// 'char bar 'gyur dang shar ba yang // ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis// bri sh+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang // ri dgas bum par yang dag ldan// cha shas lde'i tshed kyis ni/ 
372b8(rgyud): gza' lnga shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur// ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang // skan d+ha ru ni song bya bzhin// cha shas dang ni bzhi pa nyid// 'chang ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur// zhag gi
373a1(rgyud): 'char ba ma lus pa'ang // 'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan// nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar// yongs su rimu pas nyi shu bzhi// gang dang 'dra ba'i ming
373a2(rgyud): de 'dra'o// de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya// nyes 'gyur longs spyod bris pa dang // dbang po rnams kyi cha shas ldan// thob pa gzhag pu shes bya ste// bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo/ 
373a3(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni bgos kun dang // gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyor// de phyir phyi dang nang rnams su// dge dang mi dge'i las shes bya// sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni// rnam rteg
373a4(rgyud): med pas mtshon par bya// gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes bya// dbyangs gang de rnams rA si'o// dbyangs dang rA sI de bzhin skar// rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o// dngos grub
373a5(rgyud): 'bras bu ster ba po// yang dag sbyor dang bral na med// g.yo ba'i char pas g.yo ba'i las// nges par bstan pas g.yo med 'gyur// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur// sems can rnas
373a6(rgyud): kyi bsod nams rgyus// lha rnams grol ba'i rgyu nyid pas// lha'i dgra ni bsgom par bya// sum bcu bdun bdag nyid 'khor mo// rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso// kha dog dang ni ro/ 
373a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid dbyibs// las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya// lha 'am lha min sbyin byed kyi// dag ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bad
373a8(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro lha'i dgra// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad// 'dus par byas nas 'bri ba na
373b1(rgyud): lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi// sdug bsngal ster po dza ltar lags// gal te kun rang bzhin ston pa// dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba// de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs// sems
373b2(rgyud): can kun snyir po tsa legs/ 'di la bdag ni the tsom mchi// gtso bo gsal bar mdzod cig kye// phag mo la sogs mang po yi// lha mo sgyu ma chen me nyen// rang rang las kyi rjes
373b3(rgyud): 'brangs pas// lha dang sprin byed sems can gyi// bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med// byang chub chen por zhu las yod// rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid// bdag gi las kyis yang dag
373b4(rgyud): 'byung / de phyir dag dang mi dge blta// sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed// de yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams// gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can// rang gi las 'bras la za ba// ster/ 
373b5(rgyud): ro gzhan du ci yang med// skon pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur// klu 'di y-is ni dges par byed// / a mi tA b+ha dzi na tA sa mA d+ha mA ga ma d+ha mA d+hawa/ ma pA hi rA sA ma nya/ rig
373b6(rgyud): mA sa nya mA rI gi ma b+hu ya te/ se rI re sA rI rI sa ni sa nya shru ta nI sa mA nya sA ni/ shrI rI b+ha ga mA d+ha m+ma d+ha m+ma sA nya pa yA mA pA bA ma dang mi taM// // 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ 
373b7(rgyud): 'di 'dra'i grol ba bsgrub par bya// a ba d+hU ti'i 'ang dbus su ni// rnam shes 'gro ba la mtshon bya// srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad// rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bye/ 
373b8(rgyud): rnam par shes pa'ang 'dres gyur pa'ang // khams thams cad kyi bcud len do// 'thungs pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnams bgro mtshan nyid las// rkan
374a1(rgyud): gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce// a wa d+hU tir de rab bshad// rga shas can gyi tha ma yi// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// rtsa thams cad du bkang
374a2(rgyud): ba ste/ yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim// mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste// gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod// dbang chen la ni me yis sreg/ chu yi dbus su ra
374a3(rgyud): tu thi maHmyur du zhu nas 'gro bar 'gyur// rlung gi nam mkha' la gnas so// chu bo'i tshogs ni skam byas pas// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// sems ni stong nyid la sen bya// spyod/ 
374a4(rgyud): nyid nam mkha'i khams la'o// nam mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid// mkhasra pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag/ de ltar 'od dpag med pa bsgom/ 
374a5(rgyud): rtsi bAs brgyad legs par brgyan pa yi// shos bye'i 'khor le 'di bsgom bya/ pu med bri ba mi u ku// d+ha si me ro ma ka 'drar// rlung du tu ka bi mi dbang ldan du// rI sa'i 'khor
374a6(rgyud): le rim ji bzhin// de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod// a i u e o au sa bo rnams// bkra shis la sogs gza' lnga ni// shar la sogs par dgod par bya// ring po de nyid du
374a7(rgyud): dgod par bya// aM aHnyi ma bzlar shes bya// nyi ma zla bar 'dir grol ba// ku li ri la nyi ma ste// gze' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas// mthar ni gang zhig lhag ma yi// so so'i tshe/ 
374a8(rgyud): gas za bar 'gyur// rA sa rnams kyis brgyan pa yi// 'gro kun la phan 'khor le de// de ltar do la'i 'khor lor 'gyur// rgyu skar ra si dus dang zhag/ lug rnams re hi ta sogs dang / 
374b1(rgyud): zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni// mdor sdus pa'i bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag ldan// gza' dang nad ni de bzhin te// do lA rA si'i tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i las
374b2(rgyud): brjod pa yin// ka ra ti ka dang bzang po'i tshe// mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste// de la 'chi bar shes par bya// gal te rnal 'byor pa med pa na'o// mA ra ga shI Sha mgo dang ni// gza' lhag
374b3(rgyud): nyi ma la bsgo ga mgul pa'i nad kyis nyin bzhin// khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi// rgyal dang mri ga'i rgyu skar dang / gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o// ku lir mchu'i tshes brgyad kyi
374b4(rgyud): thi rangs pa wa sangs la mchi'o// gre dang mchu'i rgyu skar dang // ches bcu spen pa seng ge la/ nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste// gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang // bu mo nyi mar gul
374b5(rgyud): mas 'chi// sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // gzhu dang phur bu'i re mo dang / gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa// srang la 'chi ba shes par bya// sngon dang bcu gcig nag pa dang / pur bu
374b6(rgyud): sdig pa la 'chi'o// chu steng chu smad tshes dgu dang // gre zhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi// gre zhin tshes bdun zla ba dang // zla ba rgyal dang chu srin la ner med// khrums stod khrums smad bcu
374b7(rgyud): gsum pa// zla ba mon gri bum pas mdzad// tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang // spen pa dang ni nya la 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtses// dus smra bas ni shes par bya// sa bon gcig/ 
374b8(rgyud): las skyes yon tan// gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so// rig gnyis su ni shes byas nas// de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas de'i rigs
375a1(rgyud): skye'o// de'i 'bras bu shes bya ste// mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas// rA si sogs 'khor 'brel pa de// rnam shes kun gyi mnyan nyid do// 'od dpag med kyis rab sbyor/ 
375a2(rgyud): bas/ dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya// dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po/ lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs so// de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bur de dran pa// thams
375a3(rgyud): cad bde ba kun sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med la brten pa la// 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pas// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungaso// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drag pa'o// // rdo rje 'od kyi
375a4(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya// lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas// de kho na nyid ye shes zhus// sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba// de 'dra/ 
375a5(rgyud): bdag gis bshad bya yis// rtse cig pa yi yid kyis nyon// lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar byed// rtsa chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis te// de rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog/ 
375a6(rgyud): bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de// dkar po nag pe'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod// der ni rnying pa dgu po mchog/ lus kyi mtshan
375a7(rgyud): ma'i mtshan nyid do// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas// dbugs ni rnam par spros tsam gyis// lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis ni// snga dro ro'i ta'i char// de'i/ 
375a8(rgyud): rtags ni mtshon par bya// sku dang mig gi phyogs dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i car// lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni// mgrin pa'i rtsib logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang // 
375b1(rgyud): brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// 'doms dang ling ka dag de bzhin// mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs// mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du// dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan
375b2(rgyud): ma dgu rnams te// 'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni// 'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon// gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin/ 
375b3(rgyud): der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te// sum brgya drug bcu rnams de bzhin// cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshig/ mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas// gang tshe rlung gi 'bab pa/ 
375b4(rgyud): lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang // dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang // nyi ma rnams ni bcwo brgyad kyi// gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod// zhag brgyad rnams su yongs gtong bas// rlung ni gang tshe
375b5(rgyud): 'bab pa na// lo gnyis su ni yongs bshad par// de yi 'tshe ba yi ni grangs// nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni// de yi zla ba rig byed grangs// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad// 'tshe ba yi ni dus grangaso// 
375b6(rgyud): lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na// lo gnyis su ni de 'tshe ste// zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi// tshad ni sbyor ba'i dus can no// lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis// le gnyis su ni de 'tshe'o// nyi ma bcu gcig
375b7(rgyud): de bzhin du// gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na// lto gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis// nyi ma bcwa brgyad rab tu bshad// the tsom med par bshad pa'o// zhag ni
375b8(rgyud): bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas// lo cag tu ni rab tu grags// zla ba yang ni lo grangs can// nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang che rtsa// g.yas su bgrod par 'bab pa na
376a1(rgyud): lor ni yang dag bshad pa ste// zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs// nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshang ba'o// lha mo gang che bdun gnyis su// 
376a2(rgyud): rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad// zla ba'i tsher na yang dag grags// nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te// de tshe 'tshe ba'i tsha de yin no// gang tshe lnga bcu nyi mar ni// rlung ni
376a3(rgyud): de bzhin 'bab pa na// de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba// lo gcig na ni the tsom med// nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gleng tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na// 'tshe ba bcu zla ba bcu dang ni// nyi ma rnas
376a4(rgyud): ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i nyin rnams kyi// tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du// nges pare gang tshe rlung 'bab na// de tshe de'i tshad kyis ni// zla ba rnams ni/ 
376a5(rgyud): dgu dang ni// nyi ma bcwa brgyad na de bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus la the tsom med// nyi ma bcwa brgyad rgyu ba yis// zla ba yi ni brgyad na dang // nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs// dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o// 
376a6(rgyud): gang che cig dman nyi shur ni// dri la zhon pa spyod pa ni// nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba// 'tshe ba zla ba bdun dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis mchog sdong can// 
376a7(rgyud): gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod// zla ba gnyis na tshe dang 'bral// nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams su// gang tshenyi me rab 'ang ba na// zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste// nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs// nyi shu rtsa gaN+DI/ 
376a8(rgyud): gang tshe 'bab// zla ba'i rig byed na tshe 'gro// nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi// zla ba rig byed du bshad do// lha mo grang tshe nyi shu gsum// rlung ni rgyun tu 'bab pa na// de ni zla ba bzhir 'tsho ste// nyi ma
376b1(rgyud): dus rnams su dran bya// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas// zla ba gsum du bshad bya ste// nyin bcu gcig lnga de bzhin du// 'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod// dus kyi grangs ni mdor bsdus nas/ 
376b2(rgyud): gong du sngon du bshad de phyir// bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang // bcu gnyis nyid kyis grangs kyis ni// tshe yi rim pras de sbyangs nas/ bar ni gsol bar byas pa yin// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs
376b3(rgyud): don du// dus ni 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan// rnal 'byor ma rnams ni shin phra mo'o// mdun me dus ni bdag gis bshad// lha me de rnams kyis yid ches// khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro
376b4(rgyud): sna'i sha ni rnam chad cing // steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab// de'i mtshe bar shes bya ba// nyi ma bdun nu the tsom med// mig gi gos ni yang dug chad// gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin// 
376b5(rgyud): cha shes dgu laM yang dag zhon// lngas lhag pa ni mchod de bzhin// go da bar+ya 'khur ba yi// ngos su stang du 'gro ma'o// nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste// nub cig gis lhag de bzhin no// rna ba g.yA/ 
376b6(rgyud): la yongs brtan nas// bzang mo steng du yang dag brten// bcu gcig cha shas la zhen te// 'chad pa bcwa brgyad na de bzhin// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// lce laM ri mo nag po nan// lus can kun gyi/ 
376b7(rgyud): 'chi ba ni/ nams zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya// bcu gsum su'i bar du ni// gdong nag me ni rig de bzhin// nams zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyi// 'byung po rnams kyi 'gyod pa yin// rgyun tu 'a
376b8(rgyud): me 'beb gang rtsa// steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags// bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon// bcu byed kyis ni the tsom med// snying kha'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang // steng du blta ma de mchog ma// gsung
377a1(rgyud): sha/ dang lnga rus mdzes lha mo// zla ba byed du the tsom mo// lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo// bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs// sen mo'i khrag med de bzhin zhag/ 
377a2(rgyud): nyin rnams bcu ru the tsom za// bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni// bla yis steng du bskams pa ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags// nyin gzhan nyin la the tsom med// byin pa zung gi
377a3(rgyud): gang zhig rtsa// steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog/ bcwa brgyad pa ru shes bya ste// nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis// gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms// 'chi'o steng
377a4(rgyud): du kha bltas mchog/ mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la// 'di yis 'tsho ba the tsom med// mtshan mar rol ljon mar grags ma// steng bgrod mchog gis dbang phyug ma// 
377a5(rgyud): bcu gnyis su ni yang dag grags// nyin rnams dus chod the tsom ze// bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa// bcu gnyis nyid la the tsom med// lo'i rim pas bde sbyangs na/ bdun bcu
377a6(rgyud): rtsa gnyis rim pa yis// drag dang sum bcu bcwa brgyad bcu// 'di ni zla bas rim ji ltar// shes bya de ltar lha chen mo// rim gyis rim gyis dbye ba'o// lhag ma nyid ni bsdus// 
377a7(rgyud): 'gyur bar// 'tshe ba yir ni shes par bya// yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// rab tu sbyor bas srog bkang bas// sangs rgyas lus la 'chi
377a8(rgyud): ci smos// rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas// mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog// snal ma'i bcu gnyis mtha' bar du'o// sangs
377b1(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran sbyor bas// 'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i 'od la ni// gnas nas kun tu bgrod par bya// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur// 
377b2(rgyud): rnam pa'i dri ze'i ris can no// rtsa'i kun nas 'gangs bzhin pa// dngos po kun la gnas pa yin// skye bo kun gyi khams rnams kyi// ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed// chos bdag
377b3(rgyud): med pa 'tshag par 'gyur// gang zag rnams la skrod par 'gyur// gnyis ka sgyu ma chen mo ste// snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin// mthar thug pa'i sbyor bas sems// mtshams
377b4(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'chi ba yin// 'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs// rnal 'byor rnams la bdo sngar byed// dkyil 'khor thams cad bzung ba yis// thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 
377b5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba'i dam pa yang dag myang // rdo rje'i 'od ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma// lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can te/ 
377b6(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid can// srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las// mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
377b7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs// byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi/ mchod pa byas shing phyag byas nas// 'di skad du
377b8(rgyud): ni gsol ba'o// gtso bo lha rnams bslab thabs dang // de rnams rang sngags bdag le gsungs// gang gis thams cad dbang gyur pa// gang gri rab sbyor nyid kyi lag/ lha la sogs pI bslab pa'i thabs/ 
378a1(rgyud): rdo rje sku'i rgyal po nyon// gang gis yang dag cho ga yis// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni// sku bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad de/ 
378a2(rgyud): de la ma mo lha rnams dang // po nyo 'byung po gza' de bzhin// lus sprul po ni chen po dang // rig pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya// dbus ma yi ni ning gnas pa// srid pa dag
378a3(rgyud): pas bsgrub pa yin// dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can/ ma mo dbang chen bsdu ba bya dang // lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung po me la bsgrub bya
378a4(rgyud): dgaza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// lus sprul po ni nam mkhar te// rdo rje'i sku'i nub sbyor bar// ye shes dkyil 'khor tshe yis ni// a ba d+hU ti 'bab pa yin/ 
378a5(rgyud): 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma// de'i dus su shes par bya// de ltas nas ni phyi rol du// res bris la sogs dkyil 'khor dgod// nag po'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// 'byung po'i
378a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// 'bum phrag bzlas pas de nas ni// skyer 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o// tshangs ma zhi ba mo de bzhin du// gzhon nu ma dang phag mo de bzhin du// dpe
378a7(rgyud): mo nyid dang tsa mu NI bo// tshogs kyi dbang mo me gdan mo// gnyis pa'i dum pur dbang po dang // gshin rje chu la lus ngan dang // yid btags dbang dang me bstan can// bden dum
378a8(rgyud): dang ni rung de bzhin// dum bu gsum par dag bya'o/ gnyis zla ba mig dmar dang / gza' lag phur bu pa sangs dang / spen pa dang ning du'o// phyi bani par tshangs khyab 'jug ste// 
378b1(rgyud): bzhin// drag po gzhon nu nges par sgor/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang // kam po dri khyab bdag de bzhin// 'byung po
378b2(rgyud): 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni// rtag tu cho ga bzhin bsgrub bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// kun nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri// ri mo sum bskor dbus byin pas// // brtul shugs
378b3(rgyud): can gyis mdzes par bya// pad+ma ma mdab ma brgyad bri bar bya// lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can// de'i dbus su rdo rje'i sku// zhal cig pa la phyag bzhi pa// cung zad mche ba brtsigs pa
378b4(rgyud): zhal/ bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyani// nyi mar gar mdzad ro la bzhugs// sum bcu pa rnams 'jig
378b5(rgyud): par mdzadatadz+ra stag gi lpags pa'i nam bze' 'dzin// bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug gi ni brgyan// sha ra dang lho dang nub
378b6(rgyud): dang ni/ byang du rim pa ji lta bas// mkha' 'gro kr-i dro dza nyid ma// 'ji ba ma dang ni mar me me'o// de ltar rdo rje sgra'i don// mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya// lte bar rdo rje'i
378b7(rgyud): rnam par 'gyur// pho nya rkang pa drug baglong ma'o// snying kha gsang ba mgrin pa ru// de nyid rnam par slar dgod pa// de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas// bsam gtan sems te
378b8(rgyud): gzhan gyis min// lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur/ dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang lus skyes// las dang po'i sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcu rnam par spro bar 'gyur// hrIHyig las
379a1(rgyud): byung ba'i lha mo// phag mo phyag ni bzhi ma ste// gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du// rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid// kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo// ngag gi gdod can
379a2(rgyud): 'jigs rung ma'o// phreng yig gis ni zhi ba mo// kha dog dmar mo 'od chen mo// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid// kha Ta Da ma ru de bzhin// hiH'i yi ges gzhon nu ma// kha dog ser mo
379a3(rgyud): phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum// gzhu dang mdo' nyid de bzhin no// he'i yi gas tsa mun Di// kha dog nag me phyag bzhi mo// kha TaM kA nyid thod pa dang // cang ti'u
379a4(rgyud): chang snod de bzhin no// oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo// kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ pad ma nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ gaM yig les ni chogs
379a5(rgyud): dbang rmi/ kha dog ljang khu phyag bzhi ma/ rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang // bgrang breng dang ni la du'o// bI yig las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ma/ 
379a6(rgyud): 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang // zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/ e yig las byung ba'i dbang mo// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje ma dang thung thod pa dang // sdigs
379a7(rgyud): 'dzub bcas zhags de bzhin no// thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen pardzes smra/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// rol zhon ma spyan gsum ma// rnyeng ba skrag
379a8(rgyud): lpags pas dkris// shar sgor tshungs pa bri bye ba// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang // spyi blugs pad mo de bzhin no// byang du de bzhin khyab
379b1(rgyud): 'jug ni// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin ni// lho ru drag po bri bya ste// du ba mdog can phyag bzhi pa// rtse gsum thod pa de
379b2(rgyud): bzhin du/ 'gas pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin/ nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo mdung thud de byug pa 'dzin// thod pa de grang phreng 'dzin de bzhin
379b3(rgyud): dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa/ kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag gzhan thal me sbyar ba'o// / dbang po glang po la zhon pa// kha dog ser
379b4(rgyud): po phyog bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang // thal mo sbyor ba byas pa mchog/ mai ru lug la zhon pa ni/ kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi bri// mi'i thab dang thod pa dang // skrag nas de bzhin len
379b5(rgyud): la sbyar/ gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa// kha dog nago bo phyag bzhi pa/ dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang // kun tu skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin/ bden bral khyi la zhon pa ste/ kha deg
379b6(rgyud): sngo skra phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas skrag pas thal sbur mchog/ chu lhar chu srin la zhon pa// khyu dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// zhags pa de bzhin thod pa
379b7(rgyud): da / thal me sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan/ rlung du ri dgas la zhen pa/ du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste/ ba dan dang ni thod pa dang // de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog
379b8(rgyud): lus don du ni gter la zhon// khwa dog ser paM phyag bzhi pa/ rin po chu dang thod po 'dzin// thal sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan// / thams cad rgyu skar dang ni ge za'o// 
380a1(rgyud): rang dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgom// rang gri dam tshig las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rig pa / 
380a2(rgyud): bzhin gdanan// de lta'i tshi ga'i bya ba yis// de phyir re re bsgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su// sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor la sogs rtag
380a3(rgyud): dga' la// pho nya'i las na yang dag brtsam// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// thams cad kyang ni bran bzhin byed/ 
380a4(rgyud): gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// de phyir rim pas mchod par bya// / de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing // sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// oM hUM
380a5(rgyud): phaT sogs nang du bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das rjes nas// der ni thams cad bsgrub pa'o bya// de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan gyi gzugs
380a6(rgyud): cen te/ ba dan gsum la 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog// gzhu dang mda'i ni 'dzin pa nyid// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar// lha mo sngon gyi gzugs
380a7(rgyud): can te/ lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don// nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag// thams cad
380a8(rgyud): lus kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'ong gsungs so// zhes bya bA ni TIg tu nga
380b1(rgyud): brgyad pa'o/ de nas 'dir ni bang rgyal po// rnal 'byor mi yuMs srang mdzad nas// ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad// blo gros chen po dus ci lags// kye rnal 'byor
380b2(rgyud): mi rnams khyed nyid dus/ myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o// sna tshogs sde blon sems chen po// / myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad// gze' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs ni
380b3(rgyud): sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod// gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi ba ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyis ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis
380b4(rgyud): gsungasade tshe myu gu can bsgom pa/ sa bon sa bon gyis mtshan nyid/ myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ba myu gu can// rgyu skar rA si gza' seg
380b5(rgyud): gang zhig du ni mu gaskye// de yis myu gu skyes nges byas/ rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyar bya// dge ba dang nA mi dag kun/ tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char bar// de rnams thams cad dus rnams
380b6(rgyud): sun nyi gro thams cad bde bdag nyi skyes bsgom// ro tra ma ni snyed byed pa'o// ma b+ha ma nung dang 'joms pas spangs// ku swa A dus gzugs su te/ tshes grangs de ni yongs su spangs
380b7(rgyud): me bum bzang dang bkra shis so// ra bu a 'joms par byed pa'o// b+hu bu b+ha dus kyis gzugs kyis so// b+ha bu gu rnyed par byed pa'o// mi gu rA nor la sogs par mdzad/ tra gu a
380b8(rgyud): dus kyi gzugs can no// pri shu pu dge da rnams byed do// b+hu shu pU nang 'joms pa yin/ khyA b+he shug gshin rje'i mche can no// ku ma kI grags dang bsod nams 'dzi/ 
381a1(rgyud): khyA oM gdung 'apyong ma/ pUr ma 'chi ba'i dus can no// me'u gang mumun dus can du m-i/ DU yang gshin rje yang // srin por bac+doM // 
381a2(rgyud): nyid dang / khyu mchog chu ltar spang bar bya// / sems ga/ yongs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gter du rmi la ma can de bzhin// bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du// 'byung po'i nyi ma shar
381a3(rgyud): bzhin/ zla ba dang ni nyi segs chas// de rnams res mo ra ba bshad dang bzung ste yug sna mo de bzhin// sems g.yeng 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas// skye bo kun gyi nyi ma yi// cha'i
381a4(rgyud): rmya ba shes par bya// khyu mchog mi dkar nyid dang // rmi lam bco lnga pa de bzhini// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams yang dag brjod// nya la me ru yang dag
381a5(rgyud): gnas/ DAstong pa rlung du gi gnas su'o// de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa ni/ phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyi las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par/ 
381a6(rgyud): 'gro/ zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis// shes rab can gyis des de sprid// mche ba dang phyed ma bltas pas/ bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin/ dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa/ 
381a7(rgyud): rahu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// / dkar dang gcig shos cho ga yis/ blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// / rmongs pa gang zhig smre bar
381a8(rgyud): byed/ skye bo rang gis byas pa yi// las 'di shes par mi gyur to// las de yis ni dus rnams ni/ the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa/ 
381b1(rgyud): de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong // yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myu gu'i gzugs can du grags// kha dog mang po 'od chen po/ 
381b2(rgyud): myu gu myu gu'i gzugs can ni// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang son pa// gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs// ye shes myu gu rnams bsgom pa/ 
381b3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thams cad bdag med sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad bya// / rgyu rnams su ni brtag bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje rgyu yis
381b4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ zheng bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas// rnal 'byor
381b5(rgyud): mas ni 'di dris so// ji ltar ston par sems dpa' tshe// las dang bral bas 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon gyi las ni rnam nyams pas// rgyun nyams pas na 'od med pas// 'di la
381b6(rgyud): bdag ni the tsom mchis// snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stsol// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad pa
381b7(rgyud): yisatekhyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon// rdo rje ral pa nan sbyor bas// las kyi nang du bsgrub par 'gyur// re re'i ni sbyor ba yi// de ni rang byung du gnas so// shin du dad pa/ 
381b8(rgyud): la gnas pas// sodabung+ge thams cad 'du bar bya// de'i rol pas brtag 'jig rten// ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku khyod
382a1(rgyud): / thob bar 'gyur// debyor bag chags thams cad dang // dge ba'i lus las dngadra bar 'gyur// skye bo chen po de srung ba/ gcig nyid lam gos 'thob par
382a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ rnyog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtag me 'i byed// dril bu'i sgra ni theb byas nas// de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rtse dgu rtse mo gcig pu dang // rtse lnga
382a3(rgyud): rtse me gsum pa can// de ltar la sogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bAr du'o// sgra brjed pa'i dngos po yis// spros pa med cing yi ge med// rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag
382a4(rgyud): de'i sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/ gnas rnams gang la nges pa zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtso can de rdo rje// gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba// 
382a5(rgyud): chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can// de nyidri du ni gsor bar bya/  phyi'i dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa'i bshad par bya// dril bu brtag tu cha gsum can// lnga'i sa
382a6(rgyud): yang dge brgyan par byas// re re'i lha'i bdag go// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khon du ji ltar/ rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams
382a7(rgyud): kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la padad+ma sogs bya// ji ltar de rnams kyi ni brgyan// / de bzhin dri lta bu'i skye rags so// lha ni sgo dang gra rnams su// phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid// 
382a8(rgyud): ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon tshwa// de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon// bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang // steng du rang rig mtshan ma can// 'di 'dra ba'i dril bu che// tshad ni
382b1(rgyud): gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ning gi gzugs can bdag/ de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon bya// thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che// rdo rje yang de dang mnyam par bya// de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las
382b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur// rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor
382b3(rgyud): ma dang mkha' 'gro kun// de tshe nang du mngon par zhugs// thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje dril bur yang dag brten// bcom ldan dpa' bos
382b4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// // zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba tshe// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon
382b5(rgyud): sum du bshad kyis// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis// lus can kun gyi lus gang le/ gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnams la yig dgod pa ni// ka sogs ha yig mtha'
382b6(rgyud): de bzhin// yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khams re re la yi ge rnams// / sngar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar byed// num mo stong phrag 'dag
382b7(rgyud): nyid can/ 'tshams kun du ni gnas pa 'bar// khams thams cad kyi bang gnas las// dpa' bo'i lings spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa/ byang chub
382b8(rgyud): sems dpa'i rigs chen po'o// bdag med pa'i bdag tu gzhag/ gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o// de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce/ dper po chen po'i go 'phang gnas// sman thams
383a1(rgyud): cang dang nye ba yin// sbas pa'i bcud ldan gsungs pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi lo gli'i bdug/ de'i mang nyid du shes par bya// me tog 'bras sogs sde chen
383a2(rgyud): gyis te/ dbang po'i ming ni stong phrag can// de rnams kyis ni bcud len bsgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyis// ka sogs thams cad
383a3(rgyud): smad chen teta las smra ba'i rgyud gzhan du// der ni nges par gsal rig bya// dang bre'i mgon po rnam bsgoms pa// rtag rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams
383a4(rgyud): kyibacud kyis len ni gang mthong ba/ des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas longs sbyor las// bdud rtsi'i tshigs mtshams
383a5(rgyud): gzugs ldan pa'i// grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// / 
383a6(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo// 'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni// grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba// ston pa rdo rje che ci lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags/ sprul pa/ 
383a7(rgyud): gang du bzhud pa logs// chos nyan pa'i dus su yang // ci zhig gis ni brtan par byas// lha dang lha ma yin dang mi// ci'i gang gis 'gro dang 'ong // mngon par tshigs mtshams
383a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsel// mngon par tshigs 'tshams mtshan nyid ni// ji lta'i rim pas bshad kyis nyen// shin tu zab mo'i don chen mo// gsangs rgyas
383b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// / bdag gis nges par ma dor bsngos paso// rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du// khams dang mtshan mar gnas min
383b2(rgyud): tsan/ lus dang ngag sems dang pa yi// grong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o// snron gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par lngas byung bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams thos cad
383b3(rgyud): duji ltar me long la bzhin mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas// sems kyang de'i gnas la'o// rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lnga la sogs pa de rnams rmongs/ 
383b4(rgyud): de'i rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi// rab tu sbyor bas brtag tu sprul// rdo rje'i rtse mo 'jig rten sprul/ 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste/ hU~M ga lige'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khor lo can mchog
383b5(rgyud): byas/ chos 'byung khang pa rdzogs pa ru// nyi shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du/ ngag gi spyod pas nyan par byed// der seng nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi// seM
383b6(rgyud): dben khyab bdag ches shes bya// rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid/ de'i mtshan nyid du shad par dro/ sems can kun la phyan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ster ba nyid dang // sngags dang rgyud
383b7(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba shes// sbyor dang bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs// mthun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la// bu cig pa ltar mthun pa dang // gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting
383b8(rgyud): 'dzin de mchog gzhol// // ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed// mche ba med cing bden pa'i ngag/ sems can kun la thugs brtse dang // lam du 'jug pa de mthar phyin// kun mkhyen
384a1(rgyud): / yon tan dang mnyam dang // bsnyun chos kun gyi pha rol san// mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma// / phyag rgya bda' ni byed pa po// de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang // 
384a2(rgyud): skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus su// / rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyis ste// bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnams
384a3(rgyud): su ni sgra'i ye shes// rdo rje hUM mdzad can khyab bdag/ 'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon pa'i rgyu yin no// sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni// de phyir phra me'i rang bzhin
384a4(rgyud): can// spar sha'i khams su yang dag grags// de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs// mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor brtag nges par/ mas gsum de'i rang bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba
384a5(rgyud): mchog rtse bo// gzhan ni seg ma bzhin// 'di'i bgrod pa ma shes pas// byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings// mtha'i bde ba gsungs pa po// bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang // 
384a6(rgyud): lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po// bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsung ste/ zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gang gi
384a7(rgyud): sgrub pa betetsi'agrub pa'i bsam med sbyor ba shad bya// de ni shin bzang rab sbyor bas// spyod dang brtul shugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa// dngos
384a8(rgyud): grub 'dod pa rnams kyis bya// phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid/ spyod pa dang ni rab tu bsngags// kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la// dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag brten/ 
384b1(rgyud): gleng de rnams su spyod pa dang // yid kyis brtul zhugs bstan par bya// srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya// bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can// 
384b2(rgyud): yang dag me long lo mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas// lus ni las la thim par gyis// sdom pa bdag nyid kyis bsdams pa// phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags/ 
384b3(rgyud): phyag rgya la sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// bdud rtsi lnga dang la sogs pa za// lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan/ chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste/ mi 'dod
384b4(rgyud): kyang ni de phyir 'gro// gzhungs dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yid 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan mo dung khrod sogs par 'gro// sa gzhi
384b5(rgyud): gang du spyod pa na/ rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya/ blo ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni// / bde ba can du de rtsen to// dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas// phyi nas yid kyi rab tu
384b6(rgyud): bshad/ srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas// dbang po'i grong khyer bde ba yi// ye shes spyod pa'i brtul shugs 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// 
384b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum po'o// // de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni// khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rdo rje bzang po'i rab ster bas// de rigs
384b8(rgyud): 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang po lnga dang dedun// brgyad dang bcu gsum bcwa lnga dang / bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar
385a1(rgyud): / la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin// byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin/ 
385a2(rgyud): gsum rti nga'i tshogs su dran par bya// gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang // dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug ze// bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi
385a3(rgyud): de grags pasrin po'i rigs su dran par bya// rwa rigs gsum pa dang brgyad pa/ kU ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o// khyi'i dngos porA bshad pa'o// bcu dang bcu gcig byi bA ste/ 
385a4(rgyud): byi lta de bzhin dgu pa'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// brtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o// / bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga// khru mchog gi rigs 'thob pa'o// thog me tha ma bung buM yi/ 
385a5(rgyud): rigs su de rnams rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// de ni ma her mngon par brjod// thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug// rta'i rigs su rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu
385a6(rgyud): gnyis/ spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po yi ni rigs su 'gro// nyi shu gosum dang nyi shu ba ni// mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// gnyi shu gcig
385a7(rgyud): pa sre mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag med pa'i rgyu skar// bshad kyis da lta mnyan par gyis/ mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te// gzhan du rab tu
385a8(rgyud): 'thob pa man// skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par// 'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi'o// lug dang srang dang ka re ka Ta/ chu srin mthon po la dran bya// kI ru bum seng khyu mchog ni// brtan g+hi
385b1(rgyud): bya ba rab tu bstan// nya dang 'khrig pa'i de bzhin 'dir/ gzhu dang bu me 'dren ma la'o// bla ma nyi ma sa'i bu skyes bu// ngan spong rA hU~M zla ba bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste/ 
385b2(rgyud): mkha' dkyil 'khor la gze' gang yin// de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du/ byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro// / rdo rje bzang por de bshad de// rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon
385b3(rgyud): pa'i rtse ru son pa'i sems// dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan// byang chub sa don rnam 'bab la// byang chub sems rnams kyis rigs so// snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni// las kyi
385b4(rgyud): zla nyi ma 'dzag pa yin// yang dag rabu ster brtag du ldan// rigs med rigs can kyang med do// srid par rtsed mo tsam du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa// me long gi
385b5(rgyud): ni yul la gzugs// gang 'dra mthong ste de med do// de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no/ 6/ de'i nang du zhu ba'i sems// de dang mnyam pa gzhan
385b6(rgyud): yod min/ nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can// dus dang dus min cha'i
385b7(rgyud): bdag nyid/ dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs// byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid tshe// bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so// / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'i
385b8(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bde kun bdag nyid du skyes bshad/ don dam po'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ 
386a1(rgyud): sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// sa rnams la ni rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs rim ni// sa'i dbus su bya ba
386a2(rgyud): 'i/ thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig/  bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni// srog gi yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po
386a3(rgyud): ni ha rjespangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas nas// 'o ba dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor dbang phyug de sringad
386a4(rgyud): byed/ rdorjekhams kun rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa// dpa' bo'i chen po'i don can no// dbus mar rab tu zhags po yiH/ 
386a5(rgyud): bsnan dang bsgrub pa la sogs spangs// mthor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni// nyi ma dang po zad mod can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems// / gang phyir rgyud pa'i rim pas so// de ltar
386a6(rgyud): sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir/ rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can// dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams// sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya// ting 'dzi ni mgon po'i dpa'o rnams
386a7(rgyud): bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi mdi sngon gyi// de dang de'i gnas su bri// gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur
386a8(rgyud): sku la sogs pa'i bzlas pa kun// de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can// sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang // de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal/ 
386b1(rgyud): blos bskul ba yin// de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbugs rnams su// me'i gzugs can bsgom par bya// shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung po'i
386b2(rgyud): tshogs de kun spyad bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // drag po rengs par byed yig/ gr-ilas dung rjes mthun gzugs bsgoms te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya// 'chi bo sdu zhing / 
386b3(rgyud): de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da nA dar 'dzes bya zhing // thig le thig ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bu gang
386b4(rgyud): 'di rnams sngags kyi rtse bo yis// rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de// / oM hU~M hUM phaT yi ge mtha'// ji lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o// na ma shri badz+ra Da ki mahA bI ra bA re na
386b5(rgyud): ra yaHtri pUng wa na kam pa kam bA ba nA ya/ DaMSh+To ta ka Ta Sha b+hi ra bA y+Ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ne tA ya/  bi drung dzi hA ya/ kaM kA la mA lA b+ha ra NA ya/ ko Ti la kA pU dzA ya// dzA lI ba lI D+ha lag
386b6(rgyud): nA yab ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU la sa// ka lA na ta d+hu mu gra ba pu ShA ya/ Sha/ bi kaT nu kha hA hA ra bA ya/ mA tri ga Na pa ri pu ri ta mAn+ya tra g+ha/ b+hi/ sa hA dza sun dA rI ba lA b+ha ka rA ya/ hAM
386b7(rgyud): ka ro tsu ra mu khA ya// ma hA nA shA na pri yA ya/ sarba d+hud d+ha saM tA sa na ka rA ya// ma hA ka wAn tA ga te dza ya/ dza Ta ka lA ba mA ku TA ya/ kha T+wAM ka ka ba la shu la bIn na dA ri Ne/ mad+da/ 
386b8(rgyud): sa nu dra me khA lA ya/ brA gra tsamAM be ra d+ha re ne/ be tA la si g+ha mar ne ka ra yai// ma hA bi g+h+ri ni bA ri ne/ d+h+r-i sha tru ni sum+b+ha ka rA bas+ya te tri swa ha sA ma hA swA hI sre ka ra mA ba lAn ta rbadz+nyAM ni/ sha ta saH
387a1(rgyud): // / sra mu ka dA ya/ dz+nyA na swa ga ra mu khA ra ya/ ma ha bi shi tA ru dI ro ba sA hA ri ne// sarba ma ra ba la ha d+haM si ti sri Sh+Ti saM hA ra kA ra kA ra ya/ sarba na ga nAM sho Sha Na stam b+ha na
387a2(rgyud): bi drA pa na ya/ in tu mA lA d+ha ri Ni// su me ru kam pi ta nA dA ya/ m+le kle ta di gra hi dA ra Na ye// ma hA kA sha ti la kA ta maM no// bud d+ha ke Ti sAhA sra kA Na ni ShA da na ye/ dz+nyA nA mri ta bA ra
387a3(rgyud): pa Na yatisarba karma pra brta nA ya ne/ ban d+ha na ka rA ya/ sarba bi ka lA b+hany+dza ka rA sa/ muN DA ba lI la gAn she rI rA ya/ ba ra kri ta yan tra man tra nA sha nA ya// ma hA ra k+ShA ka ra
387a4(rgyud): duSh+Ta naM bid dA la ne// d+harmod ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha sA ra s+pha rA NA paM// In dra dzA la sarba sa ta ta ma ne// gr-i sta bA da pra bA da ma hA ma te/ 
387a5(rgyud): de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang // rab tu mang po rgya chen po// sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming // sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam skye
387a6(rgyud): sa// khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i// / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rtse// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa ba
387a7(rgyud): lnga 'o// / de nas mig la sogs dbang po/ kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad// mig mi babyung gis rab sbyor bas// rdo rje gsum
387a8(rgyud): rab bsgrub bya// gang la byang chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par blta// rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog/ sems ni mig du shes par bya/ 
387b1(rgyud): rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas// so sor rlung ni dbab par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus su// de'i dus su thim nas 'gro// de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro
387b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs// yid kyi sgra ni nyan par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya// lha rdzas ro'i rab sbyor bas/ 
387b3(rgyud): lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis// lce'i mngon shes la brten nas// dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin// lus kyi reg pa'i rnam pa yis// mchog tu zag med de bslu ba bya// sngon gyi
387b4(rgyud): brag tshugs dran pa las// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro// nyin zhagro mtshan mo mnyam byas nas// chu tshod drug bcu nyid dang ni// chu'i sring drug bcu thim pa dang // g+ha Ti ka rA
387b5(rgyud): yang sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni ser me bcu gnyis la// dpangs su sor brgyad nyid yin te// gun dza drug bcu'i chad la ni// sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thung cig yung
387b6(rgyud): tsam dang //  kASh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang // se gol gtogs pas shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gI/ chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus men sel ba
387b7(rgyud): boHmig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnal 'obyor ma'i// dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs tsan+da te// srog chags rnams/ 
387b8(rgyud): kyi gar bgrod pa// bdag med rang bzhi ni 'thob par 'gyur// mdud pa rnams kyi bred pas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can/ 
388a1(rgyud): chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa// rdo rje mkhwa' 'gror ngo shes bya// thur sel lam la brtag brten nas/ sngar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs
388a2(rgyud): pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa bAn 'dzag/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi// mngon shes byed po sog
388a3(rgyud): lnga pa/ de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi yang mchog go// dngos po'i ye shes can ma lus// ring du yongs su spangs pa yin// thams cad lus su
388a4(rgyud): mnyam sbyor las// lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po med 'dzag pa// bcom ldan mig gis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// 
388a5(rgyud): de nas lha mos phyag byos nas// de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas// stobs po che'i sbyin bsreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan du gsol// mkhas pas
388a6(rgyud): rgyun tu nang bdag gi/ sprin bsreg bshad kyis mnyam par byis// stobs po che'i rab sbyar bas/ 9khams rnams kyis dgang blugs te/ khe ba thab tu yang dge 'theb/ 
388a7(rgyud): nyi zla dgang gzar blugs gzor ro// slob dpon gnyis med do de la/ yang dag rig pa'i// zugs su bsreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di me// gsang sngags rang / 
388a8(rgyud): bzhin mtshan nyid do// yam shing rtse ru yang dag grags// gang phyir sa lu lus skyes 'bras/ tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'di ru mar ni byang chub sems// khrag ni spang
388b1(rgyud): rtse shes par bya// srog sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o// gcin dang gshang ba dag de ltar// can dun dang ni bA rtsi'o// me tog brtag tu khrag du grags// mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin/ 
388b2(rgyud): bung shing seM sin rus pa'o// mdor bsdus pa yis lpags pa gos// / me'i thab kyi dbus su ni// sgra dang kha spu lnga ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'dru
388b3(rgyud): ste de la bsreg/ rim gyis mkha' 'gro rdzogs smon pa// gang ba'i bsreg blugs su shes bya// dbang po'i thams cad gar byed de// de'i bgo chags kyu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos
388b4(rgyud): rol mo// 6/ snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin// srog rnams kun gyi bdag blo ni// stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// las thams cad ba'i sbyin bsreg ni// des mnyes pa yis dngos
388b5(rgyud): grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu/ yid ni de ru yab dag rol// gang tshe'i dus su deng gyur pa/ de che'i dus su rab tu gnas// sbyin bsreg nang bdag nyid
388b6(rgyud): mthong bas// rgod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes// / de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya// mtshams rnams kun du khong khro bar// sems chen
388b7(rgyud): ni gsod par 'gyur// rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de las byung ba bza' bar bya// mtshan cha mtshon byed rab bcom pos// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yis/ 
388b8(rgyud): spyi ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni de la thim par byed par 'gyur te// khyams kun yang dag sbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byar me mtshan nyid// me'i gzugs su rtag bzhug/ 
389a1(rgyud): pa'i bcom lda/ thab khung gis 'di gsungasazhes bya ba ni rab tu byed po bcu 'dren pa'o// de nas rdo rje dang 'du bya// ji bzhin
389a2(rgyud): bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// / rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// / a Sha d+hU ti can dngos grub/ rnal 'byer ma la ri yang dag rol// don dam pa yi nyams la gnas// de'i sbyor las grol
389a3(rgyud): bar ni/ gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyur ro// myuro// lus kyi nyams su myong bzhin paSh+ma/ byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'od// ha yig drug pa dang ldan pa'i// sa don rdo rje'i nor bu / 
389a4(rgyud): a ba dU ti'i rtswa ra~M 'ab bra te/ steng du kha bltas dpral bar son// srung dri'i dus su blo ldan gyis// rang gi lag pas rdo rje bzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas dang mchi
389a5(rgyud): byA ring ba yin// / srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis// srid gsum de'i rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas// nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya// de'i dus suM gang mthong ba/ 
389a6(rgyud): dngogs ro kun mi ltung bar bya// 'i dong chags chen po'i tshul dadrag nyid / kye+e rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur// rdolnga 'byor rgyud kyi rgya'i do na// bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro/ 
389a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi ni/ sems can don ni dris par byas// ska/ gzhi po yi rnal 'byor gyis// bden mgo bdag gis bshad mi bya// rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// sbyor skyes
389a8(rgyud): ye shes gyen du bgrod// pho nya rnams kyi rtso nyid bya// 'dod chags mi yis dges pa rab/ byang chub sems ni brta gi bzung bya yalce'i bya yis lag bris min// lha ni skyes 'bros
389b1(rgyud): po'o mtshan nyid no// mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis bzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin to// de nas btung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams cad kyang bza' bar bya// sa li skyes sogs 'bad pas
389b2(rgyud): sosbyin bsreg kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs gang gang byed pa// de de'i thod par bya ba ste// de nas sa byin gdab par bya// de nas rdzas kyis spong ba dang // gtor ma deng ni bsrung
389b3(rgyud): ba bya/ de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'jug 'gyur// ri lu 'am ni bskrad na pa ni// dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgos pa'o// 
389b4(rgyud): na chen rdo rje can dre swAnadakyil 'khor khrims rnams kun gyi ste// spangs pa rab du bstan pa yin/ gang dag gi las kyi ni// de dang de'i ming can sngags so// sna bon kun gyi
389b5(rgyud): yongs sbyor las// de ni rtag tu sman rnams te// bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcwo brgyad pa'o// 
389b6(rgyud): de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i// / 'khru'e 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas/ po nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig skye gnas dbus su te/ 
389b7(rgyud): yaM yig mge bor gnas pa'o// gri yig dbu ma'i bang mar te// wA'i yi ge snying kha ru// rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa// / dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid
389b8(rgyud): ni thams cad 'phrog/ gang phyir gzhung ni rjem 'jug 'gyur// mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni// mgrin par dag du gnas pa nyid// 'tsho ba rta'i dbyibs 'dir ni// gnas pa
390a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de'i sbyor bas 'gre 'gyur ba// sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du'o// nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// khams gsum po ni skor bar 'gyur// rnam
390a2(rgyud): mkhar nyi mas 'dzeg byas nas/ byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs// rnal 'byor ma'i chu skyes mchog/ sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang
390a3(rgyud): lam mthong ba ni nyams can la// de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// / mtshan mo'i mun pa drab po 'phrog/ rnal 'byor mo 'khor dbus sen par// rta'i mgon po bsgom pa yin/ bya gang
390a4(rgyud): gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba// bsgrubs thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgyegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te/ sprin la sogs pa'ang nyams par 'gyur// kun gyi
390a5(rgyud): sdig pa yang 'phrog par byed// rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du// thams cad skad cig la bsgrub 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par
390a6(rgyud): bzung ba yis// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med de rnams de lha mo// yan lag gcig gis rol par byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste/ sprin bsreg
390a7(rgyud): a ka sogs de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags sgo// me yis tshig la gdung bar bya// de ba
390a8(rgyud): 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags/ sten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo // de nyid thabs so yid kyi lus// dge ba'i mtshan nyid nan bya'o// nang du byed pa ma yin no// gus pa yid kyi dbu mar gnas/ 
390b1(rgyud): phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs// sems can 'jig rten segs byung ba// de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med// mu stegs can dang // 
390b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas par// kun du dbye ba yod ma yin// lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste// tshad ma pa rnams the tso can// thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas// ye shes can rnams
390b3(rgyud): phyir shesamakha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las// can mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yid bya/ bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs/ 
390b4(rgyud): / zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed po bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas rab tu 'jom sa yon tan// bshad kyi bsgrub po po rnam
390b5(rgyud): nyon// nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de// 'chags pa'i dang ni 'jigs rnams su// gang zhig stong pa de srog chags// khams rnams de 'drar
390b6(rgyud): shes bya ste/ dul ba'i sbyor bus ying dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugs su yongasu grags pa'i// rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag me'i ye shes kyang
390b7(rgyud): de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// / dus thams cad du g.yo ba med// ga yo ba 'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo // de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung // bri sam pa thams cad 'jug/ 
390b8(rgyud): gro rol du'i sogs sbyar ba// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thur ster rje/ sgra dang thig ler de shes bya// 'od gsal ba dang spang ba gsus// de phyir name mkho'i snying po
391a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// nang gi dbu ma'i spor ba yis// srog dro yang rab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun gzhi shes bya ste// me lod/ 
391a2(rgyud): du yang rab tu bshad// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang ngo // sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'// rnal 'byor
391a3(rgyud): rnams kyi lhag med 'pho// de'i dus rnam par bzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas dgrong bya min// nam mkha' khams rnams thams cad kyi// de'i snying por rab tu bstan
391a4(rgyud): de dge shes rab thabs gnyis so// gnas skabs de ni nyid nyid do// srid pa ni rnam par 'phro ba nyid// / dpung po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// 
391a5(rgyud): sde'i nang du rtsen par 'gyur// de ltar rnam bcas de nyid dang // rnam pa med pa'i go 'phyed bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'o rgyun// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar lta
391a6(rgyud): rnams kyis 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa'o// gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshul chen chos
391a7(rgyud): de 'dod pa dang / gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// gal te thams cad mi rtog bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mar smras pas/ 
391a8(rgyud): ci bya ste/ chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo // nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi// / sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya// shin pa smig mkhan la sogs// gsod pa'i don la yongs
391b1(rgyud): gnas pa/ de kun de gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyo ba rnams kyi brel 'theb// nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su// gzugs su sdom pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pa
391b2(rgyud): rol du yang / rnam pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa// bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam pa yi// rnal 'byor la bzhugs pas 'di gsung
391b3(rgyud): so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// / de nas lha mos mchod byas te// phyag byas pas ni 'di gsol to// rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung
391b4(rgyud): bor mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i ra basbyor bas// rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa rang // dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas/ 
391b5(rgyud): ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum par mda'i dbyibs dang 'dra// bzhi par dben
391b6(rgyud): gyi gzugs can no// lnga par rtse mo'i mnga' bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba smin// bdun pa rgya mtsho'i gzugs// brgyad par pad mar brjod pa yin// dgu pa
391b7(rgyud): ru ni bcud len te// bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu
391b8(rgyud): bzhir zla ba de bzhin no// bcwa lba ba nyid rA hu ste// thig le zhes byas bcu drug ga/ rna ba bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gis rig par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis/ 
391b9(rgyud): 'as sa.u sa na pa ga sa sa byas na 'phes nga la sa rnas dngasas
392a1(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi rnams su kha sgrub bya// rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang mdze sogs spangs pa yin/ te/ lte bar shri'i yi ger gyi re// he yig snying khar dgod pa
392a2(rgyud): bye/ ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lor te// thod par kI'i yi ge'o// thig le bzhi'i rab sbyor bas// rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur// / de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// rnal 'byor
392a3(rgyud): rnams kyi mchog zag med// gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// / dbu ma'i nang du rob tu gzhug/ 'khor lo bzhi'i 'dab son nas// rang gI rig pa mtha' yas mchog/ 
392a4(rgyud): rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// byung bar rnam par shes par bya// sems chen po ni sed bzhin pas// don yod mdzad pa thob par 'gyur// rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te// dus
392a5(rgyud): thams cad du nges par gnas// longs spyod sprul phye'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong // bzhi pa rab mang bdag med de// de phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod// de ltar
392a6(rgyud): 'khor lor bzhir gnas nas// nges par ldom du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid du// rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste/ nag po'i phyogs su

392a8(rgyud): rnams su// dpal he ru ka ni bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i dga'o bar 'gro bar gnas// gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor// rtse bo ring rig
392b1(rgyud): bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mdzar// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
392b2(rgyud): de nas lugs sogs lce rnams kyi// ston mo mngon par bshad par bya// pad+ma mgar gyi/ dbang phyug nyid kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo // rtswa ni pad mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis
392b3(rgyud): gar rnyed do// byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste/ de rnams kyi ni nang du zhugs// rang gis rig pa badz+rar bar bya// snying rje'i kho yis btung bar bya// gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol// 
392b4(rgyud): sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de'i rang bzhin du/ bza' ba bza' ba myed par bya// pade ma grwar dbang bsgom par bya// ji l-I'i rim pas mtshon par bya//  pa yig gzhan gyi/ 
392b5(rgyud): gling du 'gro// brtan pa thams cad rma'i yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te/ rte yig byed pa'i lha can yin// sha yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs/ shAr yig dga' rol rgyu nan yin/

392b8(rgyud): dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis po gnyis med yang byung ba// lci kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// shos po thams cad de la gnas// khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/ gar
393a1(rgyud): / byed pa yi sku chen la// de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya// nam mkha' zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus//

393b1(rgyud): de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa// 'khor lo bzhi'i mtshon skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa// de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs// g.yo ba 'gog
393b2(rgyud): par byas pa yis// de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gung mthong ba ni de mthong yin/ gdong gis gdong ni blta bar bya// mi dang mi myo lta sogs kyi// gzugs ni pad ma'i 'dab mu

393b5(rgyud): rnams su/ t+ta / rnam snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis/ sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya// bye ba stong phrago grangs kyi ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spod 'gyur//

394a8(rgyud): grub so// tri shaM kun dbang po rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ ko sa ltar rdul 'byor dngos grub ste// ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub skye/  la mra thA ka ru rtag pa 'grug

394b4(rgyud): skyes pa ni dran// dgos pa ye shes shes bya ste// thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas// rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste// sems can 'jig rten la gnas pa'i// las ni rnal 'byor/

394b7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' tshe// rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rnal 'byor ma rnams

397a7(rgyud): gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// dus thams cad du zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi za ma tog/ 'dum phrag sum bcu drug dang go/ mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rab
397a8(rgyud): ba shad do// chen po chung ngur gsungs pa'o// rnyib kyi ni rdul tshad kyi/ A/ mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so// mtha' yas shIng ni mu mod nyid// brtsod pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du/ 
397b1(rgyud): bcom ldan mtha' yas byas 'di gsungs// shAkyi seng ges gsungs pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o// nyen pa ston pa rang nyid de// 'chad pa skye bo gzhan kyang ngo // legs
397b2(rgyud): par gsungs dang 'ching 'gyur // de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis
397b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus so// gcig la gcig gi bzhed pa ni// gya sol ba 'de bas shi gsol 'debs mdzad ma b+ha na myo ldan 'dres kyis gsungs pa yi/ tshig 'di la ni ma
397b4(rgyud): par dge'u// sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gro Sh+Ta// srid pra lAs ni 'gro ba blos// dpa' bo thams cad mnyan sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bye ba'i mchog// rdo rje mkhe'i 'gre
397b5(rgyud): bzhi gshegs// bcom ldan to dge byos 'di gsung so// / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po lis/ rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang / 
397b6(rgyud): shes dang sdom pa dang bya ba dang de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las te 'di rnams mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyalnga po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// 
397b7(rgyud): dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen yu tung lhun gyis grub dro'i gtsug lag+na khang chen por rgya gar gyi ban Ti ta chen po rdo rje stso/ dpon rtog gi pi rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus
397b8(rgyud): ding sang 'gran zla med pa snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can phyogs sna tshogs nos 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnam ste la tshe saM dang zlang dzo gi cher gyise tim par mdzad pa dpal/ rdo rje
398a1(rgyud): // me'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAM kya'i sras po rgyal te'i zhal snga nas bod kyi lo tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+hi mkhon gyis mnyan cing bsgyu pa'o// phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan ca
398a2(rgyud): rab la mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dade yang btun to zhus gtugase legs par byas so// mkha' mnye ma khong rdzogs sna tshogs stsal ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ 
398a3(rgyud): des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gtul bya'i byas ma dbang gA s+ya// gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshegs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'ani de ltar srin yang
398a4(rgyud): ji ltar mi \u0f7fba ga shring rta cher zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jub dus rkyang gis dgrong rnams 'thab pa ra mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen
398a5(rgyud): b+ho rnams kyi snyi rjes 'brangs nas/ kho bos gzhamangon nus min na 'buM dran pa'i dus sngo bas khaM sbya / 'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni/ sna
398a6(rgyud): don 'gal 'gyur bcom ldan dro pa'i b+ho rnal 'byor ma rnams dang /  khaM' 'gro'i tshogs dang hA sA n+ya dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs// 
398a7(rgyud): 'di lus thog pa'i dge ba dri myong cung zad desa'agro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang b+h+yo ba gyur cig/ bdag gis slol btod tsam 'di la / sgra don
398a8(rgyud): 'jug bya mkhyen rnams kyi/ sra gwa rnaMs ska bas g+hA ni gros bu smon du gyur snong stos par zhu// phrag dog sgo nas me bya zhing// rjesu yid rab 'i yang mdzod// rdzogs s+ho//
